df-clim
blocks.content: Define the limit relation for complex number sequences. See ~ clim for its relational expression. (Contributed by NM, 28-Aug-2005.)
blocks.origin:
axiom df-clim(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, setvar s4) {
  |- wceq(cli, copab(s0, s1, wa(wcel(cv(s1), cc), wral(s2, crp, wrex(s3, cz, wral(s4, cfv(cuz, cv(s3)), wa(wcel(cfv(cv(s0), cv(s4)), cc), wbr(cfv(cabs, co(cfv(cv(s0), cv(s4)), cmin, cv(s1))), clt, cv(s2)))))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s3)
  -| diffss(s0, s4)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s3, s4)
  -| diffss(s2, s3)
  -| diffss(s1, s3)
  -| diffss(s2, s4)
  -| diffss(s1, s4)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
}
blocks.pretty:
axiom df-clim(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, setvar s4) {
  ⊢ ~~> = { < s0, s1 > |(s1 ∈ ℂ ∧ ∀(s2 ∈ ℝ+, ∃(s3 ∈ ℤ, ∀(s4 ∈(ℤ≥ ` s3),((s0 ` s4)∈ ℂ ∧(abs `((s0 ` s4)[-]s1))[<]s2)))))}
  ⊣ d(s0, s3)
  ⊣ d(s0, s4)
  ⊣ d(s0, s2)
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s3, s4)
  ⊣ d(s2, s3)
  ⊣ d(s1, s3)
  ⊣ d(s2, s4)
  ⊣ d(s1, s4)
  ⊣ d(s1, s2)
}

blocks.name: df-rlim
blocks.content: Define the limit relation for partial functions on the reals. See ~ rlim for its relational expression. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 16-Sep-2014.)
blocks.origin:
axiom df-rlim(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, setvar s4) {
  |- wceq(crli, copab(s0, s1, wa(wa(wcel(cv(s0), co(cc, cpm, cr)), wcel(cv(s1), cc)), wral(s2, crp, wrex(s3, cr, wral(s4, cdm(cv(s0)), wi(wbr(cv(s3), cle, cv(s4)), wbr(cfv(cabs, co(cfv(cv(s0), cv(s4)), cmin, cv(s1))), clt, cv(s2)))))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s4)
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s0, s3)
  -| diffss(s1, s4)
  -| diffss(s2, s4)
  -| diffss(s3, s4)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s3)
  -| diffss(s2, s3)
}
blocks.pretty:
axiom df-rlim(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, setvar s4) {
  ⊢ ~~>r = { < s0, s1 > |((s0 ∈(ℂ[p↦]ℝ)∧ s1 ∈ ℂ)∧ ∀(s2 ∈ ℝ+, ∃(s3 ∈ ℝ, ∀(s4 ∈ dom(s0),(s3[≤]s4 →(abs `((s0 ` s4)[-]s1))[<]s2)))))}
  ⊣ d(s0, s4)
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, s2)
  ⊣ d(s0, s3)
  ⊣ d(s1, s4)
  ⊣ d(s2, s4)
  ⊣ d(s3, s4)
  ⊣ d(s1, s2)
  ⊣ d(s1, s3)
  ⊣ d(s2, s3)
}

blocks.name: df-o1
blocks.content: Define the set of eventually bounded functions. We don't bother to build the full conception of big-O notation, because we can represent any big-O in terms of ` O(1) ` and division, and any little-O in terms of a limit and division. We could also use limsup for this, but it only works on integer sequences, while this will work for real sequences or integer sequences. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 15-Sep-2014.)
blocks.origin:
axiom df-o1(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3) {
  |- wceq(co1, crab(s0, co(cc, cpm, cr), wrex(s1, cr, wrex(s2, cr, wral(s3, cin(cdm(cv(s0)), co(cv(s1), cico, cpnf)), wbr(cfv(cabs, cfv(cv(s0), cv(s3))), cle, cv(s2)))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s3)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffss(s2, s3)
  -| diffss(s1, s3)
}

blocks.name: df-lo1
blocks.content: Define the set of eventually upper bounded real functions. This fills a gap in ` O(1) ` coverage, to express statements like ` f ( x ) <_ g ( x ) + O ( x ) ` via ` ( x e. RR+ |-> ( f ( x ) - g ( x ) ) / x ) e. <_O(1) ` . (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 25-May-2016.)
blocks.origin:
axiom df-lo1(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3) {
  |- wceq(clo1, crab(s0, co(cr, cpm, cr), wrex(s1, cr, wrex(s2, cr, wral(s3, cin(cdm(cv(s0)), co(cv(s1), cico, cpnf)), wbr(cfv(cv(s0), cv(s3)), cle, cv(s2)))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s3)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffss(s2, s3)
  -| diffss(s1, s3)
}

blocks.name: climrel
blocks.content: The limit relation is a relation. (Contributed by NM, 28-Aug-2005.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 31-Jan-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm climrel() {
  |- wrel(cli)
} = {
  relopabi(hs2, hs0, cli, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cc), wral(hs3, crp, wrex(hs4, cz, wral(hs1, cfv(cuz, cv(hs4)), wa(wcel(cfv(cv(hs2), cv(hs1)), cc), wbr(cfv(cabs, co(cfv(cv(hs2), cv(hs1)), cmin, cv(hs0))), clt, cv(hs3))))))))
  df-clim(hs2, hs0, hs3, hs4, hs1)
  diff.hs2.s(hs4)
  diff.hs2.s(hs1)
  diff.hs2.s(hs3)
  diff.hs2.s(hs0)
  diff.hs4.s(hs1)
  diff.hs3.s(hs4)
  diff.hs0.s(hs4)
  diff.hs3.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.s(hs3)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm climrel() {
  ⊢ Rel(~~>)
} = {
  relopabi(hs2, hs0, cli, (hs0 ∈ ℂ ∧ ∀(hs3 ∈ ℝ+, ∃(hs4 ∈ ℤ, ∀(hs1 ∈(ℤ≥ ` hs4),((hs2 ` hs1)∈ ℂ ∧(abs `((hs2 ` hs1)[-]hs0))[<]hs3))))))
  df-clim(hs2, hs0, hs3, hs4, hs1)
  diff.hs2.s(hs4)
  diff.hs2.s(hs1)
  diff.hs2.s(hs3)
  diff.hs2.s(hs0)
  diff.hs4.s(hs1)
  diff.hs3.s(hs4)
  diff.hs0.s(hs4)
  diff.hs3.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.s(hs3)
}

blocks.name: rlimrel
blocks.content: The limit relation is a relation. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 24-Sep-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm rlimrel() {
  |- wrel(crli)
} = {
  relopabi(hs0, hs1, crli, wa(wa(wcel(cv(hs0), co(cc, cpm, cr)), wcel(cv(hs1), cc)), wral(hs4, crp, wrex(hs2, cr, wral(hs3, cdm(cv(hs0)), wi(wbr(cv(hs2), cle, cv(hs3)), wbr(cfv(cabs, co(cfv(cv(hs0), cv(hs3)), cmin, cv(hs1))), clt, cv(hs4))))))))
  df-rlim(hs0, hs1, hs4, hs2, hs3)
  diff.hs0.s(hs3)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.s(hs4)
  diff.hs0.s(hs2)
  diff.hs1.s(hs3)
  diff.hs4.s(hs3)
  diff.hs2.s(hs3)
  diff.hs1.s(hs4)
  diff.hs1.s(hs2)
  diff.hs4.s(hs2)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm rlimrel() {
  ⊢ Rel(~~>r)
} = {
  relopabi(hs0, hs1, crli, ((hs0 ∈(ℂ[p↦]ℝ)∧ hs1 ∈ ℂ)∧ ∀(hs4 ∈ ℝ+, ∃(hs2 ∈ ℝ, ∀(hs3 ∈ dom(hs0),(hs2[≤]hs3 →(abs `((hs0 ` hs3)[-]hs1))[<]hs4))))))
  df-rlim(hs0, hs1, hs4, hs2, hs3)
  diff.hs0.s(hs3)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.s(hs4)
  diff.hs0.s(hs2)
  diff.hs1.s(hs3)
  diff.hs4.s(hs3)
  diff.hs2.s(hs3)
  diff.hs1.s(hs4)
  diff.hs1.s(hs2)
  diff.hs4.s(hs2)
}

blocks.name: clim
blocks.content: Express the predicate: The limit of complex number sequence ` F ` is ` A ` , or ` F ` converges to ` A ` . This means that for any real ` x ` , no matter how small, there always exists an integer ` j ` such that the absolute difference of any later complex number in the sequence and the limit is less than ` x ` . (Contributed by NM, 28-Aug-2005.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 28-Apr-2015.)

  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c1)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
  -| diffsw(s2, w0)
} = {
  bitrd(w0, wbr(c0, cli, c1), wa(wcel(c1, cc), wral(s0, crp, wrex(s1, cz, wral(s2, cfv(cuz, cv(s1)), wa(wcel(c2, cc), wbr(cfv(cabs, co(c2, cmin, c1)), clt, cv(s0))))))), wa(wcel(c1, cc), wral(s0, crp, wrex(s1, cz, wral(s2, cfv(cuz, cv(s1)), wa(wcel(cfv(c0, cv(s2)), cc), wbr(cfv(cabs, co(cfv(c0, cv(s2)), cmin, c1)), clt, cv(s0))))))))
  pm5.21ndd(w0, wbr(c0, cli, c1), wa(wcel(c1, cc), wral(s0, crp, wrex(s1, cz, wral(s2, cfv(cuz, cv(s1)), wa(wcel(cfv(c0, cv(s2)), cc), wbr(cfv(cabs, co(cfv(c0, cv(s2)), cmin, c1)), clt, cv(s0))))))), wcel(c1, universe))

blocks.name: rlim
blocks.content: Express the predicate: The limit of complex number function ` F ` is ` C ` , or ` F ` converges to ` C ` , in the real sense. This means that for any real ` x ` , no matter how small, there always exists a number ` y ` such that the absolute difference of any number in the function beyond ` y ` and the limit is less than ` x ` . (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 16-Sep-2014.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 28-Apr-2015.)

thm climcl(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wbr(c0, cli, c1), wcel(c1, cc))
} = {
  simpld(wbr(c0, cli, c1), wcel(c1, cc), wral(hs1, crp, wrex(hs2, cz, wral(hs0, cfv(cuz, cv(hs2)), wa(wcel(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), cc), wbr(cfv(cabs, co(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), cmin, c1)), clt, cv(hs1)))))))
  ibi(wbr(c0, cli, c1), wa(wcel(c1, cc), wral(hs1, crp, wrex(hs2, cz, wral(hs0, cfv(cuz, cv(hs2)), wa(wcel(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), cc), wbr(cfv(cabs, co(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), cmin, c1)), clt, cv(hs1))))))))
  clim(hs1, hs2, hs0, c0, c1, cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), universe, wbr(c0, cli, c1))
  brrelex1i(c0, cli, c1)
  climrel()
  eqidd(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), wa(wbr(c0, cli, c1), wcel(cv(hs0), cz)))
  diff.hs1.s(hs2)
  diff.hs1.s(hs0)
  diff.hs2.s(hs0)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs2.c(c0)
  diff.hs2.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.w(wbr(c0, cli, c1))
  diff.hs2.w(wbr(c0, cli, c1))
  diff.hs0.w(wbr(c0, cli, c1))
}

thm climcl(class c0, class c1) {
  ⊢ (c0[~~>]c1 → c1 ∈ ℂ)
} = {
  simpld(c0[~~>]c1, c1 ∈ ℂ, ∀(hs1 ∈ ℝ+, ∃(hs2 ∈ ℤ, ∀(hs0 ∈(ℤ≥ ` hs2),((c0 ` hs0)∈ ℂ ∧(abs `((c0 ` hs0)[-]c1))[<]hs1)))))
  ibi(c0[~~>]c1, (c1 ∈ ℂ ∧ ∀(hs1 ∈ ℝ+, ∃(hs2 ∈ ℤ, ∀(hs0 ∈(ℤ≥ ` hs2),((c0 ` hs0)∈ ℂ ∧(abs `((c0 ` hs0)[-]c1))[<]hs1))))))
  clim(hs1, hs2, hs0, c0, c1, (c0 ` hs0), universe, c0[~~>]c1)
  brrelex1i(c0, cli, c1)
  climrel()
  eqidd((c0 ` hs0), (c0[~~>]c1 ∧ hs0 ∈ ℤ))
  diff.hs1.s(hs2)
  diff.hs1.s(hs0)
  diff.hs2.s(hs0)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs2.c(c0)
  diff.hs2.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.w(c0[~~>]c1)
  diff.hs2.w(c0[~~>]c1)
  diff.hs0.w(c0[~~>]c1)
}

  df-rlim(hs0, hs1, hs4, hs2, hs3)

  dmss(crli, cxp(co(cc, cpm, cr), cc))
  dmxpss(co(cc, cpm, cr), cc)
  releldmi(c0, crli, c1)
  rlimrel()
  diff.hs0.s(hs3)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)

  df-rlim(hs0, hs1, hs4, hs2, hs3)
  opabssxp(hs0, hs1, (ℂ[p↦]ℝ), cc, ∀(hs4 ∈ ℝ+, ∃(hs2 ∈ ℝ, ∀(hs3 ∈ dom(hs0),(hs2[≤]hs3 →(abs `((hs0 ` hs3)[-]hs1))[<]hs4)))))
  dmss(crli, ((ℂ[p↦]ℝ)× ℂ))
  dmxpss((ℂ[p↦]ℝ), cc)
  releldmi(c0, crli, c1)
  rlimrel()
  diff.hs0.s(hs3)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.s(hs4)
  diff.hs0.s(hs2)
  diff.hs1.s(hs3)
  diff.hs4.s(hs3)
  diff.hs2.s(hs3)
  diff.hs1.s(hs4)

thm climi(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 → ∃(s0 ∈ c0, ∀(s1 ∈(ℤ≥ ` s0),(c1 ∈ ℂ ∧(abs `(c1[-]c2))[<]c3))))
  ⊣ c0 =(ℤ≥ ` c4)
  ⊣ (w0 → c4 ∈ ℤ)
  ⊣ (w0 → c3 ∈ ℝ+)
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ s1 ∈ c0)→(c5 ` s1)= c1)
  ⊣ (w0 → c5[~~>]c2)
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c3)
  ⊣ d(s0, c4)
  ⊣ d(s0, c5)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c2)
  ⊣ d(s1, c3)
  ⊣ d(s1, c5)
  ⊣ d(s0, w0)
  ⊣ d(s1, w0)
} = {
  rspcdva(hs0, c3, crp, w0, ∃(s0 ∈ c0, ∀(s1 ∈(ℤ≥ ` s0),(c1 ∈ ℂ ∧(abs `(c1[-]c2))[<]c3))), ∃(s0 ∈ c0, ∀(s1 ∈(ℤ≥ ` s0),(c1 ∈ ℂ ∧(abs `(c1[-]c2))[<]hs0))))
  rexralbidv(s0, s1, c0, (ℤ≥ ` s0), hs0 = c3, (c1 ∈ ℂ ∧(abs `(c1[-]c2))[<]hs0), (c1 ∈ ℂ ∧(abs `(c1[-]c2))[<]c3))
  anbi2d(hs0 = c3, c1 ∈ ℂ, (abs `(c1[-]c2))[<]hs0, (abs `(c1[-]c2))[<]c3)
  breq2(hs0, c3, (abs `(c1[-]c2)), clt)
  simprd(w0, ∀(hs0 ∈ ℝ+, ∃(s0 ∈ c0, ∀(s1 ∈(ℤ≥ ` s0),(c1 ∈ ℂ ∧(abs `(c1[-]c2))[<]hs0)))), c2 ∈ ℂ)
  mpbid(w0, (c2 ∈ ℂ ∧ ∀(hs0 ∈ ℝ+, ∃(s0 ∈ c0, ∀(s1 ∈(ℤ≥ ` s0),(c1 ∈ ℂ ∧(abs `(c1[-]c2))[<]hs0))))), c5[~~>]c2)
  clim2(hs0, s0, s1, c5, c2, c0, c1, c4, universe, w0)
  syl(w0, c5 ∈ 𝕌, c5[~~>]c2)
  brrelex1i(c5, cli, c2)
  climrel()
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.c(crp)
  diff.hs0.w(∃(s0 ∈ c0, ∀(s1 ∈(ℤ≥ ` s0),(c1 ∈ ℂ ∧(abs `(c1[-]c2))[<]c3))))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, hs0, c3)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.wceq.s(s1, hs0, c3)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.hs0.c(c5)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
}

  diff.hs1.c(c2)

thm lo1bdd(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1) {

  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c1)
} = {
  mpbid(wa(wcel(c0, clo1), wf(c0, c1, cr)), wrex(s0, cr, wrex(s1, cr, wral(s2, c1, wi(wbr(cv(s0), cle, cv(s2)), wbr(cfv(c0, cv(s2)), cle, cv(s1)))))), wcel(c0, clo1))

  syl2anc(wa(wcel(c0, clo1), wf(c0, c1, cr)), wb(wcel(c0, clo1), wrex(s0, cr, wrex(s1, cr, wral(s2, c1, wi(wbr(cv(s0), cle, cv(s2)), wbr(cfv(c0, cv(s2)), cle, cv(s1))))))), wf(c0, c1, cr), wss(c1, cr))
  simpr(wcel(c0, clo1), wf(c0, c1, cr))
  eqsstr3d(c1, cr, cdm(c0), wa(wcel(c0, clo1), wf(c0, c1, cr)))

blocks.name: ello1d
blocks.content: Sufficient condition for elementhood in the set of eventually upper bounded functions. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 26-May-2016.)
blocks.origin:
thm ello1d(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), clo1))
  -| wi(w0, wss(c0, cr))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(c1, cr))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, cr))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, cr))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wbr(c2, cle, cv(s0)))), wbr(c1, cle, c3))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
} = {
  mpbird(w0, wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), clo1), wrex(hs0, cr, wrex(hs1, cr, wral(s0, c0, wi(wbr(cv(hs0), cle, cv(s0)), wbr(c1, cle, cv(hs1)))))))
  syl3anc(w0, wrex(hs0, cr, wrex(hs1, cr, wral(s0, c0, wi(wbr(cv(hs0), cle, cv(s0)), wbr(c1, cle, cv(hs1)))))), wcel(c2, cr), wcel(c3, cr), wral(s0, c0, wi(wbr(c2, cle, cv(s0)), wbr(c1, cle, c3))))
  ralrimiva(s0, c0, w0, wi(wbr(c2, cle, cv(s0)), wbr(c1, cle, c3)))
  expr(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0), wbr(c2, cle, cv(s0)), wbr(c1, cle, c3))
  rspc2ev(hs0, hs1, c2, cr, c3, cr, wral(s0, c0, wi(wbr(c2, cle, cv(s0)), wbr(c1, cle, c3))), wral(s0, c0, wi(wbr(cv(hs0), cle, cv(s0)), wbr(c1, cle, cv(hs1)))), wral(s0, c0, wi(wbr(c2, cle, cv(s0)), wbr(c1, cle, cv(hs1)))))
  ralbidv(s0, c0, wceq(cv(hs0), c2), wi(wbr(cv(hs0), cle, cv(s0)), wbr(c1, cle, cv(hs1))), wi(wbr(c2, cle, cv(s0)), wbr(c1, cle, cv(hs1))))
  imbi1d(wceq(cv(hs0), c2), wbr(cv(hs0), cle, cv(s0)), wbr(c1, cle, cv(hs1)), wbr(c2, cle, cv(s0)))
  breq1(cv(hs0), c2, cle, cv(s0))
  ralbidv(s0, c0, wceq(cv(hs1), c3), wi(wbr(c2, cle, cv(s0)), wbr(c1, cle, cv(hs1))), wi(wbr(c2, cle, cv(s0)), wbr(c1, cle, c3)))
  imbi2d(wceq(cv(hs1), c3), wbr(c2, cle, cv(s0)), wbr(c1, cle, cv(hs1)), wbr(c1, cle, c3))
  breq2(cv(hs1), c3, c1, cle)
  ello1mpt(s0, hs0, hs1, c0, c1, w0)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(cr)
  diff.hs1.c(c2)
  diff.hs1.c(c3)
  diff.hs1.c(cr)
  diff.hs0.w(wral(s0, c0, wi(wbr(c2, cle, cv(s0)), wbr(c1, cle, cv(hs1)))))
  diff.hs1.w(wral(s0, c0, wi(wbr(c2, cle, cv(s0)), wbr(c1, cle, c3))))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, cv(hs0), c2)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diff.wceq.s(s0, cv(hs1), c3)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs1)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs1)
  diff.hs1.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.hs1.w(w0)

blocks.pretty:
thm ello1d(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 →(s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1)∈ ≤O(1))
  ⊣ (w0 → c0 ⊆ ℝ)
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c0)→ c1 ∈ ℝ)

blocks.name: elo12r
blocks.content: Sufficient condition for elementhood in the set of eventually bounded functions. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 15-Sep-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm elo12r(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(w3a(wa(wf(c0, c1, cc), wss(c1, cr)), wa(wcel(c2, cr), wcel(c3, cr)), wral(s0, c1, wi(wbr(c2, cle, cv(s0)), wbr(cfv(cabs, cfv(c0, cv(s0))), cle, c3)))), wcel(c0, co1))

} = {
  mpbird(w3a(wa(wf(c0, c1, cc), wss(c1, cr)), wa(wcel(c2, cr), wcel(c3, cr)), wral(s0, c1, wi(wbr(c2, cle, cv(s0)), wbr(cfv(cabs, cfv(c0, cv(s0))), cle, c3)))), wcel(c0, co1), wrex(hs0, cr, wrex(hs1, cr, wral(s0, c1, wi(wbr(cv(hs0), cle, cv(s0)), wbr(cfv(cabs, cfv(c0, cv(s0))), cle, cv(hs1)))))))

  3expa(wcel(c2, cr), wcel(c3, cr), wral(s0, c1, wi(wbr(c2, cle, cv(s0)), wbr(cfv(cabs, cfv(c0, cv(s0))), cle, c3))), wrex(hs0, cr, wrex(hs1, cr, wral(s0, c1, wi(wbr(cv(hs0), cle, cv(s0)), wbr(cfv(cabs, cfv(c0, cv(s0))), cle, cv(hs1)))))))
  rspc2ev(hs0, hs1, c2, cr, c3, cr, wral(s0, c1, wi(wbr(c2, cle, cv(s0)), wbr(cfv(cabs, cfv(c0, cv(s0))), cle, c3))), wral(s0, c1, wi(wbr(cv(hs0), cle, cv(s0)), wbr(cfv(cabs, cfv(c0, cv(s0))), cle, cv(hs1)))), wral(s0, c1, wi(wbr(c2, cle, cv(s0)), wbr(cfv(cabs, cfv(c0, cv(s0))), cle, cv(hs1)))))
  ralbidv(s0, c1, wceq(cv(hs0), c2), wi(wbr(cv(hs0), cle, cv(s0)), wbr(cfv(cabs, cfv(c0, cv(s0))), cle, cv(hs1))), wi(wbr(c2, cle, cv(s0)), wbr(cfv(cabs, cfv(c0, cv(s0))), cle, cv(hs1))))
  imbi1d(wceq(cv(hs0), c2), wbr(cv(hs0), cle, cv(s0)), wbr(cfv(cabs, cfv(c0, cv(s0))), cle, cv(hs1)), wbr(c2, cle, cv(s0)))
  breq1(cv(hs0), c2, cle, cv(s0))
  ralbidv(s0, c1, wceq(cv(hs1), c3), wi(wbr(c2, cle, cv(s0)), wbr(cfv(cabs, cfv(c0, cv(s0))), cle, cv(hs1))), wi(wbr(c2, cle, cv(s0)), wbr(cfv(cabs, cfv(c0, cv(s0))), cle, c3)))
  imbi2d(wceq(cv(hs1), c3), wbr(c2, cle, cv(s0)), wbr(cfv(cabs, cfv(c0, cv(s0))), cle, cv(hs1)), wbr(cfv(cabs, cfv(c0, cv(s0))), cle, c3))
  breq2(cv(hs1), c3, cfv(cabs, cfv(c0, cv(s0))), cle)
  3ad2ant1(wa(wf(c0, c1, cc), wss(c1, cr)), wa(wcel(c2, cr), wcel(c3, cr)), wral(s0, c1, wi(wbr(c2, cle, cv(s0)), wbr(cfv(cabs, cfv(c0, cv(s0))), cle, c3))), wb(wcel(c0, co1), wrex(hs0, cr, wrex(hs1, cr, wral(s0, c1, wi(wbr(cv(hs0), cle, cv(s0)), wbr(cfv(cabs, cfv(c0, cv(s0))), cle, cv(hs1))))))))
  elo12(hs0, hs1, s0, c0, c1)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)

  diff.hs1.w(wral(s0, c1, wi(wbr(c2, cle, cv(s0)), wbr(cfv(cabs, cfv(c0, cv(s0))), cle, c3))))

blocks.name: o1bdd
blocks.content: The defining property of an eventually bounded function. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 15-Sep-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm o1bdd(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, co1), wf(c0, c1, cc)), wrex(s0, cr, wrex(s1, cr, wral(s2, c1, wi(wbr(cv(s0), cle, cv(s2)), wbr(cfv(cabs, cfv(c0, cv(s2))), cle, cv(s1)))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c1)
} = {
  mpbid(wa(wcel(c0, co1), wf(c0, c1, cc)), wrex(s0, cr, wrex(s1, cr, wral(s2, c1, wi(wbr(cv(s0), cle, cv(s2)), wbr(cfv(cabs, cfv(c0, cv(s2))), cle, cv(s1)))))), wcel(c0, co1))
  simpl(wcel(c0, co1), wf(c0, c1, cc))
  syl2anc(wa(wcel(c0, co1), wf(c0, c1, cc)), wb(wcel(c0, co1), wrex(s0, cr, wrex(s1, cr, wral(s2, c1, wi(wbr(cv(s0), cle, cv(s2)), wbr(cfv(cabs, cfv(c0, cv(s2))), cle, cv(s1))))))), wf(c0, c1, cc), wss(c1, cr))
  simpr(wcel(c0, co1), wf(c0, c1, cc))
  eqsstr3d(c1, cr, cdm(c0), wa(wcel(c0, co1), wf(c0, c1, cc)))
  adantl(wcel(c0, co1), wf(c0, c1, cc), wceq(cdm(c0), c1))
  fdm(c0, c1, cc)

  o1dm(c0)
  elo12(s0, s1, s2, c0, c1)

blocks.name: lo1o1

blocks.origin:
thm lo1o1(class c0, class c1) {

} = {
  pm5.21ndd(wf(c0, c1, cc), wcel(c0, co1), wcel(ccom(cabs, c0), clo1), wss(c1, cr))

  o1dm(c0)

  syl5ib(wf(c0, c1, cc), wcel(ccom(cabs, c0), clo1), wss(c1, cr), wss(cdm(ccom(cabs, c0)), cr))
  lo1dm(ccom(cabs, c0))

  fdmd(ccom(cabs, c0), c1, cr, wf(c0, c1, cc))
  ex(wf(c0, c1, cc), wss(c1, cr), wb(wcel(c0, co1), wcel(ccom(cabs, c0), clo1)))
  3bitr4rd(wa(wf(c0, c1, cc), wss(c1, cr)), wcel(c0, co1), wcel(ccom(cabs, c0), clo1), wrex(hs0, cr, wrex(hs2, cr, wral(hs1, c1, wi(wbr(cv(hs0), cle, cv(hs1)), wbr(cfv(ccom(cabs, c0), cv(hs1)), cle, cv(hs2)))))), wrex(hs0, cr, wrex(hs2, cr, wral(hs1, c1, wi(wbr(cv(hs0), cle, cv(hs1)), wbr(cfv(cabs, cfv(c0, cv(hs1))), cle, cv(hs2)))))))
  2rexbidv(hs0, hs2, cr, cr, wa(wf(c0, c1, cc), wss(c1, cr)), wral(hs1, c1, wi(wbr(cv(hs0), cle, cv(hs1)), wbr(cfv(ccom(cabs, c0), cv(hs1)), cle, cv(hs2)))), wral(hs1, c1, wi(wbr(cv(hs0), cle, cv(hs1)), wbr(cfv(cabs, cfv(c0, cv(hs1))), cle, cv(hs2)))))
  ralbidva(hs1, c1, wa(wf(c0, c1, cc), wss(c1, cr)), wi(wbr(cv(hs0), cle, cv(hs1)), wbr(cfv(ccom(cabs, c0), cv(hs1)), cle, cv(hs2))), wi(wbr(cv(hs0), cle, cv(hs1)), wbr(cfv(cabs, cfv(c0, cv(hs1))), cle, cv(hs2))))
  imbi2d(wa(wa(wf(c0, c1, cc), wss(c1, cr)), wcel(cv(hs1), c1)), wbr(cv(hs0), cle, cv(hs1)), wbr(cfv(ccom(cabs, c0), cv(hs1)), cle, cv(hs2)), wbr(cfv(cabs, cfv(c0, cv(hs1))), cle, cv(hs2)))
  breq1d(cfv(ccom(cabs, c0), cv(hs1)), cle, cv(hs2), cfv(cabs, cfv(c0, cv(hs1))), wa(wa(wf(c0, c1, cc), wss(c1, cr)), wcel(cv(hs1), c1)))
  adantlr(wf(c0, c1, cc), wss(c1, cr), wcel(cv(hs1), c1), wceq(cfv(ccom(cabs, c0), cv(hs1)), cfv(cabs, cfv(c0, cv(hs1)))))
  fvco3(c0, c1, cc, cv(hs1), cabs)
  sylan(wf(c0, c1, cc), wss(c1, cr), wb(wcel(ccom(cabs, c0), clo1), wrex(hs0, cr, wrex(hs2, cr, wral(hs1, c1, wi(wbr(cv(hs0), cle, cv(hs1)), wbr(cfv(ccom(cabs, c0), cv(hs1)), cle, cv(hs2))))))), wf(ccom(cabs, c0), c1, cr))
  mpan(wf(c0, c1, cc), wf(ccom(cabs, c0), c1, cr), wf(cabs, cc, cr))
  absf()
  fco(cabs, cc, cr, c0, c1)
  ello12(hs0, hs2, hs1, ccom(cabs, c0), c1)
  elo12(hs0, hs2, hs1, c0, c1)
  diff.hs0.w(wa(wf(c0, c1, cc), wss(c1, cr)))
  diff.hs2.w(wa(wf(c0, c1, cc), wss(c1, cr)))
  diff.hs1.w(wa(wf(c0, c1, cc), wss(c1, cr)))
  diff.hs0.s(hs2)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs2.s(hs1)

  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs2.c(ccom(cabs, c0))

thm lo1o1(class c0, class c1) {
  ⊢ ((c0 : c1 → ℂ)→(c0 ∈ O(1)↔(abs ∘ c0)∈ ≤O(1)))
} = {
  pm5.21ndd((c0 : c1 → ℂ), c0 ∈ O(1), (abs ∘ c0)∈ ≤O(1), c1 ⊆ ℝ)
  syl5ib((c0 : c1 → ℂ), c0 ∈ O(1), c1 ⊆ ℝ, dom(c0)⊆ ℝ)
  o1dm(c0)
  sseq1d(dom(c0), cr, c1, (c0 : c1 → ℂ))
  fdm(c0, c1, cc)
  syl5ib((c0 : c1 → ℂ), (abs ∘ c0)∈ ≤O(1), c1 ⊆ ℝ, dom((abs ∘ c0))⊆ ℝ)
  lo1dm((abs ∘ c0))
  sseq1d(dom((abs ∘ c0)), cr, c1, (c0 : c1 → ℂ))
  fdmd((abs ∘ c0), c1, cr, (c0 : c1 → ℂ))
  ex((c0 : c1 → ℂ), c1 ⊆ ℝ, (c0 ∈ O(1)↔(abs ∘ c0)∈ ≤O(1)))
  3bitr4rd(((c0 : c1 → ℂ)∧ c1 ⊆ ℝ), c0 ∈ O(1), (abs ∘ c0)∈ ≤O(1), ∃(hs0 ∈ ℝ, ∃(hs2 ∈ ℝ, ∀(hs1 ∈ c1,(hs0[≤]hs1 →((abs ∘ c0)` hs1)[≤]hs2)))), ∃(hs0 ∈ ℝ, ∃(hs2 ∈ ℝ, ∀(hs1 ∈ c1,(hs0[≤]hs1 →(abs `(c0 ` hs1))[≤]hs2)))))
  2rexbidv(hs0, hs2, cr, cr, ((c0 : c1 → ℂ)∧ c1 ⊆ ℝ), ∀(hs1 ∈ c1,(hs0[≤]hs1 →((abs ∘ c0)` hs1)[≤]hs2)), ∀(hs1 ∈ c1,(hs0[≤]hs1 →(abs `(c0 ` hs1))[≤]hs2)))
  ralbidva(hs1, c1, ((c0 : c1 → ℂ)∧ c1 ⊆ ℝ), (hs0[≤]hs1 →((abs ∘ c0)` hs1)[≤]hs2), (hs0[≤]hs1 →(abs `(c0 ` hs1))[≤]hs2))
  imbi2d((((c0 : c1 → ℂ)∧ c1 ⊆ ℝ)∧ hs1 ∈ c1), hs0[≤]hs1, ((abs ∘ c0)` hs1)[≤]hs2, (abs `(c0 ` hs1))[≤]hs2)
  breq1d(((abs ∘ c0)` hs1), cle, hs2, (abs `(c0 ` hs1)), (((c0 : c1 → ℂ)∧ c1 ⊆ ℝ)∧ hs1 ∈ c1))
  adantlr((c0 : c1 → ℂ), c1 ⊆ ℝ, hs1 ∈ c1, ((abs ∘ c0)` hs1)=(abs `(c0 ` hs1)))
  fvco3(c0, c1, cc, hs1, cabs)
  sylan((c0 : c1 → ℂ), c1 ⊆ ℝ, ((abs ∘ c0)∈ ≤O(1)↔ ∃(hs0 ∈ ℝ, ∃(hs2 ∈ ℝ, ∀(hs1 ∈ c1,(hs0[≤]hs1 →((abs ∘ c0)` hs1)[≤]hs2))))), ((abs ∘ c0): c1 → ℝ))
  mpan((c0 : c1 → ℂ), ((abs ∘ c0): c1 → ℝ), (abs : ℂ → ℝ))
  absf()
  fco(cabs, cc, cr, c0, c1)
  ello12(hs0, hs2, hs1, (abs ∘ c0), c1)
  elo12(hs0, hs2, hs1, c0, c1)
  diff.hs0.w(((c0 : c1 → ℂ)∧ c1 ⊆ ℝ))
  diff.hs2.w(((c0 : c1 → ℂ)∧ c1 ⊆ ℝ))
  diff.hs1.w(((c0 : c1 → ℂ)∧ c1 ⊆ ℝ))

blocks.name: lo1o12
blocks.content: A function is eventually bounded iff its absolute value is eventually upper bounded. (This function is useful for converting theorems about ` <_O(1) ` to ` O(1) ` .) (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 26-May-2016.)
blocks.origin:
thm lo1o12(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wb(wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), co1), wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, cfv(cabs, c1)), clo1)))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(c1, cc))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
} = {
  bitrd(w0, wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), co1), wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, cfv(cabs, c1)), clo1), wcel(ccom(cabs, cmpt(s0, c0, c1)), clo1))
  syl(w0, wb(wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), co1), wcel(ccom(cabs, cmpt(s0, c0, c1)), clo1)), wf(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), c0, cc))
  fmpttd(s0, c0, c1, cc, w0)
  lo1o1(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), c0)
  eleq1d(ccom(cabs, cmpt(s0, c0, c1)), clo1, cmpt(s0, c0, cfv(cabs, c1)), w0)
  cofmpt(s0, cabs, c0, c1, cc, cr, w0)
  a1i(w0, wf(cabs, cc, cr))
  absf()
  diff.cc.s(s0)
  diff.cabs.s(s0)
}

thm lo1o12(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, wff w0) {

blocks.name: o1lo12
blocks.content: A lower bounded real function is eventually bounded iff it is eventually upper bounded. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 26-May-2016.)
blocks.origin:
thm o1lo12(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {

  pm5.21ndd(w0, wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), co1), wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), clo1), wss(cdm(cmpt(s0, c0, c1)), cr))

  o1dm(cmpt(s0, c0, c1))
  a1i(w0, wi(wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), clo1), wss(cdm(cmpt(s0, c0, c1)), cr)))
  lo1dm(cmpt(s0, c0, c1))
  sylbid(w0, wss(cdm(cmpt(s0, c0, c1)), cr), wb(wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), co1), wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), clo1)), wss(c0, cr))
  sseq1d(cdm(cmpt(s0, c0, c1)), cr, c0, w0)
  syl(w0, wceq(cdm(cmpt(s0, c0, c1)), c0), wral(s0, c0, wcel(c1, cr)))
  ralrimiva(s0, c0, w0, wcel(c1, cr))
  dmmptg(s0, c0, c1, cr)
  ex(w0, wss(c0, cr), wb(wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), co1), wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), clo1)))
  syldan(w0, wss(c0, cr), wb(wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), co1), wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), clo1)), wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, cneg(c1)), clo1))
  ello1d(s0, c0, cneg(c1), c2, cneg(c2), wa(w0, wss(c0, cr)))
  simpr(w0, wss(c0, cr))
  adantlr(w0, wss(c0, cr), wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cneg(c1), cr))

  renegcld(c2, wa(w0, wss(c0, cr)))

  rbaibd(w0, wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, cneg(c1)), clo1), wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), co1), wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), clo1))
  o1lo1(s0, c0, c1, w0)
  diff.cneg.s(s0, c2)

blocks.pretty:
thm o1lo12(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 →((s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1)∈ O(1)↔(s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1)∈ ≤O(1)))
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c0)→ c1 ∈ ℝ)
  ⊣ (w0 → c2 ∈ ℝ)
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c0)→ c2[≤]c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
  ⊣ d(s0, w0)
} = {
  pm5.21ndd(w0, (s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1)∈ O(1), (s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1)∈ ≤O(1), dom((s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1))⊆ ℝ)
  a1i(w0, ((s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1)∈ O(1)→ dom((s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1))⊆ ℝ))
  o1dm((s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1))
  a1i(w0, ((s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1)∈ ≤O(1)→ dom((s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1))⊆ ℝ))
  lo1dm((s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1))
  sylbid(w0, dom((s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1))⊆ ℝ, ((s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1)∈ O(1)↔(s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1)∈ ≤O(1)), c0 ⊆ ℝ)
  sseq1d(dom((s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1)), cr, c0, w0)
  syl(w0, dom((s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1))= c0, ∀(s0 ∈ c0, c1 ∈ ℝ))
  ralrimiva(s0, c0, w0, c1 ∈ ℝ)
  dmmptg(s0, c0, c1, cr)
  ex(w0, c0 ⊆ ℝ, ((s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1)∈ O(1)↔(s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1)∈ ≤O(1)))
  syldan(w0, c0 ⊆ ℝ, ((s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1)∈ O(1)↔(s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1)∈ ≤O(1)), (s0 ∈ c0 ↦ -u(c1))∈ ≤O(1))
  ello1d(s0, c0, -u(c1), c2, -u(c2), (w0 ∧ c0 ⊆ ℝ))
  simpr(w0, c0 ⊆ ℝ)
  adantlr(w0, c0 ⊆ ℝ, s0 ∈ c0, -u(c1)∈ ℝ)
  renegcld(c1, (w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c0))
  renegcld(c2, (w0 ∧ c0 ⊆ ℝ))
  adantr(w0, c0 ⊆ ℝ, c2 ∈ ℝ)
  ad2ant2r(w0, c0 ⊆ ℝ, s0 ∈ c0, c2[≤]s0, -u(c1)[≤]-u(c2))
  mpbid((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c0), -u(c1)[≤]-u(c2), c2[≤]c1)
  lenegd(c2, c1, (w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c0))
  adantr(w0, s0 ∈ c0, c2 ∈ ℝ)
  rbaibd(w0, (s0 ∈ c0 ↦ -u(c1))∈ ≤O(1), (s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1)∈ O(1), (s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1)∈ ≤O(1))
  o1lo1(s0, c0, c1, w0)
  diff.cneg.s(s0, c2)
  diff.wa.s(s0, w0, c0 ⊆ ℝ)
  diff.wss.s(s0, c0, cr)
  diff.cr.s(s0)
}

blocks.name: o1lo1d
blocks.content: A real eventually bounded function is eventually upper bounded. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 26-May-2016.)

blocks.name: icco1
blocks.content: Derive eventual boundedness from separate upper and lower eventual bounds. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 15-Apr-2016.)

thm icco1(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), co1))
  -| wi(w0, wss(c0, cr))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(c1, cr))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, cr))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, cr))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c4, cr))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wbr(c2, cle, cv(s0)))), wcel(c1, co(c3, cicc, c4)))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
} = {
  mpbir2and(w0, wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), co1), wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), clo1), wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, cneg(c1)), clo1))
  ello1d(s0, c0, c1, c2, c4, w0)
  simp3d(wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wbr(c2, cle, cv(s0)))), wbr(c1, cle, c4), wcel(c1, cr), wbr(c3, cle, c1))
  ello1d(s0, c0, cneg(c1), c2, cneg(c3), w0)
  renegcld(c1, wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)))
  renegcld(c3, w0)
  mpbid(wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wbr(c2, cle, cv(s0)))), wbr(cneg(c1), cle, cneg(c3)), wbr(c3, cle, c1))
  simp2d(wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wbr(c2, cle, cv(s0)))), wbr(c3, cle, c1), wcel(c1, cr), wbr(c1, cle, c4))
  mpbid(wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wbr(c2, cle, cv(s0)))), w3a(wcel(c1, cr), wbr(c3, cle, c1), wbr(c1, cle, c4)), wcel(c1, co(c3, cicc, c4)))
  adantr(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wbr(c2, cle, cv(s0))), wb(wcel(c1, co(c3, cicc, c4)), w3a(wcel(c1, cr), wbr(c3, cle, c1), wbr(c1, cle, c4))))
  syl2anc(w0, wb(wcel(c1, co(c3, cicc, c4)), w3a(wcel(c1, cr), wbr(c3, cle, c1), wbr(c1, cle, c4))), wcel(c3, cr), wcel(c4, cr))
  elicc2(c3, c4, c1)
  lenegd(c3, c1, wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wbr(c2, cle, cv(s0)))))
  adantr(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wbr(c2, cle, cv(s0))), wcel(c3, cr))
  adantrr(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0), wbr(c2, cle, cv(s0)), wcel(c1, cr))
  o1lo1(s0, c0, c1, w0)
  diff.cneg.s(s0, c3)
}

blocks.name: o1bdd2
blocks.content: If an eventually bounded function is bounded on every interval ` A i^i ( -oo , y ) ` by a function ` M ( y ) ` , then the function is bounded on the whole domain. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 9-Apr-2016.) (Proof shortened by Mario Carneiro, 26-May-2016.)
blocks.origin:
thm o1bdd2(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wrex(s0, cr, wral(s1, c0, wbr(cfv(cabs, c1), cle, cv(s0)))))
  -| wi(w0, wss(c0, cr))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, cr))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s1), c0)), wcel(c1, cc))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(cmpt(s1, c0, c1), co1))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s2), cr), wbr(c2, cle, cv(s2)))), wcel(c3, cr))
  -| wi(wa(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s1), c0)), wa(wa(wcel(cv(s2), cr), wbr(c2, cle, cv(s2))), wbr(cv(s1), clt, cv(s2)))), wbr(cfv(cabs, c1), cle, c3))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c3)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c1)
  -| diffsc(s2, c2)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
  -| diffsw(s2, w0)
} = {
  lo1bdd2(s0, s1, s2, c0, cfv(cabs, c1), c2, c3, w0)
  abscld(c1, wa(w0, wcel(cv(s1), c0)))
  mpbid(w0, wcel(cmpt(s1, c0, cfv(cabs, c1)), clo1), wcel(cmpt(s1, c0, c1), co1))
  lo1o12(s1, c0, c1, w0)
  diff.cfv.s(s0, cabs, c1)
  diff.cabs.s(s0)
  diff.cfv.s(s2, cabs, c1)
  diff.cabs.s(s2)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm o1bdd2(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 → ∃(s0 ∈ ℝ, ∀(s1 ∈ c0,(abs ` c1)[≤]s0)))
  ⊣ (w0 → c0 ⊆ ℝ)
  ⊣ (w0 → c2 ∈ ℝ)
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ s1 ∈ c0)→ c1 ∈ ℂ)
  ⊣ (w0 →(s1 ∈ c0 ↦ c1)∈ O(1))
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧(s2 ∈ ℝ ∧ c2[≤]s2))→ c3 ∈ ℝ)
  ⊣ (((w0 ∧ s1 ∈ c0)∧((s2 ∈ ℝ ∧ c2[≤]s2)∧ s1[<]s2))→(abs ` c1)[≤]c3)
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, s2)
  ⊣ d(s1, s2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c3)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c2)
  ⊣ d(s1, c3)
  ⊣ d(s2, c0)
  ⊣ d(s2, c1)
  ⊣ d(s2, c2)
  ⊣ d(s1, w0)
  ⊣ d(s2, w0)
} = {
  lo1bdd2(s0, s1, s2, c0, (abs ` c1), c2, c3, w0)
  abscld(c1, (w0 ∧ s1 ∈ c0))
  mpbid(w0, (s1 ∈ c0 ↦(abs ` c1))∈ ≤O(1), (s1 ∈ c0 ↦ c1)∈ O(1))
  lo1o12(s1, c0, c1, w0)
  diff.cfv.s(s0, cabs, c1)
  diff.cabs.s(s0)
  diff.cfv.s(s2, cabs, c1)
  diff.cabs.s(s2)
}

blocks.name: rlimclim
blocks.content: A sequence on an upper integer set converges in the real sense iff it converges in the integer sense. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 16-Sep-2014.)
blocks.origin:

} = {

blocks.name: climrlim2
blocks.content: Produce a real limit from an integer limit, where the real function is only dependent on the integer part of ` x ` . (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 2-May-2016.)

} = {

  simpl(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cz))

blocks.name: rlimdm
blocks.content: Two ways to express that a function has a limit. (The expression ` ( ~~>r `` F ) ` is sometimes useful as a shorthand for "the unique limit of the function ` F ` "). (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 8-May-2016.)

  |- wi(w0, wb(wcel(c0, cdm(crli)), wbr(c0, crli, cfv(crli, c0))))

} = {
  impbid1(w0, wcel(c0, cdm(crli)), wbr(c0, crli, cfv(crli, c0)))

  df-fv(hs1, crli, c0)

  adantr(wa(w0, wbr(c0, crli, cv(hs0))), wcel(cv(hs0), universe), wb(wbr(c0, crli, cv(hs1)), wceq(cv(hs1), cv(hs0))))

thm rlimdm(class c0, class c1, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 →(c0 ∈ dom(~~>r)↔ c0[~~>r](~~>r ` c0)))
  ⊣ (w0 →(c0 : c1 → ℂ))
  ⊣ (w0 → sup(c1, ℝ*, <)= +∞)
} = {
  impbid1(w0, c0 ∈ dom(~~>r), c0[~~>r](~~>r ` c0))
  syl5(w0, c0 ∈ dom(~~>r), c0[~~>r](~~>r ` c0), ∃(hs0, c0[~~>r]hs0))
  ibi(c0 ∈ dom(~~>r), ∃(hs0, c0[~~>r]hs0))
  eldmg(hs0, c0, dom(~~>r), crli)
  exlimdv(hs0, w0, c0[~~>r]hs0, c0[~~>r](~~>r ` c0))

  syl5eq((~~>r ` c0), hs0, iota(hs1, c0[~~>r]hs1), (w0 ∧ c0[~~>r]hs0))
  df-fv(hs1, crli, c0)

  iota5(hs1, hs0, universe, (w0 ∧ c0[~~>r]hs0), c0[~~>r]hs1)
  adantr((w0 ∧ c0[~~>r]hs0), hs0 ∈ 𝕌, (c0[~~>r]hs1 ↔ hs1 = hs0))
  impbid((w0 ∧ c0[~~>r]hs0), c0[~~>r]hs1, hs1 = hs0)
  expr(w0, c0[~~>r]hs0, c0[~~>r]hs1, hs1 = hs0)
  rlimuni(hs1, hs0, c0, c1, (w0 ∧(c0[~~>r]hs0 ∧ c0[~~>r]hs1)))
  adantr(w0, (c0[~~>r]hs0 ∧ c0[~~>r]hs1), (c0 : c1 → ℂ))
  adantr(w0, (c0[~~>r]hs0 ∧ c0[~~>r]hs1), sup(c1, ℝ*, <)= +∞)
  simprr(w0, c0[~~>r]hs0, c0[~~>r]hs1)
  simprl(w0, c0[~~>r]hs0, c0[~~>r]hs1)
  syl5ibrcom((w0 ∧ c0[~~>r]hs0), hs1 = hs0, c0[~~>r]hs1, c0[~~>r]hs0)
  simpr(w0, c0[~~>r]hs0)

blocks.name: fclim
blocks.content: The limit relation is function-like, and with range the complex numbers. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 31-Jan-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm fclim() {
  |- wf(cli, cdm(cli), cc)
} = {
  mpbir2an(wf(cli, cdm(cli), cc), wfn(cli, cdm(cli)), wss(crn(cli), cc))
  mpbi(wfn(cli, cdm(cli)), wfun(cli))
  mpbir2an(wfun(cli), wrel(cli), wal(hs0, wal(hs1, wal(hs2, wi(wa(wbr(cv(hs0), cli, cv(hs1)), wbr(cv(hs0), cli, cv(hs2))), wceq(cv(hs1), cv(hs2)))))))
  climrel()
  ax-gen(hs0, wal(hs1, wal(hs2, wi(wa(wbr(cv(hs0), cli, cv(hs1)), wbr(cv(hs0), cli, cv(hs2))), wceq(cv(hs1), cv(hs2))))))
  ax-gen(hs1, wal(hs2, wi(wa(wbr(cv(hs0), cli, cv(hs1)), wbr(cv(hs0), cli, cv(hs2))), wceq(cv(hs1), cv(hs2)))))
  ax-gen(hs2, wi(wa(wbr(cv(hs0), cli, cv(hs1)), wbr(cv(hs0), cli, cv(hs2))), wceq(cv(hs1), cv(hs2))))
  climuni(cv(hs0), cv(hs1), cv(hs2))
  dffun2(hs0, hs1, hs2, cli)
  funfn(cli)
  ssriv(hs1, crn(cli), cc)
  sylbi(wcel(cv(hs1), crn(cli)), wcel(cv(hs1), cc), wex(hs0, wbr(cv(hs0), cli, cv(hs1))))
  elrn(hs0, cv(hs1), cli)
  vex(hs1)
  exlimiv(hs0, wbr(cv(hs0), cli, cv(hs1)), wcel(cv(hs1), cc))
  climcl(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))
  df-f(cli, cdm(cli), cc)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)

thm lo1res(class c0, class c1) {

} = {

  mpdan(c0 ∈ ≤O(1), ∃(hs0 ∈ ℝ, ∃(hs2 ∈ ℝ, ∀(hs1 ∈ dom(c0),(hs0[≤]hs1 →(c0 ` hs1)[≤]hs2)))), (c0 : dom(c0)→ ℝ))
  lo1bdd(hs0, hs2, hs1, c0, dom(c0))
  reximi(hs0, cr, ∃(hs2 ∈ ℝ, ∀(hs1 ∈ dom(c0),(hs0[≤]hs1 →(c0 ` hs1)[≤]hs2))), ∃(hs2 ∈ ℝ, ∀(hs1 ∈(dom(c0)⋂ c1),(hs0[≤]hs1 →((c0 |` c1)` hs1)[≤]hs2))))
  reximi(hs2, cr, ∀(hs1 ∈ dom(c0),(hs0[≤]hs1 →(c0 ` hs1)[≤]hs2)), ∀(hs1 ∈(dom(c0)⋂ c1),(hs0[≤]hs1 →((c0 |` c1)` hs1)[≤]hs2)))
  sylibr(∀(hs1 ∈ dom(c0),(hs0[≤]hs1 →(c0 ` hs1)[≤]hs2)), ∀(hs1 ∈(dom(c0)⋂ c1),(hs0[≤]hs1 →((c0 |` c1)` hs1)[≤]hs2)), ∀(hs1 ∈(dom(c0)⋂ c1),(hs0[≤]hs1 →(c0 ` hs1)[≤]hs2)))

  elinel2(hs1, dom(c0), c1)
  syl2anc(c0 ∈ ≤O(1), ((c0 |` c1)∈ ≤O(1)↔ ∃(hs0 ∈ ℝ, ∃(hs2 ∈ ℝ, ∀(hs1 ∈(dom(c0)⋂ c1),(hs0[≤]hs1 →((c0 |` c1)` hs1)[≤]hs2))))), ((c0 |` c1):(dom(c0)⋂ c1)→ ℝ), (dom(c0)⋂ c1)⊆ ℝ)

  fssres(c0, dom(c0), cr, (dom(c0)⋂ c1))

blocks.name: o1res
blocks.content: The restriction of an eventually bounded function is eventually bounded. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 15-Sep-2014.) (Proof shortened by Mario Carneiro, 26-May-2016.)
blocks.origin:

} = {

  syl(wcel(c0, co1), wb(wcel(c0, co1), wcel(ccom(cabs, c0), clo1)), wf(c0, cdm(c0), cc))
  lo1o1(c0, cdm(c0))

  o1f(c0)

blocks.name: rlimres2
blocks.content: The restriction of a function converges if the original converges. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 16-Sep-2014.)

blocks.name: lo1resb
blocks.content: The restriction of a function to an unbounded-above interval is eventually upper bounded iff the original is eventually upper bounded. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 26-May-2016.)

  ⊣ d(s0, c2)

  reseq1(cres(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), c0), cmpt(s0, c0, c1), co(c3, cico, cpnf))
  mp2b(wceq(cres(cres(cmpt(s0, c0, c2), c0), co(c3, cico, cpnf)), cres(cmpt(s0, c0, c2), co(c3, cico, cpnf))), wss(c0, c0), wceq(cres(cmpt(s0, c0, c2), c0), cmpt(s0, c0, c2)))
  ssid(c0)
  resmpt(s0, c0, c0, c2)
  reseq1(cres(cmpt(s0, c0, c2), c0), cmpt(s0, c0, c2), co(c3, cico, cpnf))
  lo1resb(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), c3, c0, wa(w0, wss(c0, cr)))
  adantr(w0, wss(c0, cr), wf(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), c0, cr))

  diff.cico.s(s0)
  diff.cpnf.s(s0)

blocks.name: rlimeq
blocks.content: Two functions that are eventually equal to one another have the same limit. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 16-Sep-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm rlimeq(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wb(wbr(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), crli, c2), wbr(cmpt(s0, c0, c3), crli, c2)))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(c1, cc))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(c3, cc))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c4, cr))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wbr(c4, cle, cv(s0)))), wceq(c1, c3))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
} = {
  pm5.21ndd(w0, wbr(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), crli, c2), wbr(cmpt(s0, c0, c3), crli, c2), wss(c0, cr))
  syl5ib(w0, wbr(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), crli, c2), wss(c0, cr), wss(cdm(cmpt(s0, c0, c1)), cr))
  rlimss(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), c2)
  sseq1d(cdm(cmpt(s0, c0, c1)), cr, c0, w0)
  dmmptd(s0, cmpt(s0, c0, c1), c0, c1, cc, w0)
  eqid(cmpt(s0, c0, c1))
  syl5ib(w0, wbr(cmpt(s0, c0, c3), crli, c2), wss(c0, cr), wss(cdm(cmpt(s0, c0, c3)), cr))
  rlimss(cmpt(s0, c0, c3), c2)
  sseq1d(cdm(cmpt(s0, c0, c3)), cr, c0, w0)
  dmmptd(s0, cmpt(s0, c0, c3), c0, c3, cc, w0)
  eqid(cmpt(s0, c0, c3))
  ex(w0, wss(c0, cr), wb(wbr(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), crli, c2), wbr(cmpt(s0, c0, c3), crli, c2)))
  3bitr4d(wa(w0, wss(c0, cr)), wbr(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), crli, c2), wbr(cmpt(s0, c0, c3), crli, c2), wbr(cres(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), co(c4, cico, cpnf)), crli, c2), wbr(cres(cmpt(s0, c0, c3), co(c4, cico, cpnf)), crli, c2))
  adantr(w0, wss(c0, cr), wb(wbr(cres(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), co(c4, cico, cpnf)), crli, c2), wbr(cres(cmpt(s0, c0, c3), co(c4, cico, cpnf)), crli, c2)))
  breq1d(cres(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), co(c4, cico, cpnf)), crli, c2, cres(cmpt(s0, c0, c3), co(c4, cico, cpnf)), w0)
  3eqtr3g(cres(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), co(c4, cico, cpnf)), cres(cmpt(s0, c0, c3), co(c4, cico, cpnf)), cres(cres(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), c0), co(c4, cico, cpnf)), cres(cres(cmpt(s0, c0, c3), c0), co(c4, cico, cpnf)), w0)
  3eqtr4g(cres(cres(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), c0), co(c4, cico, cpnf)), cres(cres(cmpt(s0, c0, c3), c0), co(c4, cico, cpnf)), cres(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), cin(c0, co(c4, cico, cpnf))), cres(cmpt(s0, c0, c3), cin(c0, co(c4, cico, cpnf))), w0)
  3eqtr4g(cres(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), cin(c0, co(c4, cico, cpnf))), cres(cmpt(s0, c0, c3), cin(c0, co(c4, cico, cpnf))), cmpt(s0, cin(c0, co(c4, cico, cpnf)), c1), cmpt(s0, cin(c0, co(c4, cico, cpnf)), c3), w0)
  mpteq2dva(s0, cin(c0, co(c4, cico, cpnf)), c1, c3, w0)
  syldan(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cin(c0, co(c4, cico, cpnf))), wceq(c1, c3), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wbr(c4, cle, cv(s0))))
  jca(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cin(c0, co(c4, cico, cpnf)))), wcel(cv(s0), c0), wbr(c4, cle, cv(s0)))
  simpld(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cin(c0, co(c4, cico, cpnf)))), wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s0), co(c4, cico, cpnf)))
  simprd(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cin(c0, co(c4, cico, cpnf)))), wbr(c4, cle, cv(s0)), wcel(cv(s0), cr))
  syldan(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cin(c0, co(c4, cico, cpnf))), wa(wcel(cv(s0), cr), wbr(c4, cle, cv(s0))), wcel(cv(s0), co(c4, cico, cpnf)))
  simprd(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cin(c0, co(c4, cico, cpnf)))), wcel(cv(s0), co(c4, cico, cpnf)), wcel(cv(s0), c0))
  sylib(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cin(c0, co(c4, cico, cpnf)))), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s0), co(c4, cico, cpnf))), wcel(cv(s0), cin(c0, co(c4, cico, cpnf))))
  simpr(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cin(c0, co(c4, cico, cpnf))))
  elin(cv(s0), c0, co(c4, cico, cpnf))
  biimpa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), co(c4, cico, cpnf)), wa(wcel(cv(s0), cr), wbr(c4, cle, cv(s0))))
  syl(w0, wb(wcel(cv(s0), co(c4, cico, cpnf)), wa(wcel(cv(s0), cr), wbr(c4, cle, cv(s0)))), wcel(c4, cr))
  elicopnf(c4, cv(s0))
  ax-mp(wceq(cres(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), cin(c0, co(c4, cico, cpnf))), cmpt(s0, cin(c0, co(c4, cico, cpnf)), c1)), wss(cin(c0, co(c4, cico, cpnf)), c0))
  resmpt(s0, cin(c0, co(c4, cico, cpnf)), c0, c1)
  ax-mp(wceq(cres(cmpt(s0, c0, c3), cin(c0, co(c4, cico, cpnf))), cmpt(s0, cin(c0, co(c4, cico, cpnf)), c3)), wss(cin(c0, co(c4, cico, cpnf)), c0))
  inss1(c0, co(c4, cico, cpnf))
  resmpt(s0, cin(c0, co(c4, cico, cpnf)), c0, c3)
  resres(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), c0, co(c4, cico, cpnf))
  resres(cmpt(s0, c0, c3), c0, co(c4, cico, cpnf))
  mp2b(wceq(cres(cres(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), c0), co(c4, cico, cpnf)), cres(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), co(c4, cico, cpnf))), wss(c0, c0), wceq(cres(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), c0), cmpt(s0, c0, c1)))
  resmpt(s0, c0, c0, c1)
  reseq1(cres(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), c0), cmpt(s0, c0, c1), co(c4, cico, cpnf))
  mp2b(wceq(cres(cres(cmpt(s0, c0, c3), c0), co(c4, cico, cpnf)), cres(cmpt(s0, c0, c3), co(c4, cico, cpnf))), wss(c0, c0), wceq(cres(cmpt(s0, c0, c3), c0), cmpt(s0, c0, c3)))
  ssid(c0)
  resmpt(s0, c0, c0, c3)
  reseq1(cres(cmpt(s0, c0, c3), c0), cmpt(s0, c0, c3), co(c4, cico, cpnf))
  rlimresb(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), c2, c4, c0, wa(w0, wss(c0, cr)))
  adantr(w0, wss(c0, cr), wf(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), c0, cc))
  fmpttd(s0, c0, c1, cc, w0)
  rlimresb(cmpt(s0, c0, c3), c2, c4, c0, wa(w0, wss(c0, cr)))
  adantr(w0, wss(c0, cr), wf(cmpt(s0, c0, c3), c0, cc))
  fmpttd(s0, c0, c3, cc, w0)
  simpr(w0, wss(c0, cr))
  adantr(w0, wss(c0, cr), wcel(c4, cr))
  diff.cin.s(s0, c0, co(c4, cico, cpnf))
  diff.co.s(s0, c4, cico, cpnf)
  diff.cico.s(s0)
  diff.cpnf.s(s0)
  diff.cc.s(s0)
}

blocks.name: o1eq
blocks.content: Two functions that are eventually equal to one another are eventually bounded if one of them is. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 26-May-2016.)
blocks.origin:
thm o1eq(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wb(wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), co1), wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, c2), co1)))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(c1, cc))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(c2, cc))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, cr))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wbr(c3, cle, cv(s0)))), wceq(c1, c2))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
} = {
  3bitr4d(w0, wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), co1), wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, c2), co1), wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, cfv(cabs, c1)), clo1), wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, cfv(cabs, c2)), clo1))
  lo1eq(s0, c0, cfv(cabs, c1), cfv(cabs, c2), c3, w0)
  abscld(c1, wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)))
  abscld(c2, wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)))
  fveq2d(cabs, c1, c2, wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wbr(c3, cle, cv(s0)))))
  lo1o12(s0, c0, c1, w0)
  lo1o12(s0, c0, c2, w0)
}

blocks.name: climmpt
blocks.content: Exhibit a function ` G ` with the same convergence properties as the not-quite-function ` F ` . (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 31-Jan-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm climmpt(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, c2)), wb(wbr(c1, cli, c3), wbr(c4, cli, c3)))
  -| wceq(c5, cfv(cuz, c0))
  -| wceq(c4, cmpt(s0, c5, cfv(c1, cv(s0))))
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c5)
} = {
  a1ii(wi(wa(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, c2)), wb(wbr(c1, cli, c3), wbr(c4, cli, c3))), diffsc(s0, c3))
  climeq(hs0, c1, c3, c4, c5, c0, c2, universe, wa(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, c2)))
  simpr(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, c2))
  a1i(wa(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, c2)), wcel(c4, universe))
  eqeltri(c4, universe, cmpt(s0, c5, cfv(c1, cv(s0))))
  mptex(s0, c5, cfv(c1, cv(s0)))
  eqeltri(c5, universe, cfv(cuz, c0))
  fvex(cuz, c0)
  simpl(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, c2))
  adantl(wa(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, c2)), wcel(cv(hs0), c5), wceq(cfv(c1, cv(hs0)), cfv(c4, cv(hs0))))
  eqcomd(cfv(c1, cv(hs0)), cfv(c4, cv(hs0)), wcel(cv(hs0), c5))
  fvmpt(s0, cv(hs0), c5, c4, cfv(c1, cv(hs0)), cfv(c1, cv(s0)))
  fveq2(cv(s0), cv(hs0), c1)
  fvex(c1, cv(hs0))
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.c(c4)
  diff.hs0.c(c5)
  diff.hs0.w(wa(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, c2)))
  diff.cfv.s(s0, c1, cv(hs0))
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm climmpt(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈ ℤ ∧ c1 ∈ c2)→(c1[~~>]c3 ↔ c4[~~>]c3))
  ⊣ c5 =(ℤ≥ ` c0)
  ⊣ c4 =(s0 ∈ c5 ↦(c1 ` s0))
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c3)
  ⊣ d(s0, c5)
} = {
  a1ii(((c0 ∈ ℤ ∧ c1 ∈ c2)→(c1[~~>]c3 ↔ c4[~~>]c3)), d(s0, c3))
  climeq(hs0, c1, c3, c4, c5, c0, c2, universe, (c0 ∈ ℤ ∧ c1 ∈ c2))
  simpr(c0 ∈ ℤ, c1 ∈ c2)
  a1i((c0 ∈ ℤ ∧ c1 ∈ c2), c4 ∈ 𝕌)
  eqeltri(c4, universe, (s0 ∈ c5 ↦(c1 ` s0)))
  mptex(s0, c5, (c1 ` s0))
  eqeltri(c5, universe, (ℤ≥ ` c0))
  fvex(cuz, c0)
  simpl(c0 ∈ ℤ, c1 ∈ c2)
  adantl((c0 ∈ ℤ ∧ c1 ∈ c2), hs0 ∈ c5, (c1 ` hs0)=(c4 ` hs0))
  eqcomd((c1 ` hs0), (c4 ` hs0), hs0 ∈ c5)
  fvmpt(s0, hs0, c5, c4, (c1 ` hs0), (c1 ` s0))
  fveq2(s0, hs0, c1)
  fvex(c1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.c(c4)
  diff.hs0.c(c5)
  diff.hs0.w((c0 ∈ ℤ ∧ c1 ∈ c2))
  diff.cfv.s(s0, c1, hs0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
}

blocks.name: 2clim
blocks.content: If two sequences converge to each other, they converge to the same limit. (Contributed by NM, 24-Dec-2005.) (Proof shortened by Mario Carneiro, 31-Jan-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm 2clim(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wbr(c0, cli, c1))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cuz, c3))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, cz))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c4))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c2)), wcel(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), cc))
  -| wi(w0, wral(s1, crp, wrex(s2, c2, wral(s0, cfv(cuz, cv(s2)), wbr(cfv(cabs, co(cfv(c5, cv(s0)), cmin, cfv(c0, cv(s0)))), clt, cv(s1))))))
  -| wi(w0, wbr(c5, cli, c1))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c5)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c5)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c1)
  -| diffsc(s2, c2)
  -| diffsc(s2, c3)
  -| diffsc(s2, c5)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
  -| diffsw(s2, w0)
} = {
  mpbird(w0, wbr(c0, cli, c1), wral(hs0, crp, wrex(s2, c2, wral(s0, cfv(cuz, cv(s2)), wbr(cfv(cabs, co(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), cmin, c1)), clt, cv(hs0))))))
  ralrimiva(hs0, crp, w0, wrex(s2, c2, wral(s0, cfv(cuz, cv(s2)), wbr(cfv(cabs, co(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), cmin, c1)), clt, cv(hs0)))))
  mpd(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), crp)), wrex(s2, c2, wral(s0, cfv(cuz, cv(s2)), wbr(cfv(cabs, co(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), cmin, c1)), clt, cv(hs0)))), wrex(s2, c2, wral(s0, cfv(cuz, cv(s2)), wa(wbr(cfv(cabs, co(cfv(c5, cv(s0)), cmin, cfv(c0, cv(s0)))), clt, co(cv(hs0), cdiv, nat2)), wa(wcel(cfv(c5, cv(s0)), cc), wbr(cfv(cabs, co(cfv(c5, cv(s0)), cmin, c1)), clt, co(cv(hs0), cdiv, nat2)))))))
  sylanbrc(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), crp)), wrex(s2, c2, wral(s0, cfv(cuz, cv(s2)), wa(wbr(cfv(cabs, co(cfv(c5, cv(s0)), cmin, cfv(c0, cv(s0)))), clt, co(cv(hs0), cdiv, nat2)), wa(wcel(cfv(c5, cv(s0)), cc), wbr(cfv(cabs, co(cfv(c5, cv(s0)), cmin, c1)), clt, co(cv(hs0), cdiv, nat2)))))), wrex(s2, c2, wral(s0, cfv(cuz, cv(s2)), wbr(cfv(cabs, co(cfv(c5, cv(s0)), cmin, cfv(c0, cv(s0)))), clt, co(cv(hs0), cdiv, nat2)))), wrex(s2, c2, wral(s0, cfv(cuz, cv(s2)), wa(wcel(cfv(c5, cv(s0)), cc), wbr(cfv(cabs, co(cfv(c5, cv(s0)), cmin, c1)), clt, co(cv(hs0), cdiv, nat2))))))
  syl2an(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), crp), wrex(s2, c2, wral(s0, cfv(cuz, cv(s2)), wbr(cfv(cabs, co(cfv(c5, cv(s0)), cmin, cfv(c0, cv(s0)))), clt, co(cv(hs0), cdiv, nat2)))), wral(s1, crp, wrex(s2, c2, wral(s0, cfv(cuz, cv(s2)), wbr(cfv(cabs, co(cfv(c5, cv(s0)), cmin, cfv(c0, cv(s0)))), clt, cv(s1))))), wcel(co(cv(hs0), cdiv, nat2), crp))
  rspccva(s1, crp, co(cv(hs0), cdiv, nat2), wrex(s2, c2, wral(s0, cfv(cuz, cv(s2)), wbr(cfv(cabs, co(cfv(c5, cv(s0)), cmin, cfv(c0, cv(s0)))), clt, cv(s1)))), wrex(s2, c2, wral(s0, cfv(cuz, cv(s2)), wbr(cfv(cabs, co(cfv(c5, cv(s0)), cmin, cfv(c0, cv(s0)))), clt, co(cv(hs0), cdiv, nat2)))))
  rexralbidv(s2, s0, c2, cfv(cuz, cv(s2)), wceq(cv(s1), co(cv(hs0), cdiv, nat2)), wbr(cfv(cabs, co(cfv(c5, cv(s0)), cmin, cfv(c0, cv(s0)))), clt, cv(s1)), wbr(cfv(cabs, co(cfv(c5, cv(s0)), cmin, cfv(c0, cv(s0)))), clt, co(cv(hs0), cdiv, nat2)))
  breq2(cv(s1), co(cv(hs0), cdiv, nat2), cfv(cabs, co(cfv(c5, cv(s0)), cmin, cfv(c0, cv(s0)))), clt)
  climi(s2, s0, c2, cfv(c5, cv(s0)), c1, co(cv(hs0), cdiv, nat2), c3, c5, wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), crp)))
  adantr(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), crp), wcel(c3, cz))

blocks.name: climmpt2
blocks.content: Relate an integer limit on a not-quite-function to a real limit. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 17-Sep-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm climmpt2(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wb(wbr(c0, cli, c1), wbr(cmpt(s0, c2, cfv(c0, cv(s0))), crli, c1)))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cuz, c3))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, cz))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c4))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s1), c2)), wcel(cfv(c0, cv(s1)), cc))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
} = {
  bitr4d(w0, wbr(c0, cli, c1), wbr(cmpt(s0, c2, cfv(c0, cv(s0))), crli, c1), wbr(cmpt(s0, c2, cfv(c0, cv(s0))), cli, c1))
  syl2anc(w0, wb(wbr(c0, cli, c1), wbr(cmpt(s0, c2, cfv(c0, cv(s0))), cli, c1)), wcel(c3, cz), wcel(c0, c4))
  climmpt(s0, c3, c0, c4, c1, cmpt(s0, c2, cfv(c0, cv(s0))), c2)
  eqid(cmpt(s0, c2, cfv(c0, cv(s0))))
  rlimclim(cmpt(s0, c2, cfv(c0, cv(s0))), c1, c2, c3, w0)
  fmpttd(s0, c2, cfv(c0, cv(s0)), cc, w0)
  r19.21bi(s0, c2, w0, wcel(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), cc))
  sylib(w0, wral(s0, c2, wcel(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), cc)), wral(s1, c2, wcel(cfv(c0, cv(s1)), cc)))
  ralrimiva(s1, c2, w0, wcel(cfv(c0, cv(s1)), cc))
  bitri(wral(s1, c2, wcel(cfv(c0, cv(s1)), cc)), wral(s0, c2, wcel(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), cc)), wral(hs0, c2, wcel(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), cc)))
  cbvralv(s1, hs0, c2, wcel(cfv(c0, cv(s1)), cc), wcel(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), cc))
  eleq1d(cfv(c0, cv(s1)), cc, cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), wceq(cv(s1), cv(hs0)))
  fveq2(cv(s1), cv(hs0), c0)
  cbvralv(hs0, s0, c2, wcel(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), cc), wcel(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), cc))
  eleq1d(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), cc, cfv(c0, cv(s0)), wceq(cv(hs0), cv(s0)))
  fveq2(cv(hs0), cv(s0), c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.wcel.s(s1, cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), cc)
  diff.cfv.s(s1, c0, cv(hs0))
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.cc.s(s1)
  diff.hs0.w(wcel(cfv(c0, cv(s1)), cc))
  diff.hs0.w(wcel(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), cc))
  diff.wcel.s(s0, cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), cc)
  diff.cfv.s(s0, c0, cv(hs0))
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.cc.s(s0)

blocks.pretty:
thm climmpt2(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 →(c0[~~>]c1 ↔(s0 ∈ c2 ↦(c0 ` s0))[~~>r]c1))
  ⊣ c2 =(ℤ≥ ` c3)
  ⊣ (w0 → c3 ∈ ℤ)
  ⊣ (w0 → c0 ∈ c4)
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ s1 ∈ c2)→(c0 ` s1)∈ ℂ)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c2)
  ⊣ d(s0, w0)
  ⊣ d(s1, w0)
} = {
  bitr4d(w0, c0[~~>]c1, (s0 ∈ c2 ↦(c0 ` s0))[~~>r]c1, (s0 ∈ c2 ↦(c0 ` s0))[~~>]c1)
  syl2anc(w0, (c0[~~>]c1 ↔(s0 ∈ c2 ↦(c0 ` s0))[~~>]c1), c3 ∈ ℤ, c0 ∈ c4)
  climmpt(s0, c3, c0, c4, c1, (s0 ∈ c2 ↦(c0 ` s0)), c2)
  eqid((s0 ∈ c2 ↦(c0 ` s0)))
  rlimclim((s0 ∈ c2 ↦(c0 ` s0)), c1, c2, c3, w0)
  fmpttd(s0, c2, (c0 ` s0), cc, w0)
  r19.21bi(s0, c2, w0, (c0 ` s0)∈ ℂ)
  sylib(w0, ∀(s0 ∈ c2,(c0 ` s0)∈ ℂ), ∀(s1 ∈ c2,(c0 ` s1)∈ ℂ))
  ralrimiva(s1, c2, w0, (c0 ` s1)∈ ℂ)
  bitri(∀(s1 ∈ c2,(c0 ` s1)∈ ℂ), ∀(s0 ∈ c2,(c0 ` s0)∈ ℂ), ∀(hs0 ∈ c2,(c0 ` hs0)∈ ℂ))
  cbvralv(s1, hs0, c2, (c0 ` s1)∈ ℂ, (c0 ` hs0)∈ ℂ)
  eleq1d((c0 ` s1), cc, (c0 ` hs0), s1 = hs0)
  fveq2(s1, hs0, c0)
  cbvralv(hs0, s0, c2, (c0 ` hs0)∈ ℂ, (c0 ` s0)∈ ℂ)
  eleq1d((c0 ` hs0), cc, (c0 ` s0), hs0 = s0)
  fveq2(hs0, s0, c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.wcel.s(s1, (c0 ` hs0), cc)
  diff.cfv.s(s1, c0, hs0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.cc.s(s1)
  diff.hs0.w((c0 ` s1)∈ ℂ)
  diff.hs0.w((c0 ` s0)∈ ℂ)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, (c0 ` hs0), cc)
  diff.cfv.s(s0, c0, hs0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.cc.s(s0)
}

blocks.origin:
thm climshftlem(class c0, class c1, class c2) {

} = {

  diff.hs2.w(∃(hs0 ∈ ℤ, ∀(hs3 ∈(ℤ≥ ` hs0),(((c1[shift]c0)` hs3)∈ ℂ ∧(abs `(((c1[shift]c0)` hs3)[-]c2))[<]hs1))))

  diff.hs0.c((hs3[-]c0))

  diff.hs0.c((hs2[+]c0))
  diff.hs0.c(cz)
  diff.hs0.w(∀(hs3 ∈(ℤ≥ `(hs2[+]c0)),(((c1[shift]c0)` hs3)∈ ℂ ∧(abs `(((c1[shift]c0)` hs3)[-]c2))[<]hs1)))
  diff.hs3.c((ℤ≥ ` hs0))
  diff.hs3.c((ℤ≥ `(hs2[+]c0)))

blocks.name: climres
blocks.content: A function restricted to upper integers converges iff the original function converges. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 13-Jul-2013.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 31-Jan-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm climres(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, c2)), wb(wbr(cres(c1, cfv(cuz, c0)), cli, c3), wbr(c1, cli, c3)))
} = {
  climeq(hs0, cres(c1, cfv(cuz, c0)), c3, c1, cfv(cuz, c0), c0, universe, c2, wa(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, c2)))
  eqid(cfv(cuz, c0))
  adantl(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(cres(c1, cfv(cuz, c0)), universe))
  resexg(c1, c2, cfv(cuz, c0))
  simpr(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, c2))
  simpl(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, c2))
  adantl(wa(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, c2)), wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cuz, c0)), wceq(cfv(cres(c1, cfv(cuz, c0)), cv(hs0)), cfv(c1, cv(hs0))))
  fvres(cv(hs0), cfv(cuz, c0), c1)
  diff.hs0.c(cres(c1, cfv(cuz, c0)))
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(cfv(cuz, c0))
  diff.hs0.w(wa(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, c2)))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm climres(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈ ℤ ∧ c1 ∈ c2)→((c1 |`(ℤ≥ ` c0))[~~>]c3 ↔ c1[~~>]c3))
} = {
  climeq(hs0, (c1 |`(ℤ≥ ` c0)), c3, c1, (ℤ≥ ` c0), c0, universe, c2, (c0 ∈ ℤ ∧ c1 ∈ c2))
  eqid((ℤ≥ ` c0))
  adantl(c0 ∈ ℤ, c1 ∈ c2, (c1 |`(ℤ≥ ` c0))∈ 𝕌)
  resexg(c1, c2, (ℤ≥ ` c0))
  simpr(c0 ∈ ℤ, c1 ∈ c2)
  simpl(c0 ∈ ℤ, c1 ∈ c2)
  adantl((c0 ∈ ℤ ∧ c1 ∈ c2), hs0 ∈(ℤ≥ ` c0), ((c1 |`(ℤ≥ ` c0))` hs0)=(c1 ` hs0))
  fvres(hs0, (ℤ≥ ` c0), c1)
  diff.hs0.c((c1 |`(ℤ≥ ` c0)))
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c((ℤ≥ ` c0))
  diff.hs0.w((c0 ∈ ℤ ∧ c1 ∈ c2))
}

blocks.name: climshft
blocks.content: A shifted function converges iff the original function converges. (Contributed by NM, 16-Aug-2005.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 31-Jan-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm climshft(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, c2)), wb(wbr(co(c1, cshi, c0), cli, c3), wbr(c1, cli, c3)))
} = {
  impcom(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, c2), wb(wbr(co(c1, cshi, c0), cli, c3), wbr(c1, cli, c3)))
  vtoclg(hs0, c1, c2, wi(wcel(c0, cz), wb(wbr(co(c1, cshi, c0), cli, c3), wbr(c1, cli, c3))), wi(wcel(c0, cz), wb(wbr(co(cv(hs0), cshi, c0), cli, c3), wbr(cv(hs0), cli, c3))))
  imbi2d(wceq(cv(hs0), c1), wcel(c0, cz), wb(wbr(co(cv(hs0), cshi, c0), cli, c3), wbr(cv(hs0), cli, c3)), wb(wbr(co(c1, cshi, c0), cli, c3), wbr(c1, cli, c3)))
  bibi12d(wceq(cv(hs0), c1), wbr(co(cv(hs0), cshi, c0), cli, c3), wbr(cv(hs0), cli, c3), wbr(co(c1, cshi, c0), cli, c3), wbr(c1, cli, c3))
  breq1d(co(cv(hs0), cshi, c0), cli, c3, co(c1, cshi, c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c1))
  oveq1(cv(hs0), c1, cshi, c0)
  breq1(cv(hs0), c1, cli, c3)
  impbid(wcel(c0, cz), wbr(co(cv(hs0), cshi, c0), cli, c3), wbr(cv(hs0), cli, c3))
  sylibd(wcel(c0, cz), wbr(co(cv(hs0), cshi, c0), cli, c3), wbr(cv(hs0), cli, c3), wbr(co(co(cv(hs0), cshi, c0), cshi, cneg(c0)), cli, c3))
  syl(wcel(c0, cz), wi(wbr(co(cv(hs0), cshi, c0), cli, c3), wbr(co(co(cv(hs0), cshi, c0), cshi, cneg(c0)), cli, c3)), wcel(cneg(c0), cz))
  znegcl(c0)
  climshftlem(cneg(c0), co(cv(hs0), cshi, c0), c3)
  ovex(cv(hs0), cshi, c0)
  climeq(hs1, co(co(cv(hs0), cshi, c0), cshi, cneg(c0)), c3, cv(hs0), cfv(cuz, c0), c0, universe, universe, wcel(c0, cz))
  eqid(cfv(cuz, c0))
  ovexd(co(cv(hs0), cshi, c0), cshi, cneg(c0), wcel(c0, cz))
  a1i(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(cv(hs0), universe))
  id(wcel(c0, cz))
  syl2an(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(cv(hs1), cfv(cuz, c0)), wceq(cfv(co(co(cv(hs0), cshi, c0), cshi, cneg(c0)), cv(hs1)), cfv(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))), wcel(c0, cc), wcel(cv(hs1), cc))
  zcn(c0)
  eluzelcn(cv(hs1), c0)
  shftcan1(c0, cv(hs1), cv(hs0))
  climshftlem(c0, cv(hs0), c3)
  vex(hs0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.w(wi(wcel(c0, cz), wb(wbr(co(c1, cshi, c0), cli, c3), wbr(c1, cli, c3))))
  diff.hs1.c(co(co(cv(hs0), cshi, c0), cshi, cneg(c0)))
  diff.hs1.c(c3)
  diff.hs1.c(cv(hs0))
  diff.hs1.c(cfv(cuz, c0))
  diff.hs1.w(wcel(c0, cz))

blocks.pretty:
thm climshft(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈ ℤ ∧ c1 ∈ c2)→((c1[shift]c0)[~~>]c3 ↔ c1[~~>]c3))
} = {
  impcom(c0 ∈ ℤ, c1 ∈ c2, ((c1[shift]c0)[~~>]c3 ↔ c1[~~>]c3))

blocks.name: serclim0

blocks.name: rlimcld2
blocks.content: If ` D ` is a closed set in the topology of the complex numbers (stated here in basic form), and all the elements of the sequence lie in ` D ` , then the limit of the sequence also lies in ` D ` . (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 10-May-2016.)

  necon3bbid((Im ` hs0), nat0, (w0 ∧ hs0 ∈(ℂ \ ℝ)), hs0 ∈ ℝ)

  syl(((w0 ∧ hs0 ∈(ℂ \ ℝ))∧ hs1 ∈ ℝ), (abs `(Im `(hs0[-]hs1)))[≤](abs `(hs0[-]hs1)), (hs0[-]hs1)∈ ℂ)
  subcld(hs0, hs1, ((w0 ∧ hs0 ∈(ℂ \ ℝ))∧ hs1 ∈ ℝ))

  3eqtrrd((Im ` hs0), (Im `(hs0[-]hs1)), ((Im ` hs0)[-](Im ` hs1)), ((Im ` hs0)[-]0), ((w0 ∧ hs0 ∈(ℂ \ ℝ))∧ hs1 ∈ ℝ))
  imsubd(hs0, hs1, ((w0 ∧ hs0 ∈(ℂ \ ℝ))∧ hs1 ∈ ℝ))
  oveq2d((Im ` hs0), cmin, (Im ` hs1), nat0, ((w0 ∧ hs0 ∈(ℂ \ ℝ))∧ hs1 ∈ ℝ))

  adantr((w0 ∧ hs0 ∈(ℂ \ ℝ)), hs1 ∈ ℝ, hs0 ∈ ℂ)
  adantl(w0, hs0 ∈(ℂ \ ℝ), hs0 ∈ ℂ)
  eldifi(hs0, cc, cr)

blocks.name: rlimge0
blocks.content: The limit of a sequence of nonnegative reals is nonnegative. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 10-May-2016.)
blocks.origin:
thm rlimge0(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wbr(nat0, cle, c0))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(csup(c1, cxr, clt), cpnf))
  -| wi(w0, wbr(cmpt(s0, c1, c2), crli, c0))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c1)), wcel(c2, cr))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c1)), wbr(nat0, cle, c2))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
} = {
  breqtrd(nat0, cle, c0, cfv(cre, c0), w0)
  rlimrege0(s0, c0, c1, c2, w0)
  recnd(c2, wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c1)))
  breqtrrd(nat0, cle, cfv(cre, c2), c2, wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c1)))
  rered(c2, wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c1)))
  rered(c0, w0)
  rlimrecl(s0, c0, c1, c2, w0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm rlimge0(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 → 0[≤]c0)
  ⊣ (w0 → sup(c1, ℝ*, <)= +∞)
  ⊣ (w0 →(s0 ∈ c1 ↦ c2)[~~>r]c0)
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c1)→ c2 ∈ ℝ)
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c1)→ 0[≤]c2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, w0)
} = {
  breqtrd(nat0, cle, c0, (Re ` c0), w0)
  rlimrege0(s0, c0, c1, c2, w0)
  recnd(c2, (w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c1))
  breqtrrd(nat0, cle, (Re ` c2), c2, (w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c1))
  rered(c2, (w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c1))
  rered(c0, w0)
  rlimrecl(s0, c0, c1, c2, w0)
}

blocks.name: climshft2
blocks.content: A shifted function converges iff the original function converges. (Contributed by Paul Chapman, 21-Nov-2007.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 6-Feb-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm climshft2(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wb(wbr(c0, cli, c1), wbr(c2, cli, c1)))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(cuz, c4))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c4, cz))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c5, cz))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c6))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, c7))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c3)), wceq(cfv(c2, co(cv(s0), caddc, c5)), cfv(c0, cv(s0))))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
  -| diffsc(s0, c5)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
} = {
  a1ii(wi(w0, wb(wbr(c0, cli, c1), wbr(c2, cli, c1))), diffsc(s0, c4))
  bitr3d(w0, wbr(c0, cli, c1), wbr(c2, cli, c1), wbr(co(c2, cshi, cneg(c5)), cli, c1))
  climeq(s0, co(c2, cshi, cneg(c5)), c1, c0, c3, c4, universe, c6, w0)
  ovexd(c2, cshi, cneg(c5), w0)
  eqtrd(cfv(co(c2, cshi, cneg(c5)), cv(s0)), cfv(c0, cv(s0)), cfv(c2, co(cv(s0), caddc, c5)), wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c3)))
  3eqtr3d(cfv(co(c2, cshi, cneg(c5)), cv(s0)), cfv(c2, co(cv(s0), caddc, c5)), cfv(co(cfv(cid, c2), cshi, cneg(c5)), cv(s0)), cfv(cfv(cid, c2), co(c5, caddc, cv(s0))), wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c3)))
  syl2an(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c3), wceq(cfv(co(cfv(cid, c2), cshi, cneg(c5)), cv(s0)), cfv(cfv(cid, c2), co(c5, caddc, cv(s0)))), wcel(c5, cc), wcel(cv(s0), cc))
  shftval4(c5, cv(s0), cfv(cid, c2))
  fvex(cid, c2)
  fveq1d(co(cfv(cid, c2), cshi, cneg(c5)), cv(s0), co(c2, cshi, cneg(c5)), wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c3)))
  oveq1d(cfv(cid, c2), cshi, cneg(c5), c2, wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c3)))
  fveq12d(cfv(cid, c2), co(c5, caddc, cv(s0)), c2, co(cv(s0), caddc, c5), wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c3)))
  adantr(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c3), wceq(cfv(cid, c2), c2))
  syl(w0, wceq(cfv(cid, c2), c2), wcel(c2, c7))
  fvi(c2, c7)
  syl2an(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c3), wceq(co(c5, caddc, cv(s0)), co(cv(s0), caddc, c5)), wcel(c5, cc), wcel(cv(s0), cc))
  zcnd(c5, w0)
  zcnd(cv(s0), wcel(cv(s0), c3))
  eleq2s(cv(s0), c3, cfv(cuz, c4), wcel(cv(s0), cz))
  eluzelz(cv(s0), c4)
  addcom(c5, cv(s0))
  syl2anc(w0, wb(wbr(co(c2, cshi, cneg(c5)), cli, c1), wbr(c2, cli, c1)), wcel(cneg(c5), cz), wcel(c2, c7))
  znegcld(c5, w0)
  climshft(cneg(c5), c2, c7, c1)
  diff.co.s(s0, c2, cshi, cneg(c5))
  diff.cshi.s(s0)
  diff.cneg.s(s0, c5)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm climshft2(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 →(c0[~~>]c1 ↔ c2[~~>]c1))
  ⊣ c3 =(ℤ≥ ` c4)
  ⊣ (w0 → c4 ∈ ℤ)
  ⊣ (w0 → c5 ∈ ℤ)
  ⊣ (w0 → c0 ∈ c6)
  ⊣ (w0 → c2 ∈ c7)
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c3)→(c2 `(s0[+]c5))=(c0 ` s0))
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c3)
  ⊣ d(s0, c4)
  ⊣ d(s0, c5)
  ⊣ d(s0, w0)
} = {
  a1ii((w0 →(c0[~~>]c1 ↔ c2[~~>]c1)), d(s0, c4))
  bitr3d(w0, c0[~~>]c1, c2[~~>]c1, (c2[shift]-u(c5))[~~>]c1)
  climeq(s0, (c2[shift]-u(c5)), c1, c0, c3, c4, universe, c6, w0)
  ovexd(c2, cshi, -u(c5), w0)
  eqtrd(((c2[shift]-u(c5))` s0), (c0 ` s0), (c2 `(s0[+]c5)), (w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c3))
  3eqtr3d(((c2[shift]-u(c5))` s0), (c2 `(s0[+]c5)), (((= ` c2)[shift]-u(c5))` s0), ((= ` c2)`(c5[+]s0)), (w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c3))
  syl2an(w0, s0 ∈ c3, (((= ` c2)[shift]-u(c5))` s0)=((= ` c2)`(c5[+]s0)), c5 ∈ ℂ, s0 ∈ ℂ)
  shftval4(c5, s0, (= ` c2))
  fvex(cid, c2)
  fveq1d(((= ` c2)[shift]-u(c5)), s0, (c2[shift]-u(c5)), (w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c3))
  oveq1d((= ` c2), cshi, -u(c5), c2, (w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c3))
  fveq12d((= ` c2), (c5[+]s0), c2, (s0[+]c5), (w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c3))
  adantr(w0, s0 ∈ c3, (= ` c2)= c2)
  syl(w0, (= ` c2)= c2, c2 ∈ c7)
  fvi(c2, c7)
  syl2an(w0, s0 ∈ c3, (c5[+]s0)=(s0[+]c5), c5 ∈ ℂ, s0 ∈ ℂ)
  zcnd(c5, w0)
  zcnd(s0, s0 ∈ c3)
  eleq2s(s0, c3, (ℤ≥ ` c4), s0 ∈ ℤ)
  eluzelz(s0, c4)
  addcom(c5, s0)
  syl2anc(w0, ((c2[shift]-u(c5))[~~>]c1 ↔ c2[~~>]c1), -u(c5)∈ ℤ, c2 ∈ c7)
  znegcld(c5, w0)
  climshft(-u(c5), c2, c7, c1)
  diff.co.s(s0, c2, cshi, -u(c5))
  diff.cshi.s(s0)
  diff.cneg.s(s0, c5)
}

blocks.name: climrecl
blocks.content: The limit of a convergent real sequence is real. Corollary 12-2.5 of [Gleason] p. 172. (Contributed by NM, 10-Sep-2005.) (Proof shortened by Mario Carneiro, 10-May-2016.)
blocks.origin:
thm climrecl(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wcel(c0, cr))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(cuz, c2))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, cz))
  -| wi(w0, wbr(c3, cli, c0))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c1)), wcel(cfv(c3, cv(s0)), cr))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
} = {
  a1ii(wi(w0, wcel(c0, cr)), diffsc(s0, c2))
  rlimrecl(s0, c0, c1, cfv(c3, cv(s0)), w0)
  syl(w0, wceq(csup(c1, cxr, clt), cpnf), wcel(c2, cz))
  uzsup(c2, c1)
  mpbird(w0, wbr(cmpt(s0, c1, cfv(c3, cv(s0))), crli, c0), wbr(cmpt(s0, c1, cfv(c3, cv(s0))), cli, c0))
  mpbid(w0, wbr(cmpt(s0, c1, cfv(c3, cv(s0))), cli, c0), wbr(c3, cli, c0))
  syl2anc(w0, wb(wbr(c3, cli, c0), wbr(cmpt(s0, c1, cfv(c3, cv(s0))), cli, c0)), wcel(c2, cz), wcel(c3, universe))
  syl(w0, wcel(c3, universe), wbr(c3, cli, c0))
  brrelex1i(c3, cli, c0)
  climrel()
  climmpt(s0, c2, c3, universe, c0, cmpt(s0, c1, cfv(c3, cv(s0))), c1)
  eqid(cmpt(s0, c1, cfv(c3, cv(s0))))
  rlimclim(cmpt(s0, c1, cfv(c3, cv(s0))), c0, c1, c2, w0)
  fmpttd(s0, c1, cfv(c3, cv(s0)), cc, w0)
  recnd(cfv(c3, cv(s0)), wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c1)))
  diff.cc.s(s0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm climrecl(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 → c0 ∈ ℝ)
  ⊣ c1 =(ℤ≥ ` c2)
  ⊣ (w0 → c2 ∈ ℤ)
  ⊣ (w0 → c3[~~>]c0)
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c1)→(c3 ` s0)∈ ℝ)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c3)
  ⊣ d(s0, w0)
} = {
  a1ii((w0 → c0 ∈ ℝ), d(s0, c2))
  rlimrecl(s0, c0, c1, (c3 ` s0), w0)
  syl(w0, sup(c1, ℝ*, <)= +∞, c2 ∈ ℤ)
  uzsup(c2, c1)
  mpbird(w0, (s0 ∈ c1 ↦(c3 ` s0))[~~>r]c0, (s0 ∈ c1 ↦(c3 ` s0))[~~>]c0)
  mpbid(w0, (s0 ∈ c1 ↦(c3 ` s0))[~~>]c0, c3[~~>]c0)
  syl2anc(w0, (c3[~~>]c0 ↔(s0 ∈ c1 ↦(c3 ` s0))[~~>]c0), c2 ∈ ℤ, c3 ∈ 𝕌)
  syl(w0, c3 ∈ 𝕌, c3[~~>]c0)
  brrelex1i(c3, cli, c0)
  climrel()
  climmpt(s0, c2, c3, universe, c0, (s0 ∈ c1 ↦(c3 ` s0)), c1)
  eqid((s0 ∈ c1 ↦(c3 ` s0)))
  rlimclim((s0 ∈ c1 ↦(c3 ` s0)), c0, c1, c2, w0)
  fmpttd(s0, c1, (c3 ` s0), cc, w0)
  recnd((c3 ` s0), (w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c1))
  diff.cc.s(s0)
}

blocks.name: climge0
blocks.content: A nonnegative sequence converges to a nonnegative number. (Contributed by NM, 11-Sep-2005.) (Proof shortened by Mario Carneiro, 10-May-2016.)
blocks.origin:
thm climge0(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wbr(nat0, cle, c0))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(cuz, c2))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, cz))
  -| wi(w0, wbr(c3, cli, c0))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c1)), wcel(cfv(c3, cv(s0)), cr))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c1)), wbr(nat0, cle, cfv(c3, cv(s0))))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
} = {
  a1ii(wi(w0, wbr(nat0, cle, c0)), diffsc(s0, c2))
  rlimge0(s0, c0, c1, cfv(c3, cv(s0)), w0)
  syl(w0, wceq(csup(c1, cxr, clt), cpnf), wcel(c2, cz))
  uzsup(c2, c1)
  mpbird(w0, wbr(cmpt(s0, c1, cfv(c3, cv(s0))), crli, c0), wbr(cmpt(s0, c1, cfv(c3, cv(s0))), cli, c0))
  mpbid(w0, wbr(cmpt(s0, c1, cfv(c3, cv(s0))), cli, c0), wbr(c3, cli, c0))
  syl2anc(w0, wb(wbr(c3, cli, c0), wbr(cmpt(s0, c1, cfv(c3, cv(s0))), cli, c0)), wcel(c2, cz), wcel(c3, universe))
  syl(w0, wcel(c3, universe), wbr(c3, cli, c0))
  brrelex1i(c3, cli, c0)
  climrel()
  climmpt(s0, c2, c3, universe, c0, cmpt(s0, c1, cfv(c3, cv(s0))), c1)
  eqid(cmpt(s0, c1, cfv(c3, cv(s0))))
  rlimclim(cmpt(s0, c1, cfv(c3, cv(s0))), c0, c1, c2, w0)
  fmpttd(s0, c1, cfv(c3, cv(s0)), cc, w0)
  recnd(cfv(c3, cv(s0)), wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c1)))
  diff.cc.s(s0)
}

thm climge0(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 → 0[≤]c0)

  ⊣ (w0 → c2 ∈ ℤ)

blocks.name: climabs0
blocks.content: Convergence to zero of the absolute value is equivalent to convergence to zero. (Contributed by NM, 8-Jul-2008.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 31-Jan-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm climabs0(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wb(wbr(c0, cli, nat0), wbr(c1, cli, nat0)))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cuz, c3))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, cz))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c4))

thm climabs0(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 →(c0[~~>]0 ↔ c1[~~>]0))
  ⊣ c2 =(ℤ≥ ` c3)
  ⊣ (w0 → c3 ∈ ℤ)
  ⊣ (w0 → c0 ∈ c4)
  ⊣ (w0 → c1 ∈ c5)
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c2)→(c0 ` s0)∈ ℂ)
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c2)→(c1 ` s0)=(abs `(c0 ` s0)))
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
  ⊣ d(s0, w0)
} = {
  3bitr4rd(w0, c0[~~>]0, c1[~~>]0, ∀(hs0 ∈ ℝ+, ∃(hs1 ∈ c2, ∀(s0 ∈(ℤ≥ ` hs1),(abs `(abs `(c0 ` s0)))[<]hs0))), ∀(hs0 ∈ ℝ+, ∃(hs1 ∈ c2, ∀(s0 ∈(ℤ≥ ` hs1),(abs `(c0 ` s0))[<]hs0))))
  ralbidv(hs0, crp, w0, ∃(hs1 ∈ c2, ∀(s0 ∈(ℤ≥ ` hs1),(abs `(abs `(c0 ` s0)))[<]hs0)), ∃(hs1 ∈ c2, ∀(s0 ∈(ℤ≥ ` hs1),(abs `(c0 ` s0))[<]hs0)))
  rexbidva(hs1, c2, w0, ∀(s0 ∈(ℤ≥ ` hs1),(abs `(abs `(c0 ` s0)))[<]hs0), ∀(s0 ∈(ℤ≥ ` hs1),(abs `(c0 ` s0))[<]hs0))
  ralbidva(s0, (ℤ≥ ` hs1), (w0 ∧ hs1 ∈ c2), (abs `(abs `(c0 ` s0)))[<]hs0, (abs `(c0 ` s0))[<]hs0)
  anassrs(w0, hs1 ∈ c2, s0 ∈(ℤ≥ ` hs1), ((abs `(abs `(c0 ` s0)))[<]hs0 ↔(abs `(c0 ` s0))[<]hs0))
  sylan2(w0, (hs1 ∈ c2 ∧ s0 ∈(ℤ≥ ` hs1)), ((abs `(abs `(c0 ` s0)))[<]hs0 ↔(abs `(c0 ` s0))[<]hs0), s0 ∈ c2)
  uztrn2(hs1, c2, s0, c3)
  breq1d((abs `(abs `(c0 ` s0))), clt, hs0, (abs `(c0 ` s0)), (w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c2))
  syl((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c2), (abs `(abs `(c0 ` s0)))=(abs `(c0 ` s0)), (c0 ` s0)∈ ℂ)
  absidm((c0 ` s0))
  clim0c(hs0, hs1, s0, c1, c2, (abs `(c0 ` s0)), c3, c5, w0)
  recnd((abs `(c0 ` s0)), (w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c2))
  abscld((c0 ` s0), (w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c2))
  clim0c(hs0, hs1, s0, c0, c2, (c0 ` s0), c3, c4, w0)
  eqidd((c0 ` s0), (w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c2))
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.hs1.w(w0)
  diff.wa.s(s0, w0, hs1 ∈ c2)

blocks.name: o1compt
blocks.content: Sufficient condition for transforming the index set of an eventually bounded function. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 12-May-2016.)
blocks.origin:
thm o1compt(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wcel(ccom(c0, cmpt(s0, c1, c2)), co1))
  -| wi(w0, wf(c0, c3, cc))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, co1))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c1)), wcel(c2, c3))
  -| wi(w0, wss(c1, cr))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s1), cr)), wrex(s2, cr, wral(s0, c1, wi(wbr(cv(s2), cle, cv(s0)), wbr(cv(s1), cle, c2)))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c3)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c1)
  -| diffsc(s2, c2)
  -| diffsc(s2, c3)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
  -| diffsw(s2, w0)
} = {
  o1co(s1, s2, hs0, c0, cmpt(s0, c1, c2), c3, c1, w0)

blocks.name: addcn2
blocks.content: Complex number addition is a continuous function. Part of Proposition 14-4.16 of [Gleason] p. 243. (We write out the definition directly because ~ df-cn and ~ df-cncf are not yet available to us. See ~ addcn for the abbreviated version.) (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 31-Jan-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm addcn2(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, crp), wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c2, cc)), wrex(s0, crp, wrex(s1, crp, wral(s2, cc, wral(s3, cc, wi(wa(wbr(cfv(cabs, co(cv(s2), cmin, c1)), clt, cv(s0)), wbr(cfv(cabs, co(cv(s3), cmin, c2)), clt, cv(s1))), wbr(cfv(cabs, co(co(cv(s2), caddc, cv(s3)), cmin, co(c1, caddc, c2))), clt, c0)))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s0, s3)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s3)
  -| diffss(s2, s3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c1)
  -| diffsc(s2, c2)
  -| diffsc(s3, c0)
  -| diffsc(s3, c1)
  -| diffsc(s3, c2)
} = {
  syl3anc(w3a(wcel(c0, crp), wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c2, cc)), wrex(s0, crp, wrex(s1, crp, wral(s2, cc, wral(s3, cc, wi(wa(wbr(cfv(cabs, co(cv(s2), cmin, c1)), clt, cv(s0)), wbr(cfv(cabs, co(cv(s3), cmin, c2)), clt, cv(s1))), wbr(cfv(cabs, co(co(cv(s2), caddc, cv(s3)), cmin, co(c1, caddc, c2))), clt, c0)))))), wcel(co(c0, cdiv, nat2), crp), wcel(co(c0, cdiv, nat2), crp), wral(s2, cc, wral(s3, cc, wi(wa(wbr(cfv(cabs, co(cv(s2), cmin, c1)), clt, co(c0, cdiv, nat2)), wbr(cfv(cabs, co(cv(s3), cmin, c2)), clt, co(c0, cdiv, nat2))), wbr(cfv(cabs, co(co(cv(s2), caddc, cv(s3)), cmin, co(c1, caddc, c2))), clt, c0)))))

  anbi12d(wa(w3a(wcel(c0, crp), wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c2, cc)), wa(wcel(cv(s2), cc), wcel(cv(s3), cc))), wbr(cfv(cabs, co(co(cv(s2), caddc, cv(s3)), cmin, co(c1, caddc, cv(s3)))), clt, co(c0, cdiv, nat2)), wbr(cfv(cabs, co(co(c1, caddc, cv(s3)), cmin, co(c1, caddc, c2))), clt, co(c0, cdiv, nat2)), wbr(cfv(cabs, co(cv(s2), cmin, c1)), clt, co(c0, cdiv, nat2)), wbr(cfv(cabs, co(cv(s3), cmin, c2)), clt, co(c0, cdiv, nat2)))

  fveq2d(cabs, co(co(cv(s2), caddc, cv(s3)), cmin, co(c1, caddc, cv(s3))), co(cv(s2), cmin, c1), wa(w3a(wcel(c0, crp), wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c2, cc)), wa(wcel(cv(s2), cc), wcel(cv(s3), cc))))

blocks.name: subcn2
blocks.content: Complex number subtraction is a continuous function. Part of Proposition 14-4.16 of [Gleason] p. 243. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 31-Jan-2014.)
blocks.origin:

  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s0, s3)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s3)

blocks.name: mulcn2
blocks.content: Complex number multiplication is a continuous function. Part of Proposition 14-4.16 of [Gleason] p. 243. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 31-Jan-2014.)

blocks.content: The reciprocal function is continuous. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 9-Feb-2014.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 22-Sep-2014.)

thm cn1lem(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(cv(s0), crp)), wrex(s1, crp, wral(s2, cc, wi(wbr(cfv(cabs, co(cv(s2), cmin, c0)), clt, cv(s1)), wbr(cfv(cabs, co(cfv(c1, cv(s2)), cmin, cfv(c1, c0))), clt, cv(s0))))))
  -| wf(c1, cc, cc)
  -| wi(wa(wcel(cv(s2), cc), wcel(c0, cc)), wbr(cfv(cabs, co(cfv(c1, cv(s2)), cmin, cfv(c1, c0))), cle, cfv(cabs, co(cv(s2), cmin, c0))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
} = {
  syl2anc(wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(cv(s0), crp)), wrex(s1, crp, wral(s2, cc, wi(wbr(cfv(cabs, co(cv(s2), cmin, c0)), clt, cv(s1)), wbr(cfv(cabs, co(cfv(c1, cv(s2)), cmin, cfv(c1, c0))), clt, cv(s0))))), wcel(cv(s0), crp), wral(s2, cc, wi(wbr(cfv(cabs, co(cv(s2), cmin, c0)), clt, cv(s0)), wbr(cfv(cabs, co(cfv(c1, cv(s2)), cmin, cfv(c1, c0))), clt, cv(s0)))))
  simpr(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(cv(s0), crp))
  ralrimiva(s2, cc, wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(cv(s0), crp)), wi(wbr(cfv(cabs, co(cv(s2), cmin, c0)), clt, cv(s0)), wbr(cfv(cabs, co(cfv(c1, cv(s2)), cmin, cfv(c1, c0))), clt, cv(s0))))
  mpand(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(cv(s0), crp)), wcel(cv(s2), cc)), wbr(cfv(cabs, co(cv(s2), cmin, c0)), clt, cv(s0)), wbr(cfv(cabs, co(cfv(c1, cv(s2)), cmin, cfv(c1, c0))), clt, cv(s0)), wbr(cfv(cabs, co(cfv(c1, cv(s2)), cmin, cfv(c1, c0))), cle, cfv(cabs, co(cv(s2), cmin, c0))))
  syl2anc(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(cv(s0), crp)), wcel(cv(s2), cc)), wbr(cfv(cabs, co(cfv(c1, cv(s2)), cmin, cfv(c1, c0))), cle, cfv(cabs, co(cv(s2), cmin, c0))), wcel(cv(s2), cc), wcel(c0, cc))
  syl3anc(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(cv(s0), crp)), wcel(cv(s2), cc)), wi(wa(wbr(cfv(cabs, co(cfv(c1, cv(s2)), cmin, cfv(c1, c0))), cle, cfv(cabs, co(cv(s2), cmin, c0))), wbr(cfv(cabs, co(cv(s2), cmin, c0)), clt, cv(s0))), wbr(cfv(cabs, co(cfv(c1, cv(s2)), cmin, cfv(c1, c0))), clt, cv(s0))), wcel(cfv(cabs, co(cfv(c1, cv(s2)), cmin, cfv(c1, c0))), cr), wcel(cfv(cabs, co(cv(s2), cmin, c0)), cr), wcel(cv(s0), cr))
  abscld(co(cfv(c1, cv(s2)), cmin, cfv(c1, c0)), wa(wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(cv(s0), crp)), wcel(cv(s2), cc)))
  subcld(cfv(c1, cv(s2)), cfv(c1, c0), wa(wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(cv(s0), crp)), wcel(cv(s2), cc)))
  syl(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(cv(s0), crp)), wcel(cv(s2), cc)), wcel(cfv(c1, cv(s2)), cc), wcel(cv(s2), cc))
  ffvelrni(cv(s2), cc, c1, cc)
  syl(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(cv(s0), crp)), wcel(cv(s2), cc)), wcel(cfv(c1, c0), cc), wcel(c0, cc))
  ffvelrni(c0, cc, c1, cc)
  abscld(co(cv(s2), cmin, c0), wa(wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(cv(s0), crp)), wcel(cv(s2), cc)))
  subcld(cv(s2), c0, wa(wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(cv(s0), crp)), wcel(cv(s2), cc)))

  rspceaimv(s2, s1, cv(s0), crp, cc, wbr(cfv(cabs, co(cv(s2), cmin, c0)), clt, cv(s0)), wbr(cfv(cabs, co(cfv(c1, cv(s2)), cmin, cfv(c1, c0))), clt, cv(s0)), wbr(cfv(cabs, co(cv(s2), cmin, c0)), clt, cv(s1)))

  diff.wbr.s(s1, cfv(cabs, co(cv(s2), cmin, c0)), clt, cv(s0))
  diff.cfv.s(s1, cabs, co(cv(s2), cmin, c0))
  diff.co.s(s1, cv(s2), cmin, c0)
  diff.wbr.s(s1, cfv(cabs, co(cfv(c1, cv(s2)), cmin, cfv(c1, c0))), clt, cv(s0))
  diff.cfv.s(s1, cabs, co(cfv(c1, cv(s2)), cmin, cfv(c1, c0)))
  diff.cabs.s(s1)
  diff.co.s(s1, cfv(c1, cv(s2)), cmin, cfv(c1, c0))
  diff.cfv.s(s1, c1, cv(s2))
  diff.cv.s(s1, s2)
  diff.cmin.s(s1)
  diff.cfv.s(s1, c1, c0)
  diff.clt.s(s1)

thm cn1lem(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈ ℂ ∧ s0 ∈ ℝ+)→ ∃(s1 ∈ ℝ+, ∀(s2 ∈ ℂ,((abs `(s2[-]c0))[<]s1 →(abs `((c1 ` s2)[-](c1 ` c0)))[<]s0))))
  ⊣ (c1 : ℂ → ℂ)
  ⊣ ((s2 ∈ ℂ ∧ c0 ∈ ℂ)→(abs `((c1 ` s2)[-](c1 ` c0)))[≤](abs `(s2[-]c0)))
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, s2)
  ⊣ d(s1, s2)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c1)
  ⊣ d(s2, c0)
} = {
  syl2anc((c0 ∈ ℂ ∧ s0 ∈ ℝ+), ∃(s1 ∈ ℝ+, ∀(s2 ∈ ℂ,((abs `(s2[-]c0))[<]s1 →(abs `((c1 ` s2)[-](c1 ` c0)))[<]s0))), s0 ∈ ℝ+, ∀(s2 ∈ ℂ,((abs `(s2[-]c0))[<]s0 →(abs `((c1 ` s2)[-](c1 ` c0)))[<]s0)))
  simpr(c0 ∈ ℂ, s0 ∈ ℝ+)
  ralrimiva(s2, cc, (c0 ∈ ℂ ∧ s0 ∈ ℝ+), ((abs `(s2[-]c0))[<]s0 →(abs `((c1 ` s2)[-](c1 ` c0)))[<]s0))
  mpand(((c0 ∈ ℂ ∧ s0 ∈ ℝ+)∧ s2 ∈ ℂ), (abs `(s2[-]c0))[<]s0, (abs `((c1 ` s2)[-](c1 ` c0)))[<]s0, (abs `((c1 ` s2)[-](c1 ` c0)))[≤](abs `(s2[-]c0)))
  syl2anc(((c0 ∈ ℂ ∧ s0 ∈ ℝ+)∧ s2 ∈ ℂ), (abs `((c1 ` s2)[-](c1 ` c0)))[≤](abs `(s2[-]c0)), s2 ∈ ℂ, c0 ∈ ℂ)
  syl3anc(((c0 ∈ ℂ ∧ s0 ∈ ℝ+)∧ s2 ∈ ℂ), (((abs `((c1 ` s2)[-](c1 ` c0)))[≤](abs `(s2[-]c0))∧(abs `(s2[-]c0))[<]s0)→(abs `((c1 ` s2)[-](c1 ` c0)))[<]s0), (abs `((c1 ` s2)[-](c1 ` c0)))∈ ℝ, (abs `(s2[-]c0))∈ ℝ, s0 ∈ ℝ)
  abscld(((c1 ` s2)[-](c1 ` c0)), ((c0 ∈ ℂ ∧ s0 ∈ ℝ+)∧ s2 ∈ ℂ))
  subcld((c1 ` s2), (c1 ` c0), ((c0 ∈ ℂ ∧ s0 ∈ ℝ+)∧ s2 ∈ ℂ))
  syl(((c0 ∈ ℂ ∧ s0 ∈ ℝ+)∧ s2 ∈ ℂ), (c1 ` s2)∈ ℂ, s2 ∈ ℂ)
  ffvelrni(s2, cc, c1, cc)
  syl(((c0 ∈ ℂ ∧ s0 ∈ ℝ+)∧ s2 ∈ ℂ), (c1 ` c0)∈ ℂ, c0 ∈ ℂ)
  ffvelrni(c0, cc, c1, cc)
  abscld((s2[-]c0), ((c0 ∈ ℂ ∧ s0 ∈ ℝ+)∧ s2 ∈ ℂ))
  subcld(s2, c0, ((c0 ∈ ℂ ∧ s0 ∈ ℝ+)∧ s2 ∈ ℂ))
  simpr((c0 ∈ ℂ ∧ s0 ∈ ℝ+), s2 ∈ ℂ)
  simpll(c0 ∈ ℂ, s0 ∈ ℝ+, s2 ∈ ℂ)
  ad2antlr(c0 ∈ ℂ, s0 ∈ ℝ+, s2 ∈ ℂ, s0 ∈ ℝ)
  rpre(s0)
  lelttr((abs `((c1 ` s2)[-](c1 ` c0))), (abs `(s2[-]c0)), s0)
  rspceaimv(s2, s1, s0, crp, cc, (abs `(s2[-]c0))[<]s0, (abs `((c1 ` s2)[-](c1 ` c0)))[<]s0, (abs `(s2[-]c0))[<]s1)
  breq2(s1, s0, (abs `(s2[-]c0)), clt)
  diff.wa.s(s2, c0 ∈ ℂ, s0 ∈ ℝ+)
  diff.wcel.s(s2, c0, cc)
  diff.cc.s(s2)
  diff.wcel.s(s2, s0, crp)
  diff.crp.s(s2)

  diff.cabs.s(s1)
  diff.co.s(s1, (c1 ` s2), cmin, (c1 ` c0))
  diff.cfv.s(s1, c1, s2)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s2)
  diff.cmin.s(s1)

  diff.clt.s(s1)

thm climcn1lem(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 → c0[~~>](c1 ` c2))
  ⊣ c3 =(ℤ≥ ` c4)
  ⊣ (w0 → c5[~~>]c2)
  ⊣ (w0 → c0 ∈ c6)
  ⊣ (w0 → c4 ∈ ℤ)
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c3)→(c5 ` s0)∈ ℂ)
  ⊣ (c1 : ℂ → ℂ)
  ⊣ ((c2 ∈ ℂ ∧ s1 ∈ ℝ+)→ ∃(s2 ∈ ℝ+, ∀(s3 ∈ ℂ,((abs `(s3[-]c2))[<]s2 →(abs `((c1 ` s3)[-](c1 ` c2)))[<]s1))))
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c3)→(c0 ` s0)=(c1 `(c5 ` s0)))
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, s2)
  ⊣ d(s0, s3)
  ⊣ d(s1, s2)
  ⊣ d(s1, s3)
  ⊣ d(s2, s3)

  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)

  ⊣ d(s0, c4)
  ⊣ d(s0, c5)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c1)
  ⊣ d(s1, c2)
  ⊣ d(s2, c1)
  ⊣ d(s2, c2)
  ⊣ d(s2, c3)
  ⊣ d(s2, c5)
  ⊣ d(s3, c1)
  ⊣ d(s3, c2)
  ⊣ d(s3, c5)
  ⊣ d(s0, w0)
  ⊣ d(s1, w0)
  ⊣ d(s2, w0)
  ⊣ d(s3, w0)
} = {
  a1ii((w0 → c0[~~>](c1 ` c2)), d(s0, c4))
  climcn1(s3, s1, s2, s0, c0, c1, c2, c3, c4, cc, c5, c6, w0)
  adantl(w0, s3 ∈ ℂ, (c1 ` s3)∈ ℂ)
  ffvelrni(s3, cc, c1, cc)
  sylan(w0, s1 ∈ ℝ+, ∃(s2 ∈ ℝ+, ∀(s3 ∈ ℂ,((abs `(s3[-]c2))[<]s2 →(abs `((c1 ` s3)[-](c1 ` c2)))[<]s1))), c2 ∈ ℂ)
  syl(w0, c2 ∈ ℂ, c5[~~>]c2)

  diffss.ex(s3, s2)

  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s2, s0)

  diff.cc.s(s0)

blocks.name: o1add
blocks.content: The sum of two eventually bounded functions is eventually bounded. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 15-Sep-2014.) (Proof shortened by Fan Zheng, 14-Jul-2016.)
blocks.origin:
thm o1add(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, co1), wcel(c1, co1)), wcel(co(c0, cof(caddc), c1), co1))
} = {
  o1of2(hs2, hs3, hs0, hs1, c0, c1, caddc, co(cv(hs2), caddc, cv(hs3)))

thm rlimo1(class c0, class c1) {
  ⊢ (c0[~~>r]c1 → c0 ∈ O(1))
} = {
  mpbird(c0[~~>r]c1, c0 ∈ O(1), ∃(hs0 ∈ ℝ, ∃(hs2 ∈ ℝ, ∀(hs1 ∈ dom(c0),(hs0[≤]hs1 →(abs `(c0 ` hs1))[≤]hs2)))))
  mpd(c0[~~>r]c1, ∃(hs0 ∈ ℝ, ∃(hs2 ∈ ℝ, ∀(hs1 ∈ dom(c0),(hs0[≤]hs1 →(abs `(c0 ` hs1))[≤]hs2)))), ∃(hs0 ∈ ℝ, ∀(hs1 ∈ dom(c0),(hs0[≤]hs1 →(abs `((c0 ` hs1)[-]c1))[<]1))))
  rlimi(hs0, hs1, dom(c0), (c0 ` hs1), c1, nat1, cc, c0[~~>r]c1)
  ralrimiva(hs1, dom(c0), c0[~~>r]c1, (c0 ` hs1)∈ ℂ)
  a1i(c0[~~>r]c1, 1 ∈ ℝ+)
  1rp()
  eqbrtrrd((hs1 ∈ dom(c0)↦(c0 ` hs1)), crli, c1, c0, c0[~~>r]c1)
  feqmptd(hs1, c0, dom(c0), cc, c0[~~>r]c1)
