blocks.name: o1const
blocks.content: A constant function is eventually bounded. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 15-Sep-2014.) (Proof shortened by Mario Carneiro, 26-May-2016.)

blocks.name: lo1const
blocks.content: A constant function is eventually upper bounded. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 26-May-2016.)
blocks.origin:
thm lo1const(setvar s0, class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wa(wss(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr)), wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), clo1))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
} = {
  ello1d(s0, c0, c1, c1, c1, wa(wss(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr)))
  simpl(wss(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr))
  simplr(wss(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr), wcel(cv(s0), c0))
  simpr(wss(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr))
  ad2antlr(wss(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wbr(c1, cle, cv(s0))), wbr(c1, cle, c1))
  leid(c1)
  diff.wa.s(s0, wss(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr))
  diff.wss.s(s0, c0, cr)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c1, cr)
  diff.cr.s(s0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm lo1const(setvar s0, class c0, class c1) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ⊆ ℝ ∧ c1 ∈ ℝ)→(s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1)∈ ≤O(1))
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
} = {
  ello1d(s0, c0, c1, c1, c1, (c0 ⊆ ℝ ∧ c1 ∈ ℝ))
  simpl(c0 ⊆ ℝ, c1 ∈ ℝ)
  simplr(c0 ⊆ ℝ, c1 ∈ ℝ, s0 ∈ c0)
  simpr(c0 ⊆ ℝ, c1 ∈ ℝ)
  ad2antlr(c0 ⊆ ℝ, c1 ∈ ℝ, (s0 ∈ c0 ∧ c1[≤]s0), c1[≤]c1)
  leid(c1)
  diff.wa.s(s0, c0 ⊆ ℝ, c1 ∈ ℝ)
  diff.wss.s(s0, c0, cr)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c1, cr)
  diff.cr.s(s0)
}

blocks.name: lo1mptrcl
blocks.content: Reverse closure for an eventually upper bounded function. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 26-May-2016.)
blocks.origin:
thm lo1mptrcl(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  |- wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(c1, cr))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(c1, c2))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), clo1))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)

blocks.name: lo1mul
blocks.content: The product of an eventually upper bounded function and a positive eventually upper bounded function is eventually upper bounded. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 26-May-2016.)

  syl6bb(w0, wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), clo1), wrex(hs1, cr, wrex(hs0, cr, wral(s0, c0, wi(wbr(cv(hs0), cle, cv(s0)), wbr(c1, cle, cv(hs1)))))), wrex(hs0, cr, wrex(hs1, cr, wral(s0, c0, wi(wbr(cv(hs0), cle, cv(s0)), wbr(c1, cle, cv(hs1)))))))

blocks.name: lo1mul2
blocks.content: The product of an eventually upper bounded function and a positive eventually upper bounded function is eventually upper bounded. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 26-May-2016.)
blocks.origin:
thm lo1mul2(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, co(c1, cmul, c2)), clo1))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(c2, c3))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(c1, c3))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, c2), clo1))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), clo1))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wbr(nat0, cle, c2))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
} = {
  eqeltrd(cmpt(s0, c0, co(c1, cmul, c2)), clo1, cmpt(s0, c0, co(c2, cmul, c1)), w0)
  mpteq2dva(s0, c0, co(c1, cmul, c2), co(c2, cmul, c1), w0)
  mulcomd(c1, c2, wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)))
  recnd(c1, wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)))
  lo1mptrcl(s0, c0, c1, c3, w0)
  recnd(c2, wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)))
  lo1mptrcl(s0, c0, c2, c3, w0)
  lo1mul(s0, c0, c2, c1, c3, w0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm lo1mul2(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 →(s0 ∈ c0 ↦(c1[×]c2))∈ ≤O(1))
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c0)→ c2 ∈ c3)
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c0)→ c1 ∈ c3)
  ⊣ (w0 →(s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c2)∈ ≤O(1))
  ⊣ (w0 →(s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1)∈ ≤O(1))
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c0)→ 0[≤]c2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, w0)
} = {
  eqeltrd((s0 ∈ c0 ↦(c1[×]c2)), clo1, (s0 ∈ c0 ↦(c2[×]c1)), w0)
  mpteq2dva(s0, c0, (c1[×]c2), (c2[×]c1), w0)
  mulcomd(c1, c2, (w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c0))
  recnd(c1, (w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c0))
  lo1mptrcl(s0, c0, c1, c3, w0)
  recnd(c2, (w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c0))
  lo1mptrcl(s0, c0, c2, c3, w0)
  lo1mul(s0, c0, c2, c1, c3, w0)
}

blocks.name: o1dif
blocks.content: If the difference of two functions is eventually bounded, eventual boundedness of either one implies the other. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 26-May-2016.)
blocks.origin:
thm o1dif(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wb(wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), co1), wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, c2), co1)))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(c1, cc))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(c2, cc))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, co(c1, cmin, c2)), co1))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
} = {
  impbid(w0, wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), co1), wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, c2), co1))
  sylibd(w0, wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), co1), wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, c2), co1), wcel(co(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), cof(cmin), cmpt(s0, c0, co(c1, cmin, c2))), co1))
  syl(w0, wi(wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), co1), wcel(co(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), cof(cmin), cmpt(s0, c0, co(c1, cmin, c2))), co1)), wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, co(c1, cmin, c2)), co1))
  expcom(wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, co(c1, cmin, c2)), co1), wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), co1), wcel(co(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), cof(cmin), cmpt(s0, c0, co(c1, cmin, c2))), co1))
  o1sub(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), cmpt(s0, c0, co(c1, cmin, c2)))
  eleq1d(co(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), cof(cmin), cmpt(s0, c0, co(c1, cmin, c2))), co1, cmpt(s0, c0, c2), w0)
  eqtrd(co(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), cof(cmin), cmpt(s0, c0, co(c1, cmin, c2))), cmpt(s0, c0, c2), cmpt(s0, c0, co(c1, cmin, co(c1, cmin, c2))), w0)
  offval2(s0, cmpt(s0, c0, c1), cmin, cmpt(s0, c0, co(c1, cmin, c2)), c0, c1, co(c1, cmin, c2), universe, cc, cc, w0)
  eqidd(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), w0)
  mpteq2dva(s0, c0, co(c1, cmin, co(c1, cmin, c2)), c2, w0)
  nncand(c1, c2, wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)))
  sylibd(w0, wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, c2), co1), wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), co1), wcel(co(cmpt(s0, c0, co(c1, cmin, c2)), cof(caddc), cmpt(s0, c0, c2)), co1))
  syl(w0, wi(wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, c2), co1), wcel(co(cmpt(s0, c0, co(c1, cmin, c2)), cof(caddc), cmpt(s0, c0, c2)), co1)), wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, co(c1, cmin, c2)), co1))
  ex(wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, co(c1, cmin, c2)), co1), wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, c2), co1), wcel(co(cmpt(s0, c0, co(c1, cmin, c2)), cof(caddc), cmpt(s0, c0, c2)), co1))
  o1add(cmpt(s0, c0, co(c1, cmin, c2)), cmpt(s0, c0, c2))
  eleq1d(co(cmpt(s0, c0, co(c1, cmin, c2)), cof(caddc), cmpt(s0, c0, c2)), co1, cmpt(s0, c0, c1), w0)
  eqtrd(co(cmpt(s0, c0, co(c1, cmin, c2)), cof(caddc), cmpt(s0, c0, c2)), cmpt(s0, c0, c1), cmpt(s0, c0, co(co(c1, cmin, c2), caddc, c2)), w0)
  offval2(s0, cmpt(s0, c0, co(c1, cmin, c2)), caddc, cmpt(s0, c0, c2), c0, co(c1, cmin, c2), c2, universe, cc, cc, w0)
  syl(w0, wcel(c0, universe), wss(c0, cr))
  eqsstr3d(c0, cr, cdm(cmpt(s0, c0, co(c1, cmin, c2))), w0)
  syl(w0, wceq(cdm(cmpt(s0, c0, co(c1, cmin, c2))), c0), wral(s0, c0, wcel(co(c1, cmin, c2), cc)))
  ralrimiva(s0, c0, w0, wcel(co(c1, cmin, c2), cc))
  dmmptg(s0, c0, co(c1, cmin, c2), cc)
  syl(w0, wss(cdm(cmpt(s0, c0, co(c1, cmin, c2))), cr), wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, co(c1, cmin, c2)), co1))
  o1dm(cmpt(s0, c0, co(c1, cmin, c2)))
  ssex(c0, cr)
  reex()
  subcld(c1, c2, wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)))
  eqidd(cmpt(s0, c0, co(c1, cmin, c2)), w0)
  eqidd(cmpt(s0, c0, c2), w0)
  mpteq2dva(s0, c0, co(co(c1, cmin, c2), caddc, c2), c1, w0)
  npcand(c1, c2, wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)))
  diff.cmin.s(s0)
  diff.caddc.s(s0)
}

blocks.name: lo1sub
blocks.content: The difference of an eventually upper bounded function and an eventually bounded function is eventually upper bounded. The "correct" sharp result here takes the second function to be eventually lower bounded instead of just bounded, but our notation for this is simply ` ( x e. A |-> -u C ) e. <_O(1) ` , so it is just a special case of ~ lo1add . (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 31-May-2016.)
blocks.origin:
thm lo1sub(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, co(c1, cmin, c2)), clo1))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(c1, c3))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(c2, cr))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), clo1))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, c2), co1))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
} = {
  eqeltrrd(cmpt(s0, c0, co(c1, cmin, c2)), clo1, cmpt(s0, c0, co(c1, caddc, cneg(c2))), w0)
  mpteq2dva(s0, c0, co(c1, caddc, cneg(c2)), co(c1, cmin, c2), w0)
  negsubd(c1, c2, wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)))
  recnd(c1, wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)))
  recnd(c2, wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)))
  lo1add(s0, c0, c1, cneg(c2), cr, w0)
  lo1mptrcl(s0, c0, c1, c3, w0)
  renegcld(c2, wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)))
  simprd(w0, wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, cneg(c2)), clo1), wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, c2), clo1))
  mpbid(w0, wa(wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, c2), clo1), wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, cneg(c2)), clo1)), wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, c2), co1))
  o1lo1(s0, c0, c2, w0)
}

blocks.name: climadd
blocks.content: Limit of the sum of two converging sequences. Proposition 12-2.1(a) of [Gleason] p. 168. (Contributed by NM, 24-Sep-2005.) (Proof shortened by Mario Carneiro, 31-Jan-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm climadd(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wbr(c0, cli, co(c1, caddc, c2)))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(cuz, c4))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c4, cz))
  -| wi(w0, wbr(c5, cli, c1))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c6))
  -| wi(w0, wbr(c7, cli, c2))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c3)), wcel(cfv(c5, cv(s0)), cc))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c3)), wcel(cfv(c7, cv(s0)), cc))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c3)), wceq(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), co(cfv(c5, cv(s0)), caddc, cfv(c7, cv(s0)))))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
  -| diffsc(s0, c5)
  -| diffsc(s0, c7)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
} = {
  a1ii(wi(w0, wbr(c0, cli, co(c1, caddc, c2))), diffsc(s0, c4))
  climcn2(hs4, hs3, hs0, hs1, hs2, s0, c0, c1, caddc, c2, c3, c4, cc, cc, c5, c7, c6, w0)
  adantl(w0, wa(wcel(cv(hs4), cc), wcel(cv(hs3), cc)), wcel(co(cv(hs4), caddc, cv(hs3)), cc))
  addcl(cv(hs4), cv(hs3))
  syl3anc(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), crp)), wrex(hs1, crp, wrex(hs2, crp, wral(hs4, cc, wral(hs3, cc, wi(wa(wbr(cfv(cabs, co(cv(hs4), cmin, c1)), clt, cv(hs1)), wbr(cfv(cabs, co(cv(hs3), cmin, c2)), clt, cv(hs2))), wbr(cfv(cabs, co(co(cv(hs4), caddc, cv(hs3)), cmin, co(c1, caddc, c2))), clt, cv(hs0))))))), wcel(cv(hs0), crp), wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c2, cc))
  simpr(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), crp))
  adantr(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), crp), wcel(c1, cc))
  syl(w0, wcel(c1, cc), wbr(c5, cli, c1))
  climcl(c5, c1)
  adantr(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), crp), wcel(c2, cc))
  syl(w0, wcel(c2, cc), wbr(c7, cli, c2))
  climcl(c7, c2)
  addcn2(hs1, hs2, hs4, hs3, cv(hs0), c1, c2)
  diff.hs4.s(hs3)
  diff.hs4.s(hs0)
  diff.hs4.s(hs1)
  diff.hs4.s(hs2)
  diff.hs4.s(s0)
  diff.hs3.s(hs0)
  diff.hs3.s(hs1)
  diff.hs3.s(hs2)
  diff.hs3.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)

  diff.hs2.s(s0)
  diff.hs4.c(c1)

  diff.hs4.c(c2)
  diff.hs4.c(cc)
  diff.hs4.c(c5)
  diff.hs3.c(c1)

  mptex(hs0, c2, co(cfv(c5, cv(hs0)), cmin, cfv(c4, cv(hs0))))

thm climle(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 → c0[≤]c1)
  ⊣ c2 =(ℤ≥ ` c3)

  ⊣ (w0 → c4[~~>]c0)
  ⊣ (w0 → c5[~~>]c1)
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c2)→(c4 ` s0)∈ ℝ)

  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c2)→(c4 ` s0)[≤](c5 ` s0))
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c3)
  ⊣ d(s0, c4)
  ⊣ d(s0, c5)

} = {
  mpbid(w0, c0[≤]c1, 0[≤](c1[-]c0))
  climge0(s0, (c1[-]c0), c2, c3, (hs0 ∈ c2 ↦((c5 ` hs0)[-](c4 ` hs0))), w0)
  climsub(s0, (hs0 ∈ c2 ↦((c5 ` hs0)[-](c4 ` hs0))), c1, c0, c2, c3, c5, universe, c4, w0)
  a1i(w0, (hs0 ∈ c2 ↦((c5 ` hs0)[-](c4 ` hs0)))∈ 𝕌)
  mptex(hs0, c2, ((c5 ` hs0)[-](c4 ` hs0)))
  fvexi(c2, cuz, c3)
  recnd((c5 ` s0), (w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c2))
  recnd((c4 ` s0), (w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c2))
  eqeltrd(((hs0 ∈ c2 ↦((c5 ` hs0)[-](c4 ` hs0)))` s0), cr, ((c5 ` s0)[-](c4 ` s0)), (w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c2))
  resubcld((c5 ` s0), (c4 ` s0), (w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c2))
  breqtrrd(nat0, cle, ((hs0 ∈ c2 ↦((c5 ` hs0)[-](c4 ` hs0)))` s0), ((c5 ` s0)[-](c4 ` s0)), (w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c2))
  mpbird((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c2), 0[≤]((c5 ` s0)[-](c4 ` s0)), (c4 ` s0)[≤](c5 ` s0))
  subge0d((c5 ` s0), (c4 ` s0), (w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c2))
  adantl(w0, s0 ∈ c2, ((hs0 ∈ c2 ↦((c5 ` hs0)[-](c4 ` hs0)))` s0)=((c5 ` s0)[-](c4 ` s0)))
  fvmpt(hs0, s0, c2, (hs0 ∈ c2 ↦((c5 ` hs0)[-](c4 ` hs0))), ((c5 ` s0)[-](c4 ` s0)), ((c5 ` hs0)[-](c4 ` hs0)))
  oveq12d((c5 ` hs0), cmin, (c4 ` hs0), (c5 ` s0), (c4 ` s0), hs0 = s0)
  fveq2(hs0, s0, c5)
  fveq2(hs0, s0, c4)
  eqid((hs0 ∈ c2 ↦((c5 ` hs0)[-](c4 ` hs0))))
  ovex((c5 ` s0), cmin, (c4 ` s0))
  subge0d(c1, c0, w0)
  climrecl(s0, c1, c2, c3, c5, w0)
  climrecl(s0, c0, c2, c3, c4, w0)
  diff.co.s(s0, c1, cmin, c0)
  diff.cmpt.s(s0, hs0, c2, ((c5 ` hs0)[-](c4 ` hs0)))
  diff.co.s(s0, (c5 ` hs0), cmin, (c4 ` hs0))
  diff.cfv.s(s0, c5, hs0)

  diff.cfv.s(s0, c4, hs0)

  diff.hs0.s(s0)

  adantlr(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), crp), wcel(cv(s0), c2), wbr(cfv(cabs, co(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), cmin, c1)), cle, cfv(cabs, co(cfv(c4, cv(s0)), cmin, c1))))
  3brtr4d(cfv(cabs, co(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), cmin, c1)), cle, cfv(cabs, co(cfv(c4, cv(s0)), cmin, c1)), co(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), cmin, c1), co(cfv(c4, cv(s0)), cmin, c1), wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c2)))
  lesub1dd(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), c1, cfv(c4, cv(s0)), wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c2)))

  resubcld(cfv(c4, cv(s0)), c1, wa(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), crp)), wcel(cv(s0), c2)))

  ad2antlr(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), crp), wcel(cv(s0), c2), wcel(cv(hs0), cr))

  climrecl(s0, c1, c2, c3, c4, w0)

  diff.hs1.c(c1)

  diff.hs1.c(c3)
  diff.hs1.c(c4)

thm climsqz2(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 → c0[~~>]c1)
  ⊣ c2 =(ℤ≥ ` c3)
  ⊣ (w0 → c3 ∈ ℤ)
  ⊣ (w0 → c4[~~>]c1)
  ⊣ (w0 → c0 ∈ c5)
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c2)→(c4 ` s0)∈ ℝ)
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c2)→(c0 ` s0)∈ ℝ)
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c2)→(c0 ` s0)[≤](c4 ` s0))
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c2)→ c1[≤](c0 ` s0))
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c3)
  ⊣ d(s0, c4)
  ⊣ d(s0, w0)
} = {
  mpbird(w0, c0[~~>]c1, ∀(hs0 ∈ ℝ+, ∃(hs1 ∈ c2, ∀(s0 ∈(ℤ≥ ` hs1),(abs `((c0 ` s0)[-]c1))[<]hs0))))
  ralrimiva(hs0, crp, w0, ∃(hs1 ∈ c2, ∀(s0 ∈(ℤ≥ ` hs1),(abs `((c0 ` s0)[-]c1))[<]hs0)))
  mpd((w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ ℝ+), ∃(hs1 ∈ c2, ∀(s0 ∈(ℤ≥ ` hs1),(abs `((c0 ` s0)[-]c1))[<]hs0)), ∃(hs1 ∈ c2, ∀(s0 ∈(ℤ≥ ` hs1),(abs `((c4 ` s0)[-]c1))[<]hs0)))
  climi2(hs1, s0, c2, (c4 ` s0), c1, hs0, c3, c4, (w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ ℝ+))
  adantr(w0, hs0 ∈ ℝ+, c3 ∈ ℤ)
  simpr(w0, hs0 ∈ ℝ+)
  eqidd((c4 ` s0), ((w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ ℝ+)∧ s0 ∈ c2))
  adantr(w0, hs0 ∈ ℝ+, c4[~~>]c1)
  reximdva(hs1, c2, (w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ ℝ+), ∀(s0 ∈(ℤ≥ ` hs1),(abs `((c4 ` s0)[-]c1))[<]hs0), ∀(s0 ∈(ℤ≥ ` hs1),(abs `((c0 ` s0)[-]c1))[<]hs0))
  ralimdva(s0, (ℤ≥ ` hs1), ((w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ ℝ+)∧ hs1 ∈ c2), (abs `((c4 ` s0)[-]c1))[<]hs0, (abs `((c0 ` s0)[-]c1))[<]hs0)
  anassrs((w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ ℝ+), hs1 ∈ c2, s0 ∈(ℤ≥ ` hs1), ((abs `((c4 ` s0)[-]c1))[<]hs0 →(abs `((c0 ` s0)[-]c1))[<]hs0))
  sylan2((w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ ℝ+), (hs1 ∈ c2 ∧ s0 ∈(ℤ≥ ` hs1)), ((abs `((c4 ` s0)[-]c1))[<]hs0 →(abs `((c0 ` s0)[-]c1))[<]hs0), s0 ∈ c2)
  uztrn2(hs1, c2, s0, c3)
  mpand(((w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ ℝ+)∧ s0 ∈ c2), (abs `((c4 ` s0)[-]c1))[<]hs0, (abs `((c0 ` s0)[-]c1))[<]hs0, (abs `((c0 ` s0)[-]c1))[≤](abs `((c4 ` s0)[-]c1)))
  adantlr(w0, hs0 ∈ ℝ+, s0 ∈ c2, (abs `((c0 ` s0)[-]c1))[≤](abs `((c4 ` s0)[-]c1)))
  3brtr4d((abs `((c0 ` s0)[-]c1)), cle, (abs `((c4 ` s0)[-]c1)), ((c0 ` s0)[-]c1), ((c4 ` s0)[-]c1), (w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c2))
  lesub1dd((c0 ` s0), c1, (c4 ` s0), (w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c2))
  abssubge0d((c0 ` s0), c1, (w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c2))
  abssubge0d((c4 ` s0), c1, (w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c2))
  letrd(c1, (c4 ` s0), (c0 ` s0), (w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c2))
  adantr(w0, s0 ∈ c2, c1 ∈ ℝ)
  syl3anc(((w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ ℝ+)∧ s0 ∈ c2), (((abs `((c0 ` s0)[-]c1))[≤](abs `((c4 ` s0)[-]c1))∧(abs `((c4 ` s0)[-]c1))[<]hs0)→(abs `((c0 ` s0)[-]c1))[<]hs0), (abs `((c0 ` s0)[-]c1))∈ ℝ, (abs `((c4 ` s0)[-]c1))∈ ℝ, hs0 ∈ ℝ)
  abscld(((c0 ` s0)[-]c1), ((w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ ℝ+)∧ s0 ∈ c2))
  recnd(((c0 ` s0)[-]c1), ((w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ ℝ+)∧ s0 ∈ c2))
  resubcld((c0 ` s0), c1, ((w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ ℝ+)∧ s0 ∈ c2))
  adantlr(w0, hs0 ∈ ℝ+, s0 ∈ c2, (c0 ` s0)∈ ℝ)
  abscld(((c4 ` s0)[-]c1), ((w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ ℝ+)∧ s0 ∈ c2))
  recnd(((c4 ` s0)[-]c1), ((w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ ℝ+)∧ s0 ∈ c2))
  resubcld((c4 ` s0), c1, ((w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ ℝ+)∧ s0 ∈ c2))
  adantlr(w0, hs0 ∈ ℝ+, s0 ∈ c2, (c4 ` s0)∈ ℝ)
  ad2antrr(w0, hs0 ∈ ℝ+, s0 ∈ c2, c1 ∈ ℝ)
  ad2antlr(w0, hs0 ∈ ℝ+, s0 ∈ c2, hs0 ∈ ℝ)
  rpre(hs0)

  clim2c(hs0, hs1, s0, c0, c1, c2, (c0 ` s0), c3, c5, w0)
  eqidd((c0 ` s0), (w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c2))
  recnd(c1, w0)
  climrecl(s0, c1, c2, c3, c4, w0)
  recnd((c0 ` s0), (w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c2))
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.hs1.c(c2)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c(hs0)
  diff.hs1.c(c3)
  diff.hs1.c(c4)
  diff.hs1.w((w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ ℝ+))
  diff.wa.s(s0, (w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ ℝ+), hs1 ∈ c2)
  diff.wa.s(s0, w0, hs0 ∈ ℝ+)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, hs0, crp)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.crp.s(s0)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, hs1, c2)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs1)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs1)
  diff.hs1.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)

blocks.name: rlimadd
blocks.content: Limit of the sum of two converging functions. Proposition 12-2.1(a) of [Gleason] p. 168. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 22-Sep-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm rlimadd(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wbr(cmpt(s0, c0, co(c1, caddc, c2)), crli, co(c3, caddc, c4)))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(c1, c5))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(c2, c5))
  -| wi(w0, wbr(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), crli, c3))
  -| wi(w0, wbr(cmpt(s0, c0, c2), crli, c4))

blocks.name: rlimneg
blocks.content: Limit of the negative of a sequence. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 18-May-2016.)
blocks.origin:
thm rlimneg(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wbr(cmpt(s0, c0, cneg(c1)), crli, cneg(c2)))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(c1, c3))
  -| wi(w0, wbr(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), crli, c2))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
} = {
  3brtr4g(cmpt(s0, c0, cneg(c1)), crli, cneg(c2), cmpt(s0, c0, co(nat0, cmin, c1)), co(nat0, cmin, c2), w0)
  rlimsub(s0, c0, nat0, c1, nat0, c2, cc, w0)
  0cnd(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)))
  rlimmptrcl(s0, c0, c1, c3, c2, w0)
  sylancl(w0, wbr(cmpt(s0, c0, nat0), crli, nat0), wss(c0, cr), wcel(nat0, cc))
  eqsstr3d(c0, cr, cdm(cmpt(s0, c0, c1)), w0)
  syl(w0, wceq(cdm(cmpt(s0, c0, c1)), c0), wral(s0, c0, wcel(c1, c3)))
  ralrimiva(s0, c0, w0, wcel(c1, c3))
  dmmptg(s0, c0, c1, c3)
  syl(w0, wss(cdm(cmpt(s0, c0, c1)), cr), wbr(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), crli, c2))
  rlimss(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), c2)
  0cn()
  rlimconst(s0, c0, nat0)
  mpteq2i(s0, c0, cneg(c1), co(nat0, cmin, c1))
  df-neg(c1)
  df-neg(c2)
  diff.nat0.s(s0)
}

thm rlimneg(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 →(s0 ∈ c0 ↦ -u(c1))[~~>r]-u(c2))
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c0)→ c1 ∈ c3)
  ⊣ (w0 →(s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1)[~~>r]c2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
  ⊣ d(s0, w0)
} = {
  3brtr4g((s0 ∈ c0 ↦ -u(c1)), crli, -u(c2), (s0 ∈ c0 ↦(0[-]c1)), (0[-]c2), w0)
  rlimsub(s0, c0, nat0, c1, nat0, c2, cc, w0)
  0cnd((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c0))
  rlimmptrcl(s0, c0, c1, c3, c2, w0)
  sylancl(w0, (s0 ∈ c0 ↦ 0)[~~>r]0, c0 ⊆ ℝ, 0 ∈ ℂ)
  eqsstr3d(c0, cr, dom((s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1)), w0)
  syl(w0, dom((s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1))= c0, ∀(s0 ∈ c0, c1 ∈ c3))
  ralrimiva(s0, c0, w0, c1 ∈ c3)
  dmmptg(s0, c0, c1, c3)
  syl(w0, dom((s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1))⊆ ℝ, (s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1)[~~>r]c2)
  rlimss((s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1), c2)
  0cn()
  rlimconst(s0, c0, nat0)

  df-neg(c2)

blocks.name: rlimle
blocks.content: Comparison of the limits of two sequences. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 10-May-2016.)
blocks.origin:
thm rlimle(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wbr(c0, cle, c1))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(csup(c2, cxr, clt), cpnf))
  -| wi(w0, wbr(cmpt(s0, c2, c3), crli, c0))
  -| wi(w0, wbr(cmpt(s0, c2, c4), crli, c1))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c2)), wcel(c3, cr))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c2)), wcel(c4, cr))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c2)), wbr(c3, cle, c4))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
} = {
  mpbid(w0, wbr(c0, cle, c1), wbr(nat0, cle, co(c1, cmin, c0)))
  rlimge0(s0, co(c1, cmin, c0), c2, co(c4, cmin, c3), w0)
  rlimsub(s0, c2, c4, c3, c1, c0, cr, w0)
  resubcld(c4, c3, wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c2)))
  mpbird(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c2)), wbr(nat0, cle, co(c4, cmin, c3)), wbr(c3, cle, c4))
  subge0d(c4, c3, wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c2)))
  subge0d(c1, c0, w0)
  rlimrecl(s0, c1, c2, c4, w0)
  rlimrecl(s0, c0, c2, c3, w0)
  diff.co.s(s0, c1, cmin, c0)
  diff.cmin.s(s0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm rlimle(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 → c0[≤]c1)
  ⊣ (w0 → sup(c2, ℝ*, <)= +∞)
  ⊣ (w0 →(s0 ∈ c2 ↦ c3)[~~>r]c0)
  ⊣ (w0 →(s0 ∈ c2 ↦ c4)[~~>r]c1)
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c2)→ c3 ∈ ℝ)

thm rlimsqz(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wbr(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), crli, c2))

  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(c4, cr))

  -| wi(wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wbr(c3, cle, cv(s0)))), wbr(c1, cle, c2))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)

  -| diffsc(s0, c3)

} = {

  recnd(c2, w0)

  abssuble0d(c4, c2, wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wbr(c3, cle, cv(s0)))))

blocks.name: lo1le
blocks.content: Transfer eventual upper boundedness from a larger function to a smaller function. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 26-May-2016.)

  syld(wa(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cr)), wa(wcel(cv(hs1), cr), wcel(cv(s0), c0))), wi(wbr(cv(hs0), cle, cv(s0)), wbr(c3, cle, cv(hs1))), wi(wbr(cif(cv(hs0), c2, wbr(c2, cle, cv(hs0))), cle, cv(s0)), wbr(c1, cle, cv(hs1))), wi(wbr(cif(cv(hs0), c2, wbr(c2, cle, cv(hs0))), cle, cv(s0)), wbr(c3, cle, cv(hs1))))

thm lo1le(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 →(s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1)∈ ≤O(1))
  ⊣ (w0 → c2 ∈ ℝ)
  ⊣ (w0 →(s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c3)∈ ≤O(1))
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c0)→ c3 ∈ c4)
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c0)→ c1 ∈ ℝ)
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧(s0 ∈ c0 ∧ c2[≤]s0))→ c1[≤]c3)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
  ⊣ d(s0, w0)
} = {
  mpd(w0, (s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1)∈ ≤O(1), (s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c3)∈ ≤O(1))
  3imtr4d(w0, (s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c3)∈ ≤O(1), (s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1)∈ ≤O(1), ∃(hs0 ∈ ℝ, ∃(hs1 ∈ ℝ, ∀(s0 ∈ c0,(hs0[≤]s0 → c3[≤]hs1)))), ∃(hs2 ∈ ℝ, ∃(hs1 ∈ ℝ, ∀(s0 ∈ c0,(hs2[≤]s0 → c1[≤]hs1)))))
  rexlimdva(hs0, cr, w0, ∃(hs1 ∈ ℝ, ∀(s0 ∈ c0,(hs0[≤]s0 → c3[≤]hs1))), ∃(hs2 ∈ ℝ, ∃(hs1 ∈ ℝ, ∀(s0 ∈ c0,(hs2[≤]s0 → c1[≤]hs1)))))

  ifcld(hs0, c2, cr, (w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ ℝ), c2[≤]hs0)
  simpr(w0, hs0 ∈ ℝ)
  adantr(w0, hs0 ∈ ℝ, c2 ∈ ℝ)
  reximdva(hs1, cr, (w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ ℝ), ∀(s0 ∈ c0,(hs0[≤]s0 → c3[≤]hs1)), ∀(s0 ∈ c0,(if(c2[≤]hs0, hs0, c2)[≤]s0 → c1[≤]hs1)))
  ralimdva(s0, c0, ((w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ ℝ)∧ hs1 ∈ ℝ), (hs0[≤]s0 → c3[≤]hs1), (if(c2[≤]hs0, hs0, c2)[≤]s0 → c1[≤]hs1))
  anassrs((w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ ℝ), hs1 ∈ ℝ, s0 ∈ c0, ((hs0[≤]s0 → c3[≤]hs1)→(if(c2[≤]hs0, hs0, c2)[≤]s0 → c1[≤]hs1)))
  syld(((w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ ℝ)∧(hs1 ∈ ℝ ∧ s0 ∈ c0)), (hs0[≤]s0 → c3[≤]hs1), (if(c2[≤]hs0, hs0, c2)[≤]s0 → c1[≤]hs1), (if(c2[≤]hs0, hs0, c2)[≤]s0 → c3[≤]hs1))
  imim1d(((w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ ℝ)∧(hs1 ∈ ℝ ∧ s0 ∈ c0)), hs0[≤]s0, c3[≤]hs1, if(c2[≤]hs0, hs0, c2)[≤]s0)
  syl6bi(((w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ ℝ)∧(hs1 ∈ ℝ ∧ s0 ∈ c0)), if(c2[≤]hs0, hs0, c2)[≤]s0, hs0[≤]s0, (c2[≤]s0 ∧ hs0[≤]s0))
  simpr(c2[≤]s0, hs0[≤]s0)
  a2d(((w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ ℝ)∧(hs1 ∈ ℝ ∧ s0 ∈ c0)), if(c2[≤]hs0, hs0, c2)[≤]s0, c3[≤]hs1, c1[≤]hs1)

  syl3anc(((w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ ℝ)∧(hs1 ∈ ℝ ∧ s0 ∈ c0)), (if(c2[≤]hs0, hs0, c2)[≤]s0 ↔(c2[≤]s0 ∧ hs0[≤]s0)), c2 ∈ ℝ, hs0 ∈ ℝ, s0 ∈ ℝ)

  adantlr(w0, hs0 ∈ ℝ, (s0 ∈ c0 ∧ c2[≤]s0), c1[≤]c3)
  syl3anc(((w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ ℝ)∧((hs1 ∈ ℝ ∧ s0 ∈ c0)∧ c2[≤]s0)), ((c1[≤]c3 ∧ c3[≤]hs1)→ c1[≤]hs1), c1 ∈ ℝ, c3 ∈ ℝ, hs1 ∈ ℝ)
  syl2an((w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ ℝ), ((hs1 ∈ ℝ ∧ s0 ∈ c0)∧ c2[≤]s0), c1 ∈ ℝ, w0, s0 ∈ c0)
  syl2an((w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ ℝ), ((hs1 ∈ ℝ ∧ s0 ∈ c0)∧ c2[≤]s0), c3 ∈ ℝ, w0, s0 ∈ c0)
  simpl(w0, hs0 ∈ ℝ)
  simplr(hs1 ∈ ℝ, s0 ∈ c0, c2[≤]s0)
  simprll((w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ ℝ), hs1 ∈ ℝ, s0 ∈ c0, c2[≤]s0)

  rspcev(hs2, if(c2[≤]hs0, hs0, c2), cr, ∃(hs1 ∈ ℝ, ∀(s0 ∈ c0,(if(c2[≤]hs0, hs0, c2)[≤]s0 → c1[≤]hs1))), ∃(hs1 ∈ ℝ, ∀(s0 ∈ c0,(hs2[≤]s0 → c1[≤]hs1))))
  rexralbidv(hs1, s0, cr, c0, hs2 = if(c2[≤]hs0, hs0, c2), (hs2[≤]s0 → c1[≤]hs1), (if(c2[≤]hs0, hs0, c2)[≤]s0 → c1[≤]hs1))
  imbi1d(hs2 = if(c2[≤]hs0, hs0, c2), hs2[≤]s0, c1[≤]hs1, if(c2[≤]hs0, hs0, c2)[≤]s0)
  breq1(hs2, if(c2[≤]hs0, hs0, c2), cle, s0)

  syl(w0, dom((s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c3))= c0, ∀(s0 ∈ c0, c3 ∈ c4))
  ralrimiva(s0, c0, w0, c3 ∈ c4)
  dmmptg(s0, c0, c3, c4)

  diff.wa.s(s0, w0, hs0 ∈ ℝ)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, hs0, cr)

blocks.name: o1le
blocks.content: Transfer eventual boundedness from a larger function to a smaller function. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 25-Sep-2014.) (Proof shortened by Mario Carneiro, 26-May-2016.)
blocks.origin:
thm o1le(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), co1))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, cr))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, c3), co1))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(c3, c4))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(c1, cc))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wbr(c2, cle, cv(s0)))), wbr(cfv(cabs, c1), cle, cfv(cabs, c3)))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
} = {
  mpbird(w0, wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), co1), wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, cfv(cabs, c1)), clo1))
  lo1le(s0, c0, cfv(cabs, c1), c2, cfv(cabs, c3), universe, w0)
  mpbid(w0, wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, cfv(cabs, c3)), clo1), wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, c3), co1))
  lo1o12(s0, c0, c3, w0)
  o1mptrcl(s0, c0, c3, c4, w0)
  fvexd(cabs, c3, wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)))
  abscld(c1, wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)))
  lo1o12(s0, c0, c1, w0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm o1le(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 →(s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1)∈ O(1))
  ⊣ (w0 → c2 ∈ ℝ)
  ⊣ (w0 →(s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c3)∈ O(1))
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c0)→ c3 ∈ c4)
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c0)→ c1 ∈ ℂ)
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧(s0 ∈ c0 ∧ c2[≤]s0))→(abs ` c1)[≤](abs ` c3))
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
  ⊣ d(s0, w0)
} = {
  mpbird(w0, (s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1)∈ O(1), (s0 ∈ c0 ↦(abs ` c1))∈ ≤O(1))
  lo1le(s0, c0, (abs ` c1), c2, (abs ` c3), universe, w0)
  mpbid(w0, (s0 ∈ c0 ↦(abs ` c3))∈ ≤O(1), (s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c3)∈ O(1))
  lo1o12(s0, c0, c3, w0)
  o1mptrcl(s0, c0, c3, c4, w0)
  fvexd(cabs, c3, (w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c0))
  abscld(c1, (w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c0))
  lo1o12(s0, c0, c1, w0)
}

  syl(w0, wceq(cdm(cmpt(s0, c0, co(nat1, cdiv, c1))), c0), wral(s0, c0, wcel(co(nat1, cdiv, c1), cc)))

thm clim2ser(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wbr(cseq(co(c0, caddc, nat1), caddc, c1), cli, co(c2, cmin, cfv(cseq(c3, caddc, c1), c0))))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(cuz, c3))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c4))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c4)), wcel(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), cc))
  -| wi(w0, wbr(cseq(c3, caddc, c1), cli, c2))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
} = {
  a1ii(wi(w0, wbr(cseq(co(c0, caddc, nat1), caddc, c1), cli, co(c2, cmin, cfv(cseq(c3, caddc, c1), c0)))), diffsc(s0, c2))
  climsubc1(hs0, cseq(co(c0, caddc, nat1), caddc, c1), c2, cfv(cseq(c3, caddc, c1), c0), cfv(cuz, co(c0, caddc, nat1)), co(c0, caddc, nat1), cseq(c3, caddc, c1), universe, w0)
  a1i(w0, wcel(cseq(co(c0, caddc, nat1), caddc, c1), universe))
  seqex(co(c0, caddc, nat1), caddc, c1)
  ffvelrnd(cseq(c3, caddc, c1), cv(hs0), cc, c4, wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cuz, co(c0, caddc, nat1)))))
  adantr(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cuz, co(c0, caddc, nat1))), wf(cseq(c3, caddc, c1), c4, cc))
  sylan(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cuz, co(c0, caddc, nat1))), wcel(cv(hs0), c4), wcel(co(c0, caddc, nat1), c4))
  uztrn2(co(c0, caddc, nat1), c4, cv(hs0), c3)
  eqtr2d(cfv(cseq(co(c0, caddc, nat1), caddc, c1), cv(hs0)), co(cfv(cseq(c3, caddc, c1), cv(hs0)), cmin, cfv(cseq(c3, caddc, c1), c0)), co(co(cfv(cseq(c3, caddc, c1), c0), caddc, cfv(cseq(co(c0, caddc, nat1), caddc, c1), cv(hs0))), cmin, cfv(cseq(c3, caddc, c1), c0)), wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cuz, co(c0, caddc, nat1)))))
  oveq1d(cfv(cseq(c3, caddc, c1), cv(hs0)), cmin, cfv(cseq(c3, caddc, c1), c0), co(cfv(cseq(c3, caddc, c1), c0), caddc, cfv(cseq(co(c0, caddc, nat1), caddc, c1), cv(hs0))), wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cuz, co(c0, caddc, nat1)))))
  seqsplit(s0, hs1, hs2, c3, caddc, c1, cv(hs0), c0, cc, wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cuz, co(c0, caddc, nat1)))))
  adantl(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cuz, co(c0, caddc, nat1)))), wa(wcel(cv(s0), cc), wcel(cv(hs1), cc)), wcel(co(cv(s0), caddc, cv(hs1)), cc))
  addcl(cv(s0), cv(hs1))
  adantl(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cuz, co(c0, caddc, nat1)))), w3a(wcel(cv(s0), cc), wcel(cv(hs1), cc), wcel(cv(hs2), cc)), wceq(co(co(cv(s0), caddc, cv(hs1)), caddc, cv(hs2)), co(cv(s0), caddc, co(cv(hs1), caddc, cv(hs2)))))
  addass(cv(s0), cv(hs1), cv(hs2))
  simpr(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cuz, co(c0, caddc, nat1))))
  adantr(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cuz, co(c0, caddc, nat1))), wcel(c0, cfv(cuz, c3)))
  adantlr(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cuz, co(c0, caddc, nat1))), wcel(cv(s0), co(c3, cfz, cv(hs0))), wcel(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), cc))
  sylan2(w0, wcel(cv(s0), co(c3, cfz, cv(hs0))), wcel(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), cc), wcel(cv(s0), c4))
  syl6eleqr(cv(s0), c4, cfv(cuz, c3), wcel(cv(s0), co(c3, cfz, cv(hs0))))
  elfzuz(cv(s0), c3, cv(hs0))
  pncan2d(cfv(cseq(c3, caddc, c1), c0), cfv(cseq(co(c0, caddc, nat1), caddc, c1), cv(hs0)), wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cuz, co(c0, caddc, nat1)))))
  adantr(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cuz, co(c0, caddc, nat1))), wcel(cfv(cseq(c3, caddc, c1), c0), cc))
  ffvelrnd(cseq(c3, caddc, c1), c0, cc, c4, w0)
  serf(s0, c3, c1, c4, w0)
  syl(w0, wcel(c3, cz), wcel(c0, cfv(cuz, c3)))
  eluzel2(c0, c3)
  ffvelrnda(cv(hs0), cfv(cuz, co(c0, caddc, nat1)), cseq(co(c0, caddc, nat1), caddc, c1), cc, w0)
  serf(s0, co(c0, caddc, nat1), c1, cfv(cuz, co(c0, caddc, nat1)), w0)
  eqid(cfv(cuz, co(c0, caddc, nat1)))
  syl(w0, wcel(co(c0, caddc, nat1), cz), wcel(co(c0, caddc, nat1), cfv(cuz, c3)))
  eluzelz(co(c0, caddc, nat1), c3)
  syldan(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cfv(cuz, co(c0, caddc, nat1))), wcel(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), cc), wcel(cv(s0), c4))
  sylan(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cfv(cuz, co(c0, caddc, nat1))), wcel(cv(s0), c4), wcel(co(c0, caddc, nat1), c4))
  syl6eleqr(co(c0, caddc, nat1), c4, cfv(cuz, c3), w0)
  syl(w0, wcel(co(c0, caddc, nat1), cfv(cuz, c3)), wcel(c0, cfv(cuz, c3)))
  syl6eleq(c0, cfv(cuz, c3), c4, w0)
  peano2uz(c0, c3)
  uztrn2(co(c0, caddc, nat1), c4, cv(s0), c3)
  diff.hs0.c(cseq(co(c0, caddc, nat1), caddc, c1))
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(cfv(cseq(c3, caddc, c1), c0))
  diff.hs0.c(cfv(cuz, co(c0, caddc, nat1)))
  diff.hs0.c(co(c0, caddc, nat1))
  diff.hs0.c(cseq(c3, caddc, c1))
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs1)
  diff.hs1.s(s0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs2)
  diff.hs2.s(s0)
  diff.hs1.s(hs2)
  diff.cc.s(s0)
  diff.hs1.c(c3)
  diff.hs1.c(caddc)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c(cv(hs0))
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(cc)
  diff.hs2.c(c3)
  diff.hs2.c(caddc)
  diff.hs2.c(c1)
  diff.hs2.c(cv(hs0))
  diff.hs2.c(c0)
  diff.hs2.c(cc)
  diff.wa.s(s0, w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cuz, co(c0, caddc, nat1))))
  diff.wcel.s(s0, cv(hs0), cfv(cuz, co(c0, caddc, nat1)))
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs1.w(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cuz, co(c0, caddc, nat1)))))
  diff.hs2.w(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cuz, co(c0, caddc, nat1)))))
  diff.cfv.s(s0, cuz, co(c0, caddc, nat1))
  diff.cuz.s(s0)
  diff.co.s(s0, c0, caddc, nat1)
  diff.caddc.s(s0)
  diff.nat1.s(s0)
}

thm clim2ser(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 → seq((c0[+]1)(+, c1))[~~>](c2[-](seq(c3(+, c1))` c0)))
  ⊣ c4 =(ℤ≥ ` c3)
  ⊣ (w0 → c0 ∈ c4)
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c4)→(c1 ` s0)∈ ℂ)
  ⊣ (w0 → seq(c3(+, c1))[~~>]c2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c3)
  ⊣ d(s0, c4)
  ⊣ d(s0, w0)
} = {
  a1ii((w0 → seq((c0[+]1)(+, c1))[~~>](c2[-](seq(c3(+, c1))` c0))), d(s0, c2))
  climsubc1(hs0, seq((c0[+]1)(+, c1)), c2, (seq(c3(+, c1))` c0), (ℤ≥ `(c0[+]1)), (c0[+]1), seq(c3(+, c1)), universe, w0)
  a1i(w0, seq((c0[+]1)(+, c1))∈ 𝕌)
  seqex((c0[+]1), caddc, c1)
  ffvelrnd(seq(c3(+, c1)), hs0, cc, c4, (w0 ∧ hs0 ∈(ℤ≥ `(c0[+]1))))
  adantr(w0, hs0 ∈(ℤ≥ `(c0[+]1)), (seq(c3(+, c1)): c4 → ℂ))
  sylan(w0, hs0 ∈(ℤ≥ `(c0[+]1)), hs0 ∈ c4, (c0[+]1)∈ c4)
  uztrn2((c0[+]1), c4, hs0, c3)
  eqtr2d((seq((c0[+]1)(+, c1))` hs0), ((seq(c3(+, c1))` hs0)[-](seq(c3(+, c1))` c0)), (((seq(c3(+, c1))` c0)[+](seq((c0[+]1)(+, c1))` hs0))[-](seq(c3(+, c1))` c0)), (w0 ∧ hs0 ∈(ℤ≥ `(c0[+]1))))
  oveq1d((seq(c3(+, c1))` hs0), cmin, (seq(c3(+, c1))` c0), ((seq(c3(+, c1))` c0)[+](seq((c0[+]1)(+, c1))` hs0)), (w0 ∧ hs0 ∈(ℤ≥ `(c0[+]1))))
  seqsplit(s0, hs1, hs2, c3, caddc, c1, hs0, c0, cc, (w0 ∧ hs0 ∈(ℤ≥ `(c0[+]1))))
  adantl((w0 ∧ hs0 ∈(ℤ≥ `(c0[+]1))), (s0 ∈ ℂ ∧ hs1 ∈ ℂ), (s0[+]hs1)∈ ℂ)
  addcl(s0, hs1)
  adantl((w0 ∧ hs0 ∈(ℤ≥ `(c0[+]1))), (s0 ∈ ℂ ∧ hs1 ∈ ℂ ∧ hs2 ∈ ℂ), ((s0[+]hs1)[+]hs2)=(s0[+](hs1[+]hs2)))
  addass(s0, hs1, hs2)
  simpr(w0, hs0 ∈(ℤ≥ `(c0[+]1)))
  adantr(w0, hs0 ∈(ℤ≥ `(c0[+]1)), c0 ∈(ℤ≥ ` c3))
  adantlr(w0, hs0 ∈(ℤ≥ `(c0[+]1)), s0 ∈(c3[...]hs0), (c1 ` s0)∈ ℂ)
  sylan2(w0, s0 ∈(c3[...]hs0), (c1 ` s0)∈ ℂ, s0 ∈ c4)
  syl6eleqr(s0, c4, (ℤ≥ ` c3), s0 ∈(c3[...]hs0))
  elfzuz(s0, c3, hs0)
  pncan2d((seq(c3(+, c1))` c0), (seq((c0[+]1)(+, c1))` hs0), (w0 ∧ hs0 ∈(ℤ≥ `(c0[+]1))))
  adantr(w0, hs0 ∈(ℤ≥ `(c0[+]1)), (seq(c3(+, c1))` c0)∈ ℂ)
  ffvelrnd(seq(c3(+, c1)), c0, cc, c4, w0)
  serf(s0, c3, c1, c4, w0)
  syl(w0, c3 ∈ ℤ, c0 ∈(ℤ≥ ` c3))
  eluzel2(c0, c3)
  ffvelrnda(hs0, (ℤ≥ `(c0[+]1)), seq((c0[+]1)(+, c1)), cc, w0)
  serf(s0, (c0[+]1), c1, (ℤ≥ `(c0[+]1)), w0)
  eqid((ℤ≥ `(c0[+]1)))
  syl(w0, (c0[+]1)∈ ℤ, (c0[+]1)∈(ℤ≥ ` c3))
  eluzelz((c0[+]1), c3)
  syldan(w0, s0 ∈(ℤ≥ `(c0[+]1)), (c1 ` s0)∈ ℂ, s0 ∈ c4)
  sylan(w0, s0 ∈(ℤ≥ `(c0[+]1)), s0 ∈ c4, (c0[+]1)∈ c4)
  syl6eleqr((c0[+]1), c4, (ℤ≥ ` c3), w0)
  syl(w0, (c0[+]1)∈(ℤ≥ ` c3), c0 ∈(ℤ≥ ` c3))
  syl6eleq(c0, (ℤ≥ ` c3), c4, w0)
  peano2uz(c0, c3)
  uztrn2((c0[+]1), c4, s0, c3)
  diff.hs0.c(seq((c0[+]1)(+, c1)))
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c((seq(c3(+, c1))` c0))
  diff.hs0.c((ℤ≥ `(c0[+]1)))
  diff.hs0.c((c0[+]1))
  diff.hs0.c(seq(c3(+, c1)))
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs1)
  diff.hs1.s(s0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs2)
  diff.hs2.s(s0)
  diff.hs1.s(hs2)
  diff.cc.s(s0)
  diff.hs1.c(c3)
  diff.hs1.c(caddc)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c(hs0)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(cc)
  diff.hs2.c(c3)
  diff.hs2.c(caddc)
  diff.hs2.c(c1)
  diff.hs2.c(hs0)
  diff.hs2.c(c0)
  diff.hs2.c(cc)
  diff.wa.s(s0, w0, hs0 ∈(ℤ≥ `(c0[+]1)))
  diff.wcel.s(s0, hs0, (ℤ≥ `(c0[+]1)))
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs1.w((w0 ∧ hs0 ∈(ℤ≥ `(c0[+]1))))
  diff.hs2.w((w0 ∧ hs0 ∈(ℤ≥ `(c0[+]1))))
  diff.cfv.s(s0, cuz, (c0[+]1))
  diff.cuz.s(s0)
  diff.co.s(s0, c0, caddc, nat1)
  diff.caddc.s(s0)
  diff.nat1.s(s0)
}

blocks.name: clim2ser2
blocks.content: The limit of an infinite series with an initial segment added. (Contributed by Paul Chapman, 9-Feb-2008.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 1-Feb-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm clim2ser2(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wbr(cseq(c0, caddc, c1), cli, co(c2, caddc, cfv(cseq(c0, caddc, c1), c3))))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(cuz, c0))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, c4))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c4)), wcel(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), cc))
  -| wi(w0, wbr(cseq(co(c3, caddc, nat1), caddc, c1), cli, c2))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
} = {
  a1ii(wi(w0, wbr(cseq(c0, caddc, c1), cli, co(c2, caddc, cfv(cseq(c0, caddc, c1), c3)))), diffsc(s0, c2))
  climaddc1(hs0, cseq(c0, caddc, c1), c2, cfv(cseq(c0, caddc, c1), c3), cfv(cuz, co(c3, caddc, nat1)), co(c3, caddc, nat1), cseq(co(c3, caddc, nat1), caddc, c1), universe, w0)
  a1i(w0, wcel(cseq(c0, caddc, c1), universe))
  seqex(c0, caddc, c1)
  comraddd(cfv(cseq(c0, caddc, c1), cv(hs0)), cfv(cseq(co(c3, caddc, nat1), caddc, c1), cv(hs0)), cfv(cseq(c0, caddc, c1), c3), wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cuz, co(c3, caddc, nat1)))))
  adantr(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cuz, co(c3, caddc, nat1))), wcel(cfv(cseq(c0, caddc, c1), c3), cc))
  ffvelrnd(cseq(c0, caddc, c1), c3, cc, c4, w0)
  serf(s0, c0, c1, c4, w0)
  syl(w0, wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c3, cfv(cuz, c0)))
  eluzel2(c3, c0)
  ffvelrnda(cv(hs0), cfv(cuz, co(c3, caddc, nat1)), cseq(co(c3, caddc, nat1), caddc, c1), cc, w0)
  serf(s0, co(c3, caddc, nat1), c1, cfv(cuz, co(c3, caddc, nat1)), w0)
  eqid(cfv(cuz, co(c3, caddc, nat1)))
  syl(w0, wcel(co(c3, caddc, nat1), cz), wcel(co(c3, caddc, nat1), cfv(cuz, c0)))
  eluzelz(co(c3, caddc, nat1), c0)
  syldan(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cfv(cuz, co(c3, caddc, nat1))), wcel(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), cc), wcel(cv(s0), c4))
  sylan(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cfv(cuz, co(c3, caddc, nat1))), wcel(cv(s0), c4), wcel(co(c3, caddc, nat1), c4))
  syl6eleqr(co(c3, caddc, nat1), c4, cfv(cuz, c0), w0)
  syl(w0, wcel(co(c3, caddc, nat1), cfv(cuz, c0)), wcel(c3, cfv(cuz, c0)))
  peano2uz(c3, c0)
  uztrn2(co(c3, caddc, nat1), c4, cv(s0), c0)
  seqsplit(s0, hs1, hs2, c0, caddc, c1, cv(hs0), c3, cc, wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cuz, co(c3, caddc, nat1)))))
  adantl(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cuz, co(c3, caddc, nat1)))), wa(wcel(cv(s0), cc), wcel(cv(hs1), cc)), wcel(co(cv(s0), caddc, cv(hs1)), cc))
  addcl(cv(s0), cv(hs1))
  adantl(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cuz, co(c3, caddc, nat1)))), w3a(wcel(cv(s0), cc), wcel(cv(hs1), cc), wcel(cv(hs2), cc)), wceq(co(co(cv(s0), caddc, cv(hs1)), caddc, cv(hs2)), co(cv(s0), caddc, co(cv(hs1), caddc, cv(hs2)))))
  addass(cv(s0), cv(hs1), cv(hs2))

  adantr(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cuz, co(c3, caddc, nat1))), wcel(c3, cfv(cuz, c0)))
  syl6eleq(c3, cfv(cuz, c0), c4, w0)
  adantlr(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cuz, co(c3, caddc, nat1))), wcel(cv(s0), co(c0, cfz, cv(hs0))), wcel(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), cc))
  sylan2(w0, wcel(cv(s0), co(c0, cfz, cv(hs0))), wcel(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), cc), wcel(cv(s0), c4))

thm clim2ser2(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 → seq(c0(+, c1))[~~>](c2[+](seq(c0(+, c1))` c3)))
  ⊣ c4 =(ℤ≥ ` c0)
  ⊣ (w0 → c3 ∈ c4)
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c4)→(c1 ` s0)∈ ℂ)
  ⊣ (w0 → seq((c3[+]1)(+, c1))[~~>]c2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c3)
  ⊣ d(s0, c4)
  ⊣ d(s0, w0)
} = {
  a1ii((w0 → seq(c0(+, c1))[~~>](c2[+](seq(c0(+, c1))` c3))), d(s0, c2))
  climaddc1(hs0, seq(c0(+, c1)), c2, (seq(c0(+, c1))` c3), (ℤ≥ `(c3[+]1)), (c3[+]1), seq((c3[+]1)(+, c1)), universe, w0)

  seqex(c0, caddc, c1)
  comraddd((seq(c0(+, c1))` hs0), (seq((c3[+]1)(+, c1))` hs0), (seq(c0(+, c1))` c3), (w0 ∧ hs0 ∈(ℤ≥ `(c3[+]1))))
  adantr(w0, hs0 ∈(ℤ≥ `(c3[+]1)), (seq(c0(+, c1))` c3)∈ ℂ)
  ffvelrnd(seq(c0(+, c1)), c3, cc, c4, w0)
  serf(s0, c0, c1, c4, w0)
  syl(w0, c0 ∈ ℤ, c3 ∈(ℤ≥ ` c0))
  eluzel2(c3, c0)
  ffvelrnda(hs0, (ℤ≥ `(c3[+]1)), seq((c3[+]1)(+, c1)), cc, w0)
  serf(s0, (c3[+]1), c1, (ℤ≥ `(c3[+]1)), w0)
  eqid((ℤ≥ `(c3[+]1)))
  syl(w0, (c3[+]1)∈ ℤ, (c3[+]1)∈(ℤ≥ ` c0))
  eluzelz((c3[+]1), c0)
  syldan(w0, s0 ∈(ℤ≥ `(c3[+]1)), (c1 ` s0)∈ ℂ, s0 ∈ c4)

  syl6eleqr((c3[+]1), c4, (ℤ≥ ` c0), w0)
  syl(w0, (c3[+]1)∈(ℤ≥ ` c0), c3 ∈(ℤ≥ ` c0))
  peano2uz(c3, c0)
  uztrn2((c3[+]1), c4, s0, c0)
  seqsplit(s0, hs1, hs2, c0, caddc, c1, hs0, c3, cc, (w0 ∧ hs0 ∈(ℤ≥ `(c3[+]1))))
  adantl((w0 ∧ hs0 ∈(ℤ≥ `(c3[+]1))), (s0 ∈ ℂ ∧ hs1 ∈ ℂ), (s0[+]hs1)∈ ℂ)
  addcl(s0, hs1)
  adantl((w0 ∧ hs0 ∈(ℤ≥ `(c3[+]1))), (s0 ∈ ℂ ∧ hs1 ∈ ℂ ∧ hs2 ∈ ℂ), ((s0[+]hs1)[+]hs2)=(s0[+](hs1[+]hs2)))
  addass(s0, hs1, hs2)
  simpr(w0, hs0 ∈(ℤ≥ `(c3[+]1)))
  adantr(w0, hs0 ∈(ℤ≥ `(c3[+]1)), c3 ∈(ℤ≥ ` c0))
  syl6eleq(c3, (ℤ≥ ` c0), c4, w0)
  adantlr(w0, hs0 ∈(ℤ≥ `(c3[+]1)), s0 ∈(c0[...]hs0), (c1 ` s0)∈ ℂ)
  sylan2(w0, s0 ∈(c0[...]hs0), (c1 ` s0)∈ ℂ, s0 ∈ c4)
  syl6eleqr(s0, c4, (ℤ≥ ` c0), s0 ∈(c0[...]hs0))
  elfzuz(s0, c0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.c(seq(c0(+, c1)))
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c((seq(c0(+, c1))` c3))
  diff.hs0.c((ℤ≥ `(c3[+]1)))
  diff.hs0.c((c3[+]1))
  diff.hs0.c(seq((c3[+]1)(+, c1)))
  diff.hs0.w(w0)

  diffss.ex(s0, hs2)
  diff.hs2.s(s0)
  diff.hs1.s(hs2)
  diff.cc.s(s0)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(caddc)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c(hs0)
  diff.hs1.c(c3)
  diff.hs1.c(cc)
  diff.hs2.c(c0)
  diff.hs2.c(caddc)
  diff.hs2.c(c1)
  diff.hs2.c(hs0)
  diff.hs2.c(c3)
  diff.hs2.c(cc)
  diff.wa.s(s0, w0, hs0 ∈(ℤ≥ `(c3[+]1)))
  diff.wcel.s(s0, hs0, (ℤ≥ `(c3[+]1)))
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)

  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.cfv.s(s0, cuz, (c3[+]1))
  diff.cuz.s(s0)
  diff.co.s(s0, c3, caddc, nat1)
  diff.caddc.s(s0)
  diff.nat1.s(s0)
  diff.hs1.w((w0 ∧ hs0 ∈(ℤ≥ `(c3[+]1))))
  diff.hs2.w((w0 ∧ hs0 ∈(ℤ≥ `(c3[+]1))))
}

blocks.name: iserex
blocks.content: An infinite series converges, if and only if the series does with initial terms removed. (Contributed by Paul Chapman, 9-Feb-2008.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 27-Apr-2014.)

thm iserex(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wb(wcel(cseq(c0, caddc, c1), cdm(cli)), wcel(cseq(c2, caddc, c1), cdm(cli))))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(cuz, c0))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, c3))

  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)

} = {
  mpjaod(w0, wb(wcel(cseq(c0, caddc, c1), cdm(cli)), wcel(cseq(c2, caddc, c1), cdm(cli))), wceq(c2, c0), wcel(co(c2, cmin, nat1), cfv(cuz, c0)))

  impbida(wa(w0, wcel(co(c2, cmin, nat1), cfv(cuz, c0))), wcel(cseq(c0, caddc, c1), cdm(cli)), wcel(cseq(c2, caddc, c1), cdm(cli)))
  syl(wa(wa(w0, wcel(co(c2, cmin, nat1), cfv(cuz, c0))), wcel(cseq(c0, caddc, c1), cdm(cli))), wcel(cseq(c2, caddc, c1), cdm(cli)), wbr(cseq(c2, caddc, c1), cli, co(cfv(cli, cseq(c0, caddc, c1)), cmin, cfv(cseq(c0, caddc, c1), co(c2, cmin, nat1)))))
  eqbrtrrd(cseq(c2, caddc, c1), cli, co(cfv(cli, cseq(c0, caddc, c1)), cmin, cfv(cseq(c0, caddc, c1), co(c2, cmin, nat1))), cseq(co(co(c2, cmin, nat1), caddc, nat1), caddc, c1), wa(wa(w0, wcel(co(c2, cmin, nat1), cfv(cuz, c0))), wcel(cseq(c0, caddc, c1), cdm(cli))))
  syl(wa(wa(w0, wcel(co(c2, cmin, nat1), cfv(cuz, c0))), wcel(cseq(c0, caddc, c1), cdm(cli))), wceq(cseq(co(co(c2, cmin, nat1), caddc, nat1), caddc, c1), cseq(c2, caddc, c1)), w0)
  clim2ser(s0, co(c2, cmin, nat1), c1, cfv(cli, cseq(c0, caddc, c1)), c0, c3, wa(wa(w0, wcel(co(c2, cmin, nat1), cfv(cuz, c0))), wcel(cseq(c0, caddc, c1), cdm(cli))))
  syl6eleqr(co(c2, cmin, nat1), c3, cfv(cuz, c0), wa(wa(w0, wcel(co(c2, cmin, nat1), cfv(cuz, c0))), wcel(cseq(c0, caddc, c1), cdm(cli))))
  simplr(w0, wcel(co(c2, cmin, nat1), cfv(cuz, c0)), wcel(cseq(c0, caddc, c1), cdm(cli)))
  sylan(wa(wa(w0, wcel(co(c2, cmin, nat1), cfv(cuz, c0))), wcel(cseq(c0, caddc, c1), cdm(cli))), wcel(cv(s0), c3), wcel(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), cc), w0)
  simpll(w0, wcel(co(c2, cmin, nat1), cfv(cuz, c0)), wcel(cseq(c0, caddc, c1), cdm(cli)))
  sylib(wa(wa(w0, wcel(co(c2, cmin, nat1), cfv(cuz, c0))), wcel(cseq(c0, caddc, c1), cdm(cli))), wbr(cseq(c0, caddc, c1), cli, cfv(cli, cseq(c0, caddc, c1))), wcel(cseq(c0, caddc, c1), cdm(cli)))
  simpr(wa(w0, wcel(co(c2, cmin, nat1), cfv(cuz, c0))), wcel(cseq(c0, caddc, c1), cdm(cli)))
  climdm(cseq(c0, caddc, c1))
  releldmi(cseq(c2, caddc, c1), cli, co(cfv(cli, cseq(c0, caddc, c1)), cmin, cfv(cseq(c0, caddc, c1), co(c2, cmin, nat1))))
  syl(wa(wa(w0, wcel(co(c2, cmin, nat1), cfv(cuz, c0))), wcel(cseq(c2, caddc, c1), cdm(cli))), wcel(cseq(c0, caddc, c1), cdm(cli)), wbr(cseq(c0, caddc, c1), cli, co(cfv(cli, cseq(c2, caddc, c1)), caddc, cfv(cseq(c0, caddc, c1), co(c2, cmin, nat1)))))
  clim2ser2(s0, c0, c1, cfv(cli, cseq(c2, caddc, c1)), co(c2, cmin, nat1), c3, wa(wa(w0, wcel(co(c2, cmin, nat1), cfv(cuz, c0))), wcel(cseq(c2, caddc, c1), cdm(cli))))

  syl6eleqr(co(c2, cmin, nat1), c3, cfv(cuz, c0), wa(w0, wcel(co(c2, cmin, nat1), cfv(cuz, c0))))
  simpr(w0, wcel(co(c2, cmin, nat1), cfv(cuz, c0)))
  sylan(wa(wa(w0, wcel(co(c2, cmin, nat1), cfv(cuz, c0))), wcel(cseq(c2, caddc, c1), cdm(cli))), wcel(cv(s0), c3), wcel(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), cc), w0)
  eqbrtrd(cseq(co(co(c2, cmin, nat1), caddc, nat1), caddc, c1), cli, cfv(cli, cseq(c2, caddc, c1)), cseq(c2, caddc, c1), wa(wa(w0, wcel(co(c2, cmin, nat1), cfv(cuz, c0))), wcel(cseq(c2, caddc, c1), cdm(cli))))
  syl(wa(wa(w0, wcel(co(c2, cmin, nat1), cfv(cuz, c0))), wcel(cseq(c2, caddc, c1), cdm(cli))), wceq(cseq(co(co(c2, cmin, nat1), caddc, nat1), caddc, c1), cseq(c2, caddc, c1)), w0)
  simpll(w0, wcel(co(c2, cmin, nat1), cfv(cuz, c0)), wcel(cseq(c2, caddc, c1), cdm(cli)))
  seqeq1d(co(co(c2, cmin, nat1), caddc, nat1), caddc, c1, c2, w0)
  sylancl(w0, wceq(co(co(c2, cmin, nat1), caddc, nat1), c2), wcel(c2, cc), wcel(nat1, cc))
  zcnd(c2, w0)

  eluzelz(c2, c0)
  ax-1cn()
  npcan(c2, nat1)
  sylib(wa(wa(w0, wcel(co(c2, cmin, nat1), cfv(cuz, c0))), wcel(cseq(c2, caddc, c1), cdm(cli))), wbr(cseq(c2, caddc, c1), cli, cfv(cli, cseq(c2, caddc, c1))), wcel(cseq(c2, caddc, c1), cdm(cli)))
  simpr(wa(w0, wcel(co(c2, cmin, nat1), cfv(cuz, c0))), wcel(cseq(c2, caddc, c1), cdm(cli)))
  climdm(cseq(c2, caddc, c1))
  releldmi(cseq(c0, caddc, c1), cli, co(cfv(cli, cseq(c2, caddc, c1)), caddc, cfv(cseq(c0, caddc, c1), co(c2, cmin, nat1))))
  climrel()
  syl(w0, wo(wceq(c2, c0), wcel(co(c2, cmin, nat1), cfv(cuz, c0))), wcel(c2, cfv(cuz, c0)))
  syl6eleq(c2, cfv(cuz, c0), c3, w0)
  uzm1(c2, c0)
  diff.cfv.s(s0, cli, cseq(c0, caddc, c1))
  diff.wa.s(s0, wa(w0, wcel(co(c2, cmin, nat1), cfv(cuz, c0))), wcel(cseq(c0, caddc, c1), cdm(cli)))
  diff.wcel.s(s0, cseq(c0, caddc, c1), cdm(cli))

blocks.name: isermulc2
blocks.content: Multiplication of an infinite series by a constant. (Contributed by Paul Chapman, 14-Nov-2007.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 1-Feb-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm isermulc2(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wbr(cseq(c0, caddc, c1), cli, co(c2, cmul, c3)))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(cuz, c0))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cz))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, cc))
  -| wi(w0, wbr(cseq(c0, caddc, c5), cli, c3))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c4)), wcel(cfv(c5, cv(s0)), cc))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c4)), wceq(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), co(c2, cmul, cfv(c5, cv(s0)))))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
  -| diffsc(s0, c5)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
} = {
  a1ii(wi(w0, wbr(cseq(c0, caddc, c1), cli, co(c2, cmul, c3))), diffsc(s0, c3))
  climmulc2(hs0, cseq(c0, caddc, c1), c2, c3, c4, c0, cseq(c0, caddc, c5), universe, w0)
  a1i(w0, wcel(cseq(c0, caddc, c1), universe))
  seqex(c0, caddc, c1)
  ffvelrnda(cv(hs0), c4, cseq(c0, caddc, c5), cc, w0)
  serf(s0, c0, c5, c4, w0)
  seqdistr(s0, hs1, c0, caddc, c1, cv(hs0), c2, cmul, c5, cc, wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c4)))
  adantl(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c4)), wa(wcel(cv(s0), cc), wcel(cv(hs1), cc)), wcel(co(cv(s0), caddc, cv(hs1)), cc))
  addcl(cv(s0), cv(hs1))
  sylan(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c4)), wa(wcel(cv(s0), cc), wcel(cv(hs1), cc)), wceq(co(c2, cmul, co(cv(s0), caddc, cv(hs1))), co(co(c2, cmul, cv(s0)), caddc, co(c2, cmul, cv(hs1)))), wcel(c2, cc))
  adantr(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c4), wcel(c2, cc))
  3expb(wcel(c2, cc), wcel(cv(s0), cc), wcel(cv(hs1), cc), wceq(co(c2, cmul, co(cv(s0), caddc, cv(hs1))), co(co(c2, cmul, cv(s0)), caddc, co(c2, cmul, cv(hs1)))))
  adddi(c2, cv(s0), cv(hs1))
  syl6eleq(cv(hs0), cfv(cuz, c0), c4, wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c4)))
  simpr(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c4))
  adantlr(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c4), wcel(cv(s0), co(c0, cfz, cv(hs0))), wcel(cfv(c5, cv(s0)), cc))
  sylan2(w0, wcel(cv(s0), co(c0, cfz, cv(hs0))), wcel(cfv(c5, cv(s0)), cc), wcel(cv(s0), c4))
  adantlr(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c4), wcel(cv(s0), co(c0, cfz, cv(hs0))), wceq(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), co(c2, cmul, cfv(c5, cv(s0)))))
  sylan2(w0, wcel(cv(s0), co(c0, cfz, cv(hs0))), wceq(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), co(c2, cmul, cfv(c5, cv(s0)))), wcel(cv(s0), c4))
  syl6eleqr(cv(s0), c4, cfv(cuz, c0), wcel(cv(s0), co(c0, cfz, cv(hs0))))
  elfzuz(cv(s0), c0, cv(hs0))
  diff.hs0.c(cseq(c0, caddc, c1))
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c3)

thm isermulc2(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 → seq(c0(+, c1))[~~>](c2[×]c3))

  adantr(w0, hs0 ∈ c4, c2 ∈ ℂ)
  3expb(c2 ∈ ℂ, s0 ∈ ℂ, hs1 ∈ ℂ, (c2[×](s0[+]hs1))=((c2[×]s0)[+](c2[×]hs1)))

  syl6eleq(hs0, (ℤ≥ ` c0), c4, (w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ c4))

  sylan2(w0, s0 ∈(c0[...]hs0), (c1 ` s0)=(c2[×](c5 ` s0)), s0 ∈ c4)
  syl6eleqr(s0, c4, (ℤ≥ ` c0), s0 ∈(c0[...]hs0))

thm climlec2(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wbr(c0, cle, c1))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cuz, c3))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, cz))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cr))
  -| wi(w0, wbr(c4, cli, c1))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c2)), wcel(cfv(c4, cv(s0)), cr))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c2)), wbr(c0, cle, cfv(c4, cv(s0))))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
} = {
  climle(s0, c0, c1, c2, c3, cxp(cz, csn(c0)), c4, w0)
  sylancl(w0, wbr(cxp(cz, csn(c0)), cli, c0), wcel(c0, cc), wcel(nat0, cz))
  recnd(c0, w0)
  0z()
  climconst2(c0, nat0, cz)
  uzssz(nat0)
  zex()
  eqeltrd(cfv(cxp(cz, csn(c0)), cv(s0)), cr, c0, wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c2)))
  adantr(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c2), wcel(c0, cr))
  eqbrtrd(cfv(cxp(cz, csn(c0)), cv(s0)), cle, cfv(c4, cv(s0)), c0, wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c2)))
  syl2an(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c2), wceq(cfv(cxp(cz, csn(c0)), cv(s0)), c0), wcel(c0, cr), wcel(cv(s0), cz))
  eleq2s(cv(s0), c2, cfv(cuz, c3), wcel(cv(s0), cz))
  eluzelz(cv(s0), c3)
  fvconst2g(c0, cr, cv(s0), cz)
  diff.cxp.s(s0, cz, csn(c0))
  diff.cz.s(s0)
  diff.csn.s(s0, c0)
}

blocks.content: Comparison of the limits of two infinite series. (Contributed by Paul Chapman, 12-Nov-2007.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 3-Feb-2014.)

thm iserle(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wbr(c0, cle, c1))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cuz, c3))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, cz))
  -| wi(w0, wbr(cseq(c3, caddc, c4), cli, c0))
  -| wi(w0, wbr(cseq(c3, caddc, c5), cli, c1))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c2)), wcel(cfv(c4, cv(s0)), cr))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c2)), wcel(cfv(c5, cv(s0)), cr))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c2)), wbr(cfv(c4, cv(s0)), cle, cfv(c5, cv(s0))))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
  -| diffsc(s0, c5)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
} = {
  a1ii(wi(w0, wbr(c0, cle, c1)), diffsc(s0, c0))
  a1ii(wi(w0, wbr(c0, cle, c1)), diffsc(s0, c1))
  climle(hs0, c0, c1, c2, c3, cseq(c3, caddc, c4), cseq(c3, caddc, c5), w0)
  ffvelrnda(cv(hs0), c2, cseq(c3, caddc, c4), cr, w0)
  serfre(s0, c3, c4, c2, w0)
  ffvelrnda(cv(hs0), c2, cseq(c3, caddc, c5), cr, w0)
  serfre(s0, c3, c5, c2, w0)
  serle(s0, c3, c4, cv(hs0), c5, wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c2)))
  syl6eleq(cv(hs0), cfv(cuz, c3), c2, wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c2)))
  simpr(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c2))
  syl2anc(wa(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c2)), wcel(cv(s0), co(c3, cfz, cv(hs0)))), wcel(cfv(c4, cv(s0)), cr), w0, wcel(cv(s0), c2))
  syl2anc(wa(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c2)), wcel(cv(s0), co(c3, cfz, cv(hs0)))), wcel(cfv(c5, cv(s0)), cr), w0, wcel(cv(s0), c2))
  syl2anc(wa(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c2)), wcel(cv(s0), co(c3, cfz, cv(hs0)))), wbr(cfv(c4, cv(s0)), cle, cfv(c5, cv(s0))), w0, wcel(cv(s0), c2))
  simpll(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c2), wcel(cv(s0), co(c3, cfz, cv(hs0))))
  adantl(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c2)), wcel(cv(s0), co(c3, cfz, cv(hs0))), wcel(cv(s0), c2))
  syl6eleqr(cv(s0), c2, cfv(cuz, c3), wcel(cv(s0), co(c3, cfz, cv(hs0))))
  elfzuz(cv(s0), c3, cv(hs0))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.c(cseq(c3, caddc, c4))
  diff.hs0.c(cseq(c3, caddc, c5))
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.wa.s(s0, w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c2))
  diff.wcel.s(s0, cv(hs0), c2)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)

}

  syl2anc(((w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ c2)∧ s0 ∈(c3[...]hs0)), (c5 ` s0)∈ ℝ, w0, s0 ∈ c2)
  syl2anc(((w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ c2)∧ s0 ∈(c3[...]hs0)), (c4 ` s0)[≤](c5 ` s0), w0, s0 ∈ c2)
  simpll(w0, hs0 ∈ c2, s0 ∈(c3[...]hs0))
  adantl((w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ c2), s0 ∈(c3[...]hs0), s0 ∈ c2)
  syl6eleqr(s0, c2, (ℤ≥ ` c3), s0 ∈(c3[...]hs0))
  elfzuz(s0, c3, hs0)

  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)

blocks.content: The limit of an infinite series of nonnegative reals is nonnegative. (Contributed by Paul Chapman, 9-Feb-2008.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 3-Feb-2014.)

thm iserge0(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wbr(nat0, cle, c0))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(cuz, c2))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, cz))
  -| wi(w0, wbr(cseq(c2, caddc, c3), cli, c0))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c1)), wcel(cfv(c3, cv(s0)), cr))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c1)), wbr(nat0, cle, cfv(c3, cv(s0))))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
} = {
  iserle(s0, nat0, c0, c1, c2, cxp(cfv(cuz, c2), csn(nat0)), c3, w0)
  syl(w0, wbr(cseq(c2, caddc, cxp(cfv(cuz, c2), csn(nat0))), cli, nat0), wcel(c2, cz))
  serclim0(c2)
  syl6eqel(cfv(cxp(cfv(cuz, c2), csn(nat0)), cv(s0)), cr, nat0, wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c1)))
  0re()
  eqbrtrd(cfv(cxp(cfv(cuz, c2), csn(nat0)), cv(s0)), cle, cfv(c3, cv(s0)), nat0, wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c1)))
  syl(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c1)), wceq(cfv(cxp(cfv(cuz, c2), csn(nat0)), cv(s0)), nat0), wcel(cv(s0), cfv(cuz, c2)))
  syl6eleq(cv(s0), cfv(cuz, c2), c1, wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c1)))
  simpr(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c1))
  fvconst2(cv(s0), cfv(cuz, c2), nat0)
  c0ex()
  diff.cxp.s(s0, cfv(cuz, c2), csn(nat0))
  diff.cfv.s(s0, cuz, c2)
  diff.cuz.s(s0)
  diff.csn.s(s0, nat0)

blocks.name: climub
blocks.content: The limit of a monotonic sequence is an upper bound. (Contributed by NM, 18-Mar-2005.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 10-Feb-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm climub(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wbr(cfv(c0, c1), cle, c2))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(cuz, c4))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, c3))
  -| wi(w0, wbr(c0, cli, c2))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c3)), wcel(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), cr))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c3)), wbr(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), cle, cfv(c0, co(cv(s0), caddc, nat1))))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
} = {
  a1ii(wi(w0, wbr(cfv(c0, c1), cle, c2)), diffsc(s0, c2))
  a1ii(wi(w0, wbr(cfv(c0, c1), cle, c2)), diffsc(s0, c4))
  climlec2(hs0, cfv(c0, c1), c2, cfv(cuz, c1), c1, c0, w0)
  eqid(cfv(cuz, c1))
  syl(w0, wcel(c1, cz), wcel(c1, cfv(cuz, c4)))
  syl6eleq(c1, cfv(cuz, c4), c3, w0)
  eluzelz(c1, c4)
  mpcom(w0, wcel(cfv(c0, c1), cr), wcel(c1, c3))
  vtoclga(s0, c1, c3, wi(w0, wcel(cfv(c0, c1), cr)), wi(w0, wcel(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), cr)))
  imbi2d(wceq(cv(s0), c1), w0, wcel(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), cr), wcel(cfv(c0, c1), cr))
  eleq1d(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), cr, cfv(c0, c1), wceq(cv(s0), c1))
  fveq2(cv(s0), c1, c0)
  syldan(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cuz, c1)), wcel(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), cr), wcel(cv(hs0), c3))
  sylan(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cuz, c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), c3), wcel(c1, c3))
  uztrn2(c1, c3, cv(hs0), c4)
  impcom(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c3), wcel(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), cr))
  vtoclga(s0, cv(hs0), c3, wi(w0, wcel(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), cr)), wi(w0, wcel(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), cr)))
  imbi2d(wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), w0, wcel(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), cr), wcel(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), cr))
  eleq1d(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), cr, cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0)))
  fveq2(cv(s0), cv(hs0), c0)
  expcom(wcel(cv(s0), c3), w0, wcel(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), cr))
  monoord(s0, c0, c1, cv(hs0), wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cuz, c1))))
  simpr(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cuz, c1)))
  adantlr(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cuz, c1)), wcel(cv(s0), co(c1, cfz, cv(hs0))), wcel(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), cr))
  sylan2(w0, wcel(cv(s0), co(c1, cfz, cv(hs0))), wcel(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), cr), wcel(cv(s0), cfv(cuz, c1)))
  elfzuz(cv(s0), c1, cv(hs0))
  syldan(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cfv(cuz, c1)), wcel(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), cr), wcel(cv(s0), c3))
  adantlr(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cuz, c1)), wcel(cv(s0), co(c1, cfz, co(cv(hs0), cmin, nat1))), wbr(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), cle, cfv(c0, co(cv(s0), caddc, nat1))))
  sylan2(w0, wcel(cv(s0), co(c1, cfz, co(cv(hs0), cmin, nat1))), wbr(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), cle, cfv(c0, co(cv(s0), caddc, nat1))), wcel(cv(s0), cfv(cuz, c1)))
  elfzuz(cv(s0), c1, co(cv(hs0), cmin, nat1))
  syldan(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cfv(cuz, c1)), wbr(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), cle, cfv(c0, co(cv(s0), caddc, nat1))), wcel(cv(s0), c3))
  sylan(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cfv(cuz, c1)), wcel(cv(s0), c3), wcel(c1, c3))
  uztrn2(c1, c3, cv(s0), c4)
  diff.hs0.c(cfv(c0, c1))
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(cfv(cuz, c1))
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.wi.s(s0, w0, wcel(cfv(c0, c1), cr))
  diff.wcel.s(s0, cfv(c0, c1), cr)
  diff.cfv.s(s0, c0, c1)
  diff.wi.s(s0, w0, wcel(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), cr))
  diff.wcel.s(s0, cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), cr)
  diff.cfv.s(s0, c0, cv(hs0))
  diff.cr.s(s0)
  diff.wa.s(s0, w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cuz, c1)))
  diff.wcel.s(s0, cv(hs0), cfv(cuz, c1))
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.cfv.s(s0, cuz, c1)
  diff.cuz.s(s0)
}

thm climub(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 →(c0 ` c1)[≤]c2)
  ⊣ c3 =(ℤ≥ ` c4)
  ⊣ (w0 → c1 ∈ c3)
  ⊣ (w0 → c0[~~>]c2)
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c3)→(c0 ` s0)∈ ℝ)
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c3)→(c0 ` s0)[≤](c0 `(s0[+]1)))
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c3)
  ⊣ d(s0, c4)
  ⊣ d(s0, w0)
} = {
  a1ii((w0 →(c0 ` c1)[≤]c2), d(s0, c2))
  a1ii((w0 →(c0 ` c1)[≤]c2), d(s0, c4))
  climlec2(hs0, (c0 ` c1), c2, (ℤ≥ ` c1), c1, c0, w0)
  eqid((ℤ≥ ` c1))
  syl(w0, c1 ∈ ℤ, c1 ∈(ℤ≥ ` c4))
  syl6eleq(c1, (ℤ≥ ` c4), c3, w0)
  eluzelz(c1, c4)
  mpcom(w0, (c0 ` c1)∈ ℝ, c1 ∈ c3)
  vtoclga(s0, c1, c3, (w0 →(c0 ` c1)∈ ℝ), (w0 →(c0 ` s0)∈ ℝ))
  imbi2d(s0 = c1, w0, (c0 ` s0)∈ ℝ, (c0 ` c1)∈ ℝ)
  eleq1d((c0 ` s0), cr, (c0 ` c1), s0 = c1)
  fveq2(s0, c1, c0)
  syldan(w0, hs0 ∈(ℤ≥ ` c1), (c0 ` hs0)∈ ℝ, hs0 ∈ c3)
  sylan(w0, hs0 ∈(ℤ≥ ` c1), hs0 ∈ c3, c1 ∈ c3)
  uztrn2(c1, c3, hs0, c4)
  impcom(w0, hs0 ∈ c3, (c0 ` hs0)∈ ℝ)
  vtoclga(s0, hs0, c3, (w0 →(c0 ` hs0)∈ ℝ), (w0 →(c0 ` s0)∈ ℝ))
  imbi2d(s0 = hs0, w0, (c0 ` s0)∈ ℝ, (c0 ` hs0)∈ ℝ)
  eleq1d((c0 ` s0), cr, (c0 ` hs0), s0 = hs0)
  fveq2(s0, hs0, c0)
  expcom(s0 ∈ c3, w0, (c0 ` s0)∈ ℝ)
  monoord(s0, c0, c1, hs0, (w0 ∧ hs0 ∈(ℤ≥ ` c1)))
  simpr(w0, hs0 ∈(ℤ≥ ` c1))
  adantlr(w0, hs0 ∈(ℤ≥ ` c1), s0 ∈(c1[...]hs0), (c0 ` s0)∈ ℝ)
  sylan2(w0, s0 ∈(c1[...]hs0), (c0 ` s0)∈ ℝ, s0 ∈(ℤ≥ ` c1))
  elfzuz(s0, c1, hs0)
  syldan(w0, s0 ∈(ℤ≥ ` c1), (c0 ` s0)∈ ℝ, s0 ∈ c3)
  adantlr(w0, hs0 ∈(ℤ≥ ` c1), s0 ∈(c1[...](hs0[-]1)), (c0 ` s0)[≤](c0 `(s0[+]1)))
  sylan2(w0, s0 ∈(c1[...](hs0[-]1)), (c0 ` s0)[≤](c0 `(s0[+]1)), s0 ∈(ℤ≥ ` c1))
  elfzuz(s0, c1, (hs0[-]1))
  syldan(w0, s0 ∈(ℤ≥ ` c1), (c0 ` s0)[≤](c0 `(s0[+]1)), s0 ∈ c3)
  sylan(w0, s0 ∈(ℤ≥ ` c1), s0 ∈ c3, c1 ∈ c3)
  uztrn2(c1, c3, s0, c4)
  diff.hs0.c((c0 ` c1))
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c((ℤ≥ ` c1))
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.wi.s(s0, w0, (c0 ` c1)∈ ℝ)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, (c0 ` c1), cr)
  diff.cfv.s(s0, c0, c1)
  diff.wi.s(s0, w0, (c0 ` hs0)∈ ℝ)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, (c0 ` hs0), cr)
  diff.cfv.s(s0, c0, hs0)
  diff.cr.s(s0)
  diff.wa.s(s0, w0, hs0 ∈(ℤ≥ ` c1))
  diff.wcel.s(s0, hs0, (ℤ≥ ` c1))
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.cfv.s(s0, cuz, c1)
  diff.cuz.s(s0)
}

blocks.name: climserle
blocks.content: The partial sums of a converging infinite series with nonnegative terms are bounded by its limit. (Contributed by NM, 27-Dec-2005.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 9-Feb-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm climserle(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wbr(cfv(cseq(c0, caddc, c1), c2), cle, c3))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(cuz, c0))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, c4))
  -| wi(w0, wbr(cseq(c0, caddc, c1), cli, c3))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c4)), wcel(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), cr))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c4)), wbr(nat0, cle, cfv(c1, cv(s0))))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
} = {
  a1ii(wi(w0, wbr(cfv(cseq(c0, caddc, c1), c2), cle, c3)), diffsc(s0, c2))
  a1ii(wi(w0, wbr(cfv(cseq(c0, caddc, c1), c2), cle, c3)), diffsc(s0, c3))
  climub(hs0, cseq(c0, caddc, c1), c2, c3, c4, c0, w0)
  breqtrrd(cfv(cseq(c0, caddc, c1), cv(hs0)), cle, cfv(cseq(c0, caddc, c1), co(cv(hs0), caddc, nat1)), co(cfv(cseq(c0, caddc, c1), cv(hs0)), caddc, cfv(c1, co(cv(hs0), caddc, nat1))), wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c4)))
  mpbid(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c4)), wbr(cfv(cseq(c0, caddc, c1), cv(hs0)), cle, co(cfv(cseq(c0, caddc, c1), cv(hs0)), caddc, cfv(c1, co(cv(hs0), caddc, nat1)))), wbr(nat0, cle, cfv(c1, co(cv(hs0), caddc, nat1))))
  sylan2(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c4), wbr(nat0, cle, cfv(c1, co(cv(hs0), caddc, nat1))), wcel(co(cv(hs0), caddc, nat1), c4))
  impcom(w0, wcel(co(cv(hs0), caddc, nat1), c4), wbr(nat0, cle, cfv(c1, co(cv(hs0), caddc, nat1))))
  vtoclga(s0, co(cv(hs0), caddc, nat1), c4, wi(w0, wbr(nat0, cle, cfv(c1, co(cv(hs0), caddc, nat1)))), wi(w0, wbr(nat0, cle, cfv(c1, cv(s0)))))
  imbi2d(wceq(cv(s0), co(cv(hs0), caddc, nat1)), w0, wbr(nat0, cle, cfv(c1, cv(s0))), wbr(nat0, cle, cfv(c1, co(cv(hs0), caddc, nat1))))
  breq2d(nat0, cle, cfv(c1, cv(s0)), cfv(c1, co(cv(hs0), caddc, nat1)), wceq(cv(s0), co(cv(hs0), caddc, nat1)))
  expcom(wcel(cv(s0), c4), w0, wbr(nat0, cle, cfv(c1, cv(s0))))
  addge01d(cfv(c1, co(cv(hs0), caddc, nat1)), cfv(cseq(c0, caddc, c1), cv(hs0)), wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c4)))
  ffvelrnda(cv(hs0), c4, cseq(c0, caddc, c1), cr, w0)
  serfre(s0, c0, c1, c4, w0)
  syl(w0, wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c2, cfv(cuz, c0)))
  syl6eleq(c2, cfv(cuz, c0), c4, w0)
  eluzel2(c2, c0)
  sylan2(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c4), wcel(cfv(c1, co(cv(hs0), caddc, nat1)), cr), wcel(co(cv(hs0), caddc, nat1), c4))
  peano2uzs(cv(hs0), c4, c0)
  impcom(w0, wcel(co(cv(hs0), caddc, nat1), c4), wcel(cfv(c1, co(cv(hs0), caddc, nat1)), cr))
  vtoclga(s0, co(cv(hs0), caddc, nat1), c4, wi(w0, wcel(cfv(c1, co(cv(hs0), caddc, nat1)), cr)), wi(w0, wcel(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), cr)))
  imbi2d(wceq(cv(s0), co(cv(hs0), caddc, nat1)), w0, wcel(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), cr), wcel(cfv(c1, co(cv(hs0), caddc, nat1)), cr))
  eleq1d(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), cr, cfv(c1, co(cv(hs0), caddc, nat1)), wceq(cv(s0), co(cv(hs0), caddc, nat1)))
  fveq2(cv(s0), co(cv(hs0), caddc, nat1), c1)
  expcom(wcel(cv(s0), c4), w0, wcel(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), cr))
  syl(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c4)), wceq(cfv(cseq(c0, caddc, c1), co(cv(hs0), caddc, nat1)), co(cfv(cseq(c0, caddc, c1), cv(hs0)), caddc, cfv(c1, co(cv(hs0), caddc, nat1)))), wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cuz, c0)))
  syl6eleq(cv(hs0), cfv(cuz, c0), c4, wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c4)))
  simpr(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c4))
  seqp1(cv(hs0), c0, caddc, c1)
  diff.hs0.c(cseq(c0, caddc, c1))
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.c(c4)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.wi.s(s0, w0, wbr(nat0, cle, cfv(c1, co(cv(hs0), caddc, nat1))))
  diff.wbr.s(s0, nat0, cle, cfv(c1, co(cv(hs0), caddc, nat1)))
  diff.nat0.s(s0)
  diff.cle.s(s0)
  diff.wi.s(s0, w0, wcel(cfv(c1, co(cv(hs0), caddc, nat1)), cr))
  diff.wcel.s(s0, cfv(c1, co(cv(hs0), caddc, nat1)), cr)
  diff.cfv.s(s0, c1, co(cv(hs0), caddc, nat1))
  diff.co.s(s0, cv(hs0), caddc, nat1)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.caddc.s(s0)
  diff.nat1.s(s0)
  diff.cr.s(s0)
}

thm climserle(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 →(seq(c0(+, c1))` c2)[≤]c3)
  ⊣ c4 =(ℤ≥ ` c0)
  ⊣ (w0 → c2 ∈ c4)
  ⊣ (w0 → seq(c0(+, c1))[~~>]c3)
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c4)→(c1 ` s0)∈ ℝ)
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c4)→ 0[≤](c1 ` s0))
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c3)
  ⊣ d(s0, c4)
  ⊣ d(s0, w0)
} = {
  a1ii((w0 →(seq(c0(+, c1))` c2)[≤]c3), d(s0, c2))
  a1ii((w0 →(seq(c0(+, c1))` c2)[≤]c3), d(s0, c3))
  climub(hs0, seq(c0(+, c1)), c2, c3, c4, c0, w0)
  breqtrrd((seq(c0(+, c1))` hs0), cle, (seq(c0(+, c1))`(hs0[+]1)), ((seq(c0(+, c1))` hs0)[+](c1 `(hs0[+]1))), (w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ c4))
  mpbid((w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ c4), (seq(c0(+, c1))` hs0)[≤]((seq(c0(+, c1))` hs0)[+](c1 `(hs0[+]1))), 0[≤](c1 `(hs0[+]1)))
  sylan2(w0, hs0 ∈ c4, 0[≤](c1 `(hs0[+]1)), (hs0[+]1)∈ c4)
  impcom(w0, (hs0[+]1)∈ c4, 0[≤](c1 `(hs0[+]1)))
  vtoclga(s0, (hs0[+]1), c4, (w0 → 0[≤](c1 `(hs0[+]1))), (w0 → 0[≤](c1 ` s0)))
  imbi2d(s0 =(hs0[+]1), w0, 0[≤](c1 ` s0), 0[≤](c1 `(hs0[+]1)))
  breq2d(nat0, cle, (c1 ` s0), (c1 `(hs0[+]1)), s0 =(hs0[+]1))
  expcom(s0 ∈ c4, w0, 0[≤](c1 ` s0))
  addge01d((c1 `(hs0[+]1)), (seq(c0(+, c1))` hs0), (w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ c4))
  ffvelrnda(hs0, c4, seq(c0(+, c1)), cr, w0)
  serfre(s0, c0, c1, c4, w0)
  syl(w0, c0 ∈ ℤ, c2 ∈(ℤ≥ ` c0))
  syl6eleq(c2, (ℤ≥ ` c0), c4, w0)
  eluzel2(c2, c0)
  sylan2(w0, hs0 ∈ c4, (c1 `(hs0[+]1))∈ ℝ, (hs0[+]1)∈ c4)
  peano2uzs(hs0, c4, c0)
  impcom(w0, (hs0[+]1)∈ c4, (c1 `(hs0[+]1))∈ ℝ)
  vtoclga(s0, (hs0[+]1), c4, (w0 →(c1 `(hs0[+]1))∈ ℝ), (w0 →(c1 ` s0)∈ ℝ))
  imbi2d(s0 =(hs0[+]1), w0, (c1 ` s0)∈ ℝ, (c1 `(hs0[+]1))∈ ℝ)
  eleq1d((c1 ` s0), cr, (c1 `(hs0[+]1)), s0 =(hs0[+]1))
  fveq2(s0, (hs0[+]1), c1)
  expcom(s0 ∈ c4, w0, (c1 ` s0)∈ ℝ)
  syl((w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ c4), (seq(c0(+, c1))`(hs0[+]1))=((seq(c0(+, c1))` hs0)[+](c1 `(hs0[+]1))), hs0 ∈(ℤ≥ ` c0))
  syl6eleq(hs0, (ℤ≥ ` c0), c4, (w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ c4))
  simpr(w0, hs0 ∈ c4)
  seqp1(hs0, c0, caddc, c1)
  diff.hs0.c(seq(c0(+, c1)))
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.c(c4)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.wi.s(s0, w0, 0[≤](c1 `(hs0[+]1)))
  diff.wbr.s(s0, nat0, cle, (c1 `(hs0[+]1)))
  diff.nat0.s(s0)
  diff.cle.s(s0)
  diff.wi.s(s0, w0, (c1 `(hs0[+]1))∈ ℝ)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, (c1 `(hs0[+]1)), cr)
  diff.cfv.s(s0, c1, (hs0[+]1))
  diff.co.s(s0, hs0, caddc, nat1)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.caddc.s(s0)
  diff.nat1.s(s0)
  diff.cr.s(s0)
}

blocks.name: isershft
blocks.content: Index shift of the limit of an infinite series. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 6-Sep-2013.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 5-Nov-2013.)
blocks.origin:
thm isershft(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz)), wb(wbr(cseq(c0, c2, c3), cli, c4), wbr(cseq(co(c0, caddc, c1), c2, co(c3, cshi, c1)), cli, c4)))
  -| wcel(c3, universe)
} = {
  bitr2d(wa(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz)), wbr(cseq(c0, c2, c3), cli, c4), wbr(cseq(co(c0, caddc, c1), c2, co(c3, cshi, c1)), cli, c4), wbr(co(cseq(c0, c2, c3), cshi, c1), cli, c4))
  breq1d(cseq(co(c0, caddc, c1), c2, co(c3, cshi, c1)), cli, c4, co(cseq(c0, c2, c3), cshi, c1), wa(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz)))
  eqtrd(cseq(co(c0, caddc, c1), c2, co(c3, cshi, c1)), co(cseq(c0, c2, c3), cshi, c1), co(cseq(co(co(c0, caddc, c1), cmin, c1), c2, c3), cshi, c1), wa(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz)))

thm isershft(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈ ℤ ∧ c1 ∈ ℤ)→(seq(c0(c2, c3))[~~>]c4 ↔ seq((c0[+]c1)(c2,(c3[shift]c1)))[~~>]c4))
  ⊣ c3 ∈ 𝕌
} = {
  bitr2d((c0 ∈ ℤ ∧ c1 ∈ ℤ), seq(c0(c2, c3))[~~>]c4, seq((c0[+]c1)(c2,(c3[shift]c1)))[~~>]c4, (seq(c0(c2, c3))[shift]c1)[~~>]c4)
  breq1d(seq((c0[+]c1)(c2,(c3[shift]c1))), cli, c4, (seq(c0(c2, c3))[shift]c1), (c0 ∈ ℤ ∧ c1 ∈ ℤ))
  eqtrd(seq((c0[+]c1)(c2,(c3[shift]c1))), (seq(c0(c2, c3))[shift]c1), (seq(((c0[+]c1)[-]c1)(c2, c3))[shift]c1), (c0 ∈ ℤ ∧ c1 ∈ ℤ))
  sylancom(c0 ∈ ℤ, c1 ∈ ℤ, seq((c0[+]c1)(c2,(c3[shift]c1)))=(seq(((c0[+]c1)[-]c1)(c2, c3))[shift]c1), (c0[+]c1)∈ ℤ)
  zaddcl(c0, c1)
  seqshft((c0[+]c1), c1, c2, c3)
  oveq1d(seq(((c0[+]c1)[-]c1)(c2, c3)), cshi, c1, seq(c0(c2, c3)), (c0 ∈ ℤ ∧ c1 ∈ ℤ))
  seqeq1d(((c0[+]c1)[-]c1), c2, c3, c0, (c0 ∈ ℤ ∧ c1 ∈ ℤ))
  syl2an(c0 ∈ ℤ, c1 ∈ ℤ, ((c0[+]c1)[-]c1)= c0, c0 ∈ ℂ, c1 ∈ ℂ)
  zcn(c0)
  zcn(c1)
  pncan(c0, c1)
  adantl(c0 ∈ ℤ, c1 ∈ ℤ, ((seq(c0(c2, c3))[shift]c1)[~~>]c4 ↔ seq(c0(c2, c3))[~~>]c4))
  mpan2(c1 ∈ ℤ, ((seq(c0(c2, c3))[shift]c1)[~~>]c4 ↔ seq(c0(c2, c3))[~~>]c4), seq(c0(c2, c3))∈ 𝕌)
  seqex(c0, c2, c3)
  climshft(c1, seq(c0(c2, c3)), universe, c4)
}

blocks.name: isercoll
blocks.content: Rearrange an infinite series by spacing out the terms using an order isomorphism. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 6-Apr-2015.)

blocks.name: isercoll2
blocks.content: Generalize ~ isercoll so that both sequences have arbitrary starting point. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 6-Apr-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm isercoll2(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wb(wbr(cseq(c0, caddc, c1), cli, c2), wbr(cseq(c3, caddc, c4), cli, c2)))

  -| wceq(c6, cfv(cuz, c3))

  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, cz))
  -| wi(w0, wf(c7, c5, c6))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c5)), wbr(cfv(c7, cv(s0)), clt, cfv(c7, co(cv(s0), caddc, nat1))))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s1), cdif(c6, crn(c7)))), wceq(cfv(c4, cv(s1)), nat0))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s1), c6)), wcel(cfv(c4, cv(s1)), cc))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c5)), wceq(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), cfv(c4, cfv(c7, cv(s0)))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
  -| diffsc(s0, c5)
  -| diffsc(s0, c7)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c3)
  -| diffsc(s1, c4)
  -| diffsc(s1, c6)
  -| diffsc(s1, c7)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
} = {
  a1ii(wi(w0, wb(wbr(cseq(c0, caddc, c1), cli, c2), wbr(cseq(c3, caddc, c4), cli, c2))), diffss(s0, s1))

  a1i(w0, wcel(cseq(c0, caddc, c1), universe))
  seqex(c0, caddc, c1)
  a1i(w0, wcel(cseq(nat1, caddc, cmpt(hs0, cn, cfv(c1, co(c0, caddc, co(cv(hs0), cmin, nat1))))), universe))
  seqex(nat1, caddc, cmpt(hs0, cn, cfv(c1, co(c0, caddc, co(cv(hs0), cmin, nat1)))))
  eqtr2d(cfv(cseq(nat1, caddc, cmpt(hs0, cn, cfv(c1, co(c0, caddc, co(cv(hs0), cmin, nat1))))), co(cv(s0), caddc, co(nat1, cmin, c0))), cfv(cseq(c0, caddc, c1), cv(s0)), cfv(cseq(co(c0, caddc, co(nat1, cmin, c0)), caddc, cmpt(hs0, cn, cfv(c1, co(c0, caddc, co(cv(hs0), cmin, nat1))))), co(cv(s0), caddc, co(nat1, cmin, c0))), wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c5)))
  seqshft2(hs1, c0, caddc, c1, cv(s0), co(nat1, cmin, c0), cmpt(hs0, cn, cfv(c1, co(c0, caddc, co(cv(hs0), cmin, nat1)))), wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c5)))
  adantr(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c5), wcel(co(nat1, cmin, c0), cz))
  sylancr(w0, wcel(co(nat1, cmin, c0), cz), wcel(nat1, cz), wcel(c0, cz))
  1z()
  zsubcl(nat1, c0)
  syl2an(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c5)), wcel(cv(hs1), co(c0, cfz, cv(s0))), wceq(cfv(c1, cv(hs1)), cfv(cmpt(hs0, cn, cfv(c1, co(c0, caddc, co(cv(hs0), cmin, nat1)))), co(cv(hs1), caddc, co(nat1, cmin, c0)))), w0, wcel(cv(hs1), c5))

  elfzuz(cv(hs1), c0, cv(s0))

blocks.name: climsup
blocks.content: A bounded monotonic sequence converges to the supremum of its range. Theorem 12-5.1 of [Gleason] p. 180. (Contributed by NM, 13-Mar-2005.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 10-Feb-2014.)

blocks.name: climcau
blocks.content: A converging sequence of complex numbers is a Cauchy sequence. Theorem 12-5.3 of [Gleason] p. 180 (necessity part). (Contributed by NM, 16-Apr-2005.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 26-Apr-2014.)

thm caucvgrlem(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wrex(s0, c0, wa(wcel(cfv(clsp, c1), cr), wral(s1, c0, wi(wbr(cv(s0), cle, cv(s1)), wbr(cfv(cabs, co(cfv(c1, cv(s1)), cmin, cfv(clsp, c1))), clt, co(nat3, cmul, c2)))))))
  -| wi(w0, wss(c0, cr))
  -| wi(w0, wf(c1, c0, cr))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(csup(c0, cxr, clt), cpnf))
  -| wi(w0, wral(s2, crp, wrex(s0, c0, wral(s1, c0, wi(wbr(cv(s0), cle, cv(s1)), wbr(cfv(cabs, co(cfv(c1, cv(s1)), cmin, cfv(c1, cv(s0)))), clt, cv(s2)))))))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, crp))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)

  -| diffsc(s2, c2)

  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
  -| diffsw(s2, w0)
} = {
  a1ii(wi(w0, wrex(s0, c0, wa(wcel(cfv(clsp, c1), cr), wral(s1, c0, wi(wbr(cv(s0), cle, cv(s1)), wbr(cfv(cabs, co(cfv(c1, cv(s1)), cmin, cfv(clsp, c1))), clt, co(nat3, cmul, c2))))))), diffsc(s0, c0))
  a1ii(wi(w0, wrex(s0, c0, wa(wcel(cfv(clsp, c1), cr), wral(s1, c0, wi(wbr(cv(s0), cle, cv(s1)), wbr(cfv(cabs, co(cfv(c1, cv(s1)), cmin, cfv(clsp, c1))), clt, co(nat3, cmul, c2))))))), diffsc(s0, c1))
  a1ii(wi(w0, wrex(s0, c0, wa(wcel(cfv(clsp, c1), cr), wral(s1, c0, wi(wbr(cv(s0), cle, cv(s1)), wbr(cfv(cabs, co(cfv(c1, cv(s1)), cmin, cfv(clsp, c1))), clt, co(nat3, cmul, c2))))))), diffsw(s1, w0))
  a1ii(wi(w0, wrex(s0, c0, wa(wcel(cfv(clsp, c1), cr), wral(s1, c0, wi(wbr(cv(s0), cle, cv(s1)), wbr(cfv(cabs, co(cfv(c1, cv(s1)), cmin, cfv(clsp, c1))), clt, co(nat3, cmul, c2))))))), diffsw(s2, w0))

blocks.name: caurcvgr
blocks.content: A Cauchy sequence of real numbers converges to its limit supremum. The third hypothesis specifies that ` F ` is a Cauchy sequence. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 7-May-2016.) (Revised by AV, 12-Sep-2020.)

  simpr(wcel(cfv(clsp, c0), cr), wral(s2, c1, wi(wbr(cv(s1), cle, cv(s2)), wbr(cfv(cabs, co(cfv(c0, cv(s2)), cmin, cfv(clsp, c0))), clt, co(nat3, cmul, co(cv(hs0), cdiv, nat3))))))

  rexralbidv(s1, s2, cr, c1, wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), crp)), wi(wbr(cv(s1), cle, cv(s2)), wbr(cfv(cabs, co(cfv(c0, cv(s2)), cmin, cfv(clsp, c0))), clt, co(nat3, cmul, co(cv(hs0), cdiv, nat3)))), wi(wbr(cv(s1), cle, cv(s2)), wbr(cfv(cabs, co(cfv(c0, cv(s2)), cmin, cfv(clsp, c0))), clt, cv(hs0))))

  3cn()

  3ne0()

blocks.pretty:
thm caurcvgr(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 → c0[~~>r](limsup ` c0))
  ⊣ (w0 → c1 ⊆ ℝ)
  ⊣ (w0 →(c0 : c1 → ℝ))
  ⊣ (w0 → sup(c1, ℝ*, <)= +∞)
  ⊣ (w0 → ∀(s0 ∈ ℝ+, ∃(s1 ∈ c1, ∀(s2 ∈ c1,(s1[≤]s2 →(abs `((c0 ` s2)[-](c0 ` s1)))[<]s0)))))
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, s2)
  ⊣ d(s1, s2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c1)
  ⊣ d(s2, c0)
  ⊣ d(s2, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, w0)
  ⊣ d(s1, w0)
  ⊣ d(s2, w0)
} = {
  mpbir2and(w0, c0[~~>r](limsup ` c0), (limsup ` c0)∈ ℂ, ∀(hs0 ∈ ℝ+, ∃(s1 ∈ ℝ, ∀(s2 ∈ c1,(s1[≤]s2 →(abs `((c0 ` s2)[-](limsup ` c0)))[<]hs0)))))
  recnd((limsup ` c0), w0)
  syl(w0, (limsup ` c0)∈ ℝ, ∃(s1 ∈ c1,((limsup ` c0)∈ ℝ ∧ ∀(s2 ∈ c1,(s1[≤]s2 →(abs `((c0 ` s2)[-](limsup ` c0)))[<](3[×]1))))))
  caucvgrlem(s1, s2, s0, c1, c0, nat1, w0)

blocks.content: A Cauchy sequence of complex numbers converges to a complex number. Theorem 12-5.3 of [Gleason] p. 180 (sufficiency part). (Contributed by NM, 20-Dec-2006.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 8-May-2016.)
blocks.origin:
thm caucvgr(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wcel(c0, cdm(crli)))
  -| wi(w0, wss(c1, cr))
  -| wi(w0, wf(c0, c1, cc))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(csup(c1, cxr, clt), cpnf))
  -| wi(w0, wral(s0, crp, wrex(s1, c1, wral(s2, c1, wi(wbr(cv(s1), cle, cv(s2)), wbr(cfv(cabs, co(cfv(c0, cv(s2)), cmin, cfv(c0, cv(s1)))), clt, cv(s0)))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c1)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
  -| diffsw(s2, w0)
} = {
  syl(w0, wcel(c0, cdm(crli)), wbr(c0, crli, co(cfv(crli, ccom(cre, c0)), caddc, co(ci, cmul, cfv(crli, ccom(cim, c0))))))
  eqbrtrd(c0, crli, co(cfv(crli, ccom(cre, c0)), caddc, co(ci, cmul, cfv(crli, ccom(cim, c0)))), cmpt(hs0, c1, co(cfv(cre, cfv(c0, cv(hs0))), caddc, co(ci, cmul, cfv(cim, cfv(c0, cv(hs0)))))), w0)
  eqtrd(c0, cmpt(hs0, c1, co(cfv(cre, cfv(c0, cv(hs0))), caddc, co(ci, cmul, cfv(cim, cfv(c0, cv(hs0)))))), cmpt(hs0, c1, cfv(c0, cv(hs0))), w0)
  feqmptd(hs0, c0, c1, cc, w0)
  mpteq2dva(hs0, c1, cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), co(cfv(cre, cfv(c0, cv(hs0))), caddc, co(ci, cmul, cfv(cim, cfv(c0, cv(hs0))))), w0)
  replimd(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c1)))
  ffvelrnda(cv(hs0), c1, c0, cc, w0)
  rlimadd(hs0, c1, cfv(cre, cfv(c0, cv(hs0))), co(ci, cmul, cfv(cim, cfv(c0, cv(hs0)))), cfv(crli, ccom(cre, c0)), co(ci, cmul, cfv(crli, ccom(cim, c0))), universe, w0)
  fvexd(cre, cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c1)))
  ovexd(ci, cmul, cfv(cim, cfv(c0, cv(hs0))), wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c1)))
  caucvgrlem2(hs0, s0, s1, s2, c1, cre, c0, w0)
  ref()
  eqbrtrrd(cfv(cabs, co(cfv(cre, cfv(c0, cv(s2))), cmin, cfv(cre, cfv(c0, cv(s1))))), cle, cfv(cabs, co(cfv(c0, cv(s2)), cmin, cfv(c0, cv(s1)))), cfv(cabs, cfv(cre, co(cfv(c0, cv(s2)), cmin, cfv(c0, cv(s1))))), wa(wcel(cfv(c0, cv(s2)), cc), wcel(cfv(c0, cv(s1)), cc)))
  fveq2d(cabs, cfv(cre, co(cfv(c0, cv(s2)), cmin, cfv(c0, cv(s1)))), co(cfv(cre, cfv(c0, cv(s2))), cmin, cfv(cre, cfv(c0, cv(s1)))), wa(wcel(cfv(c0, cv(s2)), cc), wcel(cfv(c0, cv(s1)), cc)))
  resub(cfv(c0, cv(s2)), cfv(c0, cv(s1)))
  syl(wa(wcel(cfv(c0, cv(s2)), cc), wcel(cfv(c0, cv(s1)), cc)), wbr(cfv(cabs, cfv(cre, co(cfv(c0, cv(s2)), cmin, cfv(c0, cv(s1))))), cle, cfv(cabs, co(cfv(c0, cv(s2)), cmin, cfv(c0, cv(s1))))), wcel(co(cfv(c0, cv(s2)), cmin, cfv(c0, cv(s1))), cc))
  absrele(co(cfv(c0, cv(s2)), cmin, cfv(c0, cv(s1))))
  rlimmul(hs0, c1, ci, cfv(cim, cfv(c0, cv(hs0))), ci, cfv(crli, ccom(cim, c0)), universe, w0)
  a1i(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c1)), wcel(ci, universe))
  elexi(ci, cc)
  fvexd(cim, cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c1)))
  sylancl(w0, wbr(cmpt(hs0, c1, ci), crli, ci), wss(c1, cr), wcel(ci, cc))
  ax-icn()
  rlimconst(hs0, c1, ci)
  caucvgrlem2(hs0, s0, s1, s2, c1, cim, c0, w0)
  imf()
  eqbrtrrd(cfv(cabs, co(cfv(cim, cfv(c0, cv(s2))), cmin, cfv(cim, cfv(c0, cv(s1))))), cle, cfv(cabs, co(cfv(c0, cv(s2)), cmin, cfv(c0, cv(s1)))), cfv(cabs, cfv(cim, co(cfv(c0, cv(s2)), cmin, cfv(c0, cv(s1))))), wa(wcel(cfv(c0, cv(s2)), cc), wcel(cfv(c0, cv(s1)), cc)))
  fveq2d(cabs, cfv(cim, co(cfv(c0, cv(s2)), cmin, cfv(c0, cv(s1)))), co(cfv(cim, cfv(c0, cv(s2))), cmin, cfv(cim, cfv(c0, cv(s1)))), wa(wcel(cfv(c0, cv(s2)), cc), wcel(cfv(c0, cv(s1)), cc)))
  imsub(cfv(c0, cv(s2)), cfv(c0, cv(s1)))
  syl(wa(wcel(cfv(c0, cv(s2)), cc), wcel(cfv(c0, cv(s1)), cc)), wbr(cfv(cabs, cfv(cim, co(cfv(c0, cv(s2)), cmin, cfv(c0, cv(s1))))), cle, cfv(cabs, co(cfv(c0, cv(s2)), cmin, cfv(c0, cv(s1))))), wcel(co(cfv(c0, cv(s2)), cmin, cfv(c0, cv(s1))), cc))
  subcl(cfv(c0, cv(s2)), cfv(c0, cv(s1)))
  absimle(co(cfv(c0, cv(s2)), cmin, cfv(c0, cv(s1))))
  releldmi(c0, crli, co(cfv(crli, ccom(cre, c0)), caddc, co(ci, cmul, cfv(crli, ccom(cim, c0)))))
  rlimrel()
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.hs0.c(cfv(crli, ccom(cre, c0)))
  diff.hs0.c(co(ci, cmul, cfv(crli, ccom(cim, c0))))
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.hs0.s(s2)
  diff.hs0.c(cre)
  diff.cre.s(s0)
  diff.cre.s(s1)
  diff.cre.s(s2)
  diff.hs0.c(ci)
  diff.hs0.c(cfv(crli, ccom(cim, c0)))
  diff.hs0.c(cim)
  diff.cim.s(s0)
  diff.cim.s(s1)
  diff.cim.s(s2)
